Scarlett changed and left the film studio practically bouncing on her heels with excitement at her newfound dietary freedom. Her driver met her, opening the back door of her Escalade before walking around and climbing in, "Where can I take you today?"

Scarlett bit her lip with an almost seductive mischief, "I need you to make a grocery run for me..."

--- --- ---


Back home with her treasure trove of snacks set on the dining room counter, Scarlett waved her driver off with a winning smile, "I'll call you if I need you later!"

She closed the door behind her and turned to look longingly at her prize – six paper grocery bags, heaving with chocolates, snack cakes, baked delicacies, and frozen foods her nutritionist would have turned ghost at if she'd been there as a witness.

Scarlett could hardly wait as she stuffed the frozen pizzas and cookie sheets into her pull-out chest freezer, normally reserved for bourgeois prime cuts and seafood. There was nothing to stop her now.

1132.content:
Natalie had been unusually inactive the last few days since filming had finished. She wasn't upset, or intentionally trying to take it easy, she just had nothing particular important lined up. There were some gettogethers with friends, and a few parties too, but those were coming up and gave her some much needed free time. She most hung around home reading. She was looking forward to getting out though, and as often happens just when she started getting bored and itching for work, she received a call from Shelley, mother and agent to Natalie.

She was reading while having a light snack. Then again, the slim young actress only ever had light snacks, both reflecting that she was a vegetarian and quite conscious of keeping herself fit.

"Hi, mom," she answered her phone, somehow knowing that this wasn't a normal call to chat, "What's up?"

"Oh, things are good, just that we haven't heard from you in a few days and thought maybe something was wrong. Nothing's wrong, is it?"

"No, mom, everything's fine. I've just been taking it easy," Natalie put her book down and, despite nobody being there to see it, rolled her eyes and smiled at her mother's words.

"Well, good. Your father is doing well, too. Well, I have a small job if you're interested, just a few commercials. You interested? It's good to get some tasteful publicity, you know."

She didn't need to convince Natalie. She knew her mom would never recommend anything that wasn't good for her career. For all her faults Shelley was a good agent and a good mother. She could be trying at times, Natalie knew all too well, but weren't all parents sometimes?

"Mm, what's the product?" Natalie asked, lying back.

113211.content:
-"Anywhere But Here." Natalie was becoming an experienced actor, but she knew she still had a long way to go. Any little boost to her career would help, not just her reputation but also her confidence. Despite having worked with some of the best actors of the day starting at a young age she still often felt unsure of herself. Her mom simultaneously helped with this while not helping at the same time. But then, that's mothers, isn't it?

"And it's right there in New York. I'll be in town tomorrow so I can take care of the contract, we can be filming by Friday, and I'll even stop by to get some early dinner with my daughter if that's not too much trouble."

"Of course not, mom," Natalie said. It would be nice to catch up. While Natalie was working on one job her mom stuck to personal topics and wouldn't bring business up again until that job was over. It put Natalie at ease and didn't make her feel that she always had to be stressing about whether her parents were happy with how her life and career were going. She knew that if they weren't her mom wouldn't stop pushing jobs on her even if she was working on a project.

------------------------------

The details were all worked out so fast that Natalie didn't even meet this Lucy Kwan person until early during the first day of two they would be filming. They would be making a total of six commercials, each along the same lines. Natalie would be playing a fit and cheerful young woman whose desirability, according to the commercials, stemmed from her love of Nutrex bars.

"It will all be very simple, you see," Lucy explained. She was about thirty, maybe an inch or so taller than Natalie and so on the short side. She was slim and wore black, professional clothing. She seemed more like a businessperson than a director. She had a firm, clipped way of speaking. "For instance, our first spot will feature you hiking with friends. You will forge ahead while they look on with admiration. You turn, smile, they smile, you take a bite of Nutrex. The second spot, the third sport, and so on, will be similar. We will film the hiking spot first, then the library, and then the part. Tomorrow will be the rest. Any questions?"

"Not so much," Natalie said. Lucy spoke in a way that did not invite questions. Not that Natalie was nervous, at least not anymore than usual. She found the subdued milling about of the extras soothing, even. So far they all just gave friendly waves or greetings without engaging much. Clearly, there was some sense of intimidation with these unknowns being in commercials with one of the hottest young stars around. Natalie still had trouble thinking of herself that way.

Natalie's outfits for all the scenes were similar, some form-fitting jeans and a spaghetti-strap top that came down just to her waistline so that if she bent forward, backwards, or to the side, just a little bit of her slim waist would be visible. It never failed to astonish her how costuming people could sometimes know exactly what would fit a person without even measuring them. Of course, commercials like this must be done a lot faster than any movie, so maybe they were just good at eyeballing a figure and knowing what would look good.

"You might as well try one. We are heading over the hiking set now after you change."

Lucy handed Natalie a Nutrex bar. It was the size of a regular candy bar. The packaging looked extremely generic. The ingredients were few, all healthy, with just one chemical Natalie didn't recognize. Natalie was rarely hungry, and she had a decent breakfast, but she would give it a try anyways.

1132121.content:
Natalie read up on what little she could of Nutrex so she'd be prepared. She was impressed. They were a small company with a lot of funding, most of it going towards research. Their flagship Nutrex bar was their only product now, but they had ambitious plans to further eco-friendly food research. Natalie was pleased that her mother had chosen well. If she was going to endorse a product, she was glad it was from a company that wanted to do good.

She also found that one of the owners was Lucy Kwan, the commercial director she'd be working with. Of the dozen owners Natalie was surprised that some of their names were oddly familiar. Some, like Lucy, she recognized as commercial directors who often worked with big celebrity endorsement projects. Lucy was only 25 but had an impressive resume with a lot of projects. No film work, Natalie noted, but surely she'd be working towards that.

Natalie showed up to shoot on time and ready. Lucy greeted her instantly.

"Hi, Ms. Portman, thank you for doing this. We're very excited about this project," she was a petite woman who spoke decisively, very businesslike, with a confidence to her that Natalie wished she had when she was younger.

"And I'm excited to be a part of this. And you're one of the owners of Nutrex, aren't you? It sounds like you're trying to do some great things," Natalie said taking her hand, "And please call me Natalie."

Lucy gave a vaguely sarcastic smile. They made their way to wardrobe. The studio was small and minimal. Natalie saw she would be doing the usual health/pharmaceutical endorsement thing, walking out on a clean, white set, talking to the camera. She'd be eating a Nutrex bar while she did so. They'd be shooting a few different ads in different outfits.

"We'll be doing a lot of takes so I hope you like this," one of the crew, a guy named Brad, said. He was carrying a box of the bars. They were very nondescript. Natalie took one out, unwrapped it, and took a bite. Fortunately, it didn't taste bad. She finished it off in three bites.

"Not bad. And healthy?"

"Very health. We'll start when you're ready. So, get ready," Lucy said. She gave Natalie a long look up and down, and then cracked the slight smile again. She looked at Brad, "She is quite perfect for this, very trim, very health." Then she flashed Natalie a smile again.

Natalie changed into a simple, slimming dress for their first take. She'd walk out from behind a corner, past some potted plants, and then unwrap the Nutrex bar. She'd start with comments on how wasteful food production can be. While she spoke about how Nutrex was a company that wanted to make food better, healthier, more efficient. She'd take a bite of the bar and smile at the camera. It was all pretty standard.

"Good take. Natalie, let's do that again, but start speaking before you unwrap the bar," Lucy said.

"Sure thing." Natalie took two bit bites and finished the first one without thinking.

So she did another take. Lucy wanted some more slight changes, and so they did another. After five takes, Lucy was satisfied.

"Liking Nutrex?" another crew member, a fit and bubbly young woman named Lindsay, asked Natalie.

"You know, they're getting better the more I have," Natalie said. She had eaten six so far and was starting to feel full. Good thing they're fat free, she said, patting her trim stomach. It felt a little full.

"...And that's why for your work, you'll want to grab a Nutrex." Natalie smiled, and then felt a little twitch in her stuffed stomach. "Urp!" She blushed. "Oh god, sorry. It's just, um, I'm getting kind of-" she paused, putting a hand over her stomach and suddenly very embarrassed to admit how much she had eaten during the shoot.

And all this low-carb health food was not satisfying her stuffed stomach.

Rubbing her swollen middle, Natalie stood up and left her favorite diner. She knew where she was going, but her conscious mind wouldn't admit it. Deep inside she crazed something rich and filling, something that she hadn't eaten, or even had a desire to eat, in years. She wanted a burger. Schemes began filling her head how she could head out of the city and disguise herself enough that she might not be seen breaking her sacred diet, but in the end the roar from her stomach quickly put a stop to that. Natalie pulled into the first In-N-Out Burger she saw.

"Just one double cheeseburger," she said quietly. Her seat belt pressed against her middle, and with a sigh, added, "No, make that two. Meals." Another growl from her middle. Natalie blushed. What was she doing? "I-I mean three . . ."

Natalie couldn't wait. Since she left her diner her stomach had been screaming for this, and now her thoughts all turned towards eating. She shivered in anticipation as she unwrapped the first burger. It had been years since she let herself have such a fattening, greasy, inhumane meal like this, but her hunger overrode her guilt, and she dug in.

At first Natalie savored the taste, ignoring the sickening sensation that sprung up from the grease. But within three or four bites she was barely tasting it anymore. She needed to get this into it. Her stomach demanded. Her stomach, which she had been inwardly whining about how full it was since she left the shoot, now couldn't be filled fast enough. The first burger was just a taste, though. Without thinking Natalie went for the second. With her other hand she tried shoveling a handful of fries into her mouth, some winding up on the front of her jacket. She fought to swallow as quickly as she could, just wanting to get it all into her.

What is going on with me? she wondered, curious but not quite worried, still getting over the guilty pleasure of it all. Even if I wasn't vegan, this isn't like me. I don't eat like this. I never have. These rational thoughts occurred all the while Natalie's hands stuffed herself. Soon, she was washing it down with a soda. She reached for more fries and found the large bag empty of everything. Every crumb of meat and grease had been cleaned out.

"Oh, uh-" Natalie felt a rumble in her tummy and held it with both hands, a belch rising up from within.

"Bwooooorp!" It relieved some pressure, but just enough to let her know that, yes, that round lump rising from under her jacket was indeed her own engorged belly. She wiggled in her seat. She thought that even the zipper of her jeans had been forced down. She tried sitting up closer to the steering wheel and triggered a series of loud, wet belches that left her feeling disgusted and sick to her stomach. She looked down. Her stomach was so swollen, so stuffed and stretched with food, that her loose jacket was actually pulled a little snug up front.

She sighed and rubbed her belly. She closed her eyes, wanting to sleep. The whole last hour had been a blur of her secretly stuffing her face with forbidden food, and now she had a huge, nauseous stomach to deal with. She whined, disappointed with herself.

Natalie shook her head. Even worse, she thought, she was now so severely stuffed that there was no way she could go for her evening jog, which was all the worse considering the fattening poisons she just filled herself with. She hoped-prayed almost-that this crime against her perfect temple of a body wouldn't have any long term consequences.
11321211.title: Breaking the vegan diet

choices: Give in and eat with Mila
Resist and flee all food products
113212112.content:
Natalie let a small belch escape her as she rubbed her swollen stomach while leaning back in her car. She closed her eyes as sighed. Somebody tapped on her window and she sat up with a start, feeling the fullness amplified as she sat up.

"Oooo-urp! Wha?" she turned around and winced.

Of course she should have expected it. Fellow celebrities run into each other all the time around here. Fortunately this was someone who was unlikely to care that Natalie had broken her vegan vow. Unfortunately, it was somebody who was very likely to notice, and comment on, Natalie's uncharacteristic binging.

Natalie's former co-star Mila Kunis stood outside her window with a wide smile.

"Heeey! What's up? It's been forever!"

Natalie reluctantly rolled down the window. Mila was one person she did not want to see right now. They were friendly enough back when they did Black Swan together. Now Natalie was thinking about a role Mila had not long after. Mila had put a decent amount of weight on her slender frame for it, and was proud of herself for her dedication to acting. Natalie thought it was disgusting that somebody would ruin their body for a role, but never said so. Later Mila lost the weight and bragged about how easy it was. Natalie just had a hunch that her swollen middle would not go unnoticed.

"Hi, Mila," Natalie said. "I was just taking a break. Did a commercial earlier for a new health bar-"

"Oh, I was just going to ask what you've been up to," Mila said. She looked incredible, Natalie thought, no hint of the pudgy belly or thick thighs she had developed briefly, but then that was a few years ago. Like clockwork, Mila's eyes went rapidly up and down Natalie's figure and stopped on her stomach. It was hidden by Natalie's loose jacket, but she was surprised to discover she was full enough that it showed.

Natalie stifled another belch, but not enough that Mila didn't grin knowingly.

"Getting some burgers?" Natalie asked.

"Nah, I was just taking a walk and I thought I saw you so I figured I'd say hi. Hey, want to grab a quick bite and catch up?" Mila's eyes once again went to Natalie's stomach. Natalie couldn't blame her, though. If Mila had come up to Natalie looking this bloated Natalie would have been both surprised and would have entertained a few delightfully mean thoughts about her lack of self control.

"I-I couldn't-" Natalie started to say, but faltered. Her stomach rumbled. Despite being full, she realized she was still hungry. A little more couldn't hurt, she thought even as she realized that was the exact kind of thought that leads to fatness. With her tummy so full of meat, grease, and health bars that it stuck out several inches, Natalie shouldn't be thinking of food at all. Especially with Mila standing there looking so slim and perfect. Natalie felt a bit of unusual jealousy. Being full does not put me in a good mood, she thought, vowing that this would be the last time she ever indulged like this.

Mila tilted her head and pouted, "Pleeease, it's been sooo long and I could use something to eat."

Natalie rubbed her swollen stomach and grimaced. She shouldn't, she absolutely shouldn't eat anything else, probably for a full week, but this sudden hunger was urging her to say yes.
113212112.title: Mila Kunis at the window

choices: Reasonable Natalie tells Mila about her day
Angry Natalie lashes out at the non-bloated fellow actor
1132121121.content:
Natalie's tummy groaned. She swallowed. Her mouth watered at the mere thought of more food.

"I-"

"My treat!" Mila said, flashing that gorgeous smile.

"O-okay," Natalie agreed, smiling back. Her stomach gurgled and she held it while blushing brightly. Mila giggled at that, and Natalie detected a note of catty mockery there. "But let's eat in the park over there. It's so nice out and I could-uuuurp!" Natalie found herself blushing again as another gurgle triggered an enormous belch erupting out of her. It actually shook her body, and she clasped her hands over her belly tight emphasizing its fullness.

Again, Mila snickered, that wide grin never leaving her face.

"And it's private, too, so we can catch up," Mila added. "Hey, why don't you go find a spot, I'll get us something to eat?"

Private, so nobody will see me eating meat, and more importantly, she added silently, and I can keep this food baby under wraps.

Natalie strolled to the park while Mila went back to get them more burgers. She was surprised that the heaviness in her middle actually slowed her down, as well as how stretched and taut her belly felt when she stood up. With nobody around, she did make another effort to button her jeans, and she succeeded. See, it seemed to say, you're very bloated and are eating like a pig, but it's just a one time thing. No fat here!

When she found a secluded bench away from prying eyes, Natalie sat down, once again popping her jeans open. She grunted, tugged at her jacket. Then she found the tightening fabric of her t-shirt underneath unnerving, and reached under to pull that down, too. She smelled food approaching, and her stomach roared in response. Mila approached, just in time to see Natalie with her jacket lifted up and her bare, bloated belly briefly exposed while she straightened out her shirt.

Once again, Mila's eyes went to Natalie's middle, and that smile widened. In her hand was a large bag, much like the one Natalie had earlier. Burgers and fries. Natalie's mouth watered. It concerned her how out of control her appetite was, but like before, once the food was there it was like her hunger overruled her concern.

Mile was just like always, nonstop talking. Natalie only had to nod on occasion. She had plenty of time to stuff her face, occasionally mumbling something through her full mouth. For her part, Mila had trouble imagine the casual but reserved and healthy Natalie chowing down like that. No wonder she was so bloated if she was eating like this. Heavy, greasy food tended to that. But Mila was happy to have somebody to talk to, or rather at, and Natalie seemed content to eat.

Oh no, Natalie thought, her disappointment in herself growing with the full sensation in her middle, I really don't need a second one now, I already had, like, three, four, earlier? Oh god, I don't even remember. But, the hungry part of her brain told her, wasn't it just so good? And that full feeling in her stomach, yes, there was something very nauseating about it, and on an emotional and intellectual level Natalie knew it was a bad sign. But on the purely physical level, it felt good. Better than good, even. The more she ate, the fuller her tiny tummy felt. She felt her skin stretching, fuller than she had ever been before, the zipper of her jeans again pushing itself down as she readjusted herself to slouch back against the bench to give her belly more room. When she leaned back, the fullness hit her even more, and the sensation was almost sexual despite her repeated command to herself to stop. Her jacket rode up the last time she leaned back, revealing a little of her full, taut belly.

"Bwooorp!" Natalie blushed, and reached for another burger. The bag was empty. Her eyes met Mila. Mila was grinning again. Natalie didn't even know how much time had passed. She barely remembered what Mila was talking about. She recalled eating at least two burgers in rapid succession.

"No more," Mila said. "You really went at those, you must have been starving."

"I guess we both were, urp," Natalie found speaking harder than usual. It felt like the fullness of her belly was pressing up against her lungs. She ran her hand along her full stomach and groaned. The hunger might have faded but the humiliation was back in full force.

"Nah, you kind of had mine, too, but that's okay. I guess I didn't need two."

Natalie threw her head back and half groaned, half belched. Another four burgers? No wonder her stomach was so full. And round. She planted both hands on it, shifting her jacket down to cover it, and finding that there was no hiding it now. It pushed out nearly as far as her modest breasts, giving her a distinctly pregnant appearance. She turned to the smiling Mila, not sure if she wanted to talk about her sudden worrying appetite, or lash out for being so thin and perfect while Natalie was so bloated.
1132121121.title: Mila and Natalie in the park

choices: Follow Natalie home, for more stuffing or sleep?
Follow Mila for a bit, seeing how Nutrex effects her
11321211211.content:
Natalie turned away from the grinning Mila, feeling like Mila must be jealously enjoying showing off her thin figure while Natalie felt like she was trapped under her overstuffed belly. A bubble of gas gurgled inside her and she winced, leaning forward and belching. She turned to Mila to express her anger and annoyance and saw that Mila actually looked worried.

"Nat, are you okay?" she said, genuine concern in her voice. Natalie was relieved, although felt foolish for thinking that Mila was inwardly mocking her like a bitchy high school cheerleader. Natalie leaned back and sighed.

"I'm fine, it's just-"

And Mila almost undid Natalie's good will towards her as she looked surprised, and then reached out and touched Natalie's half exposed, rounded tummy.

"Oh my god! Are you-!?"

"No!" Natalie said, pushing Mila's hand away. She shuddered at the sensation, partly because it was disgusting to have her swollen middle groped by her fellow slender, beautiful actress, but also because for a brief moment that strangely pleasant electric sensation rushed through her. She shifted to sit up, tugging her jacket down to cover her belly, even if her jeans wouldn't button. "But yeah, I know, I look pregnant. I don't know what's come over me. I haven't been able to stop eating all day. You saw me with those burgers, I was like a pig."

"Aw," Mila said, putting a hand on her shoulder. Now that Natalie had said why she seemed so off and moody, they both felt better. "Don't say that, we all have cheat days."

"Heh, I can't afford a cheat day like this," Natalie said. She gently rubbed her belly, trying not to expose any and repeatedly underestimating how full she was. Mila could be forgiven for thinking Natalie was pregnant. Her belly stuck out just a little past her modest breasts, and was perfectly firm and round.

"You'll be fine, we're both naturally thin. Like, you wouldn't believe how hard it was to gain weight for Blood Ties. It was awful. Every night I went to bad feeling like a beached whale. My stomach was constantly poking out and was so stuffed it hurt. I probably won't do it again."

Natalie smiled, "Well, unfortunately for me it was way too easy to get like this today. I guess it was just a fluke thing. I haven't gained weight since, well, college, and even that wasn't much."

"Haha, so you're not gaining weight for a commercial, then?"

"Oh, no, actually that was the only health thing I did today." Natalie dug in her purse. She had two Nutrex bars left. She handed them to Mila. "Here, go nuts. They're all natural."

"Oooh, all natural," Mila took them. She was not the diligently healthy eater that Natalie was. Mila kept her figure more with strictly limiting portions than with only eating extremely healthy food, but she didn't mind a health bar, as long as it was tasty. "Thanks!"

Natalie stood up, somewhat mortified by how she had to push her belly up and out to do so, just like a pregnant woman. She stretched, and the skin of her middle stretched across the compacted ball of food inside. "Uuuuugh, I just want this day to be over. I'm going to go home and sleep this off."

"You sure you don't want to, um, work out, maybe. You just ate a lot of calories there," Mile asked, her mouth full from the first bite of Nutrex.

"I wish but I am not up for it. If I wake up tomorrow and the scale doesn't say 118 lbs I'll have no one to blame but myself," Natalie said. She was no longer so upset by her all day binging. In fact, she had almost forgotten how surreal it was, how helpless she was to stop herself, how as she finished stuffing herself she was starting to feel-and this she just couldn't accept-aroused.

"Thanks for dinner. And for talking," Natalie said. Her and Mila hugged. Natalie belched as her belly pressed up against Mila's flat stomach. "Sorry."

Mila laughed, "We should get together again." Natalie agreed. When they weren't starving themselves and training for an intense ballerina movie, they found each other pleasant company.

Mila finished off her Nutrex bar on the bench, while Natalie, holding her poor, bloated stomach, walked back to her car.
11321211211.title: Talking it out, or, how Nutrex spread

choices: Follow Mila as she hunts for more to eat
Return to Natalie as she finishes up the day
113212112112.content:
After Natalie left, Mila sat on the bench for a few minutes. She appreciated a few minutes of quiet after running around town all day. She texted Ashton that she had run into Natalie and and that they should all get together sometime.

"Awesome, she's cool, sounds good," Ashton texted back. He thought everyone was cool.

He then wrote that he would probably be eating on set and that Mila might want to get some food for herself. Her stomach agreed, growling very loudly. Without realizing it, Mila was devouring the second of the two Nutrex bars Natalie had given her. They weren't great, but they weren't bad. Her stomach moaned softly and she patted it. They were small, but filling. Very filling. Nevertheless, that wouldn't do for dinner, especially after Natalie had scarfed down hers. Not that she held it against her. Natalie was clearly preoccupied. But then so was she in her way. She realized she hadn't even asked how her family was doing.

A wave of dizziness overtook Mila as she stood up, almost falling back down on the bench. Her stomach generated one long, continuous rumble. She thought it a little unlike her to be so starving, especially with it coming on so suddenly. She walked back to the parking lot of the burger joint to her car, smelled the cooking inside, and instantly followed her nose and stomach's commands.

Natalie ate four, or more even, I deserve at least one, Mila thought. Except when she got to the counter, her mouth watering, her tummy flipping over itself so much that she had to press her hand against it to sooth it, one didn't seem like enough.

"Give me two burgers, side of fries, and, uh, another burger. Put everything on those."

"Got it, three burgers and a side of fries."

"Four!" Mila blurted out, surprisingly herself. "And a soda. Make those fries large."

The place started filling up now and Mila was lucky to find a corner table. She had planned on taking it home but her thoughts were all turned to eating. She had the strangest sensation that if she didn't eat right now she would starve to death.

As she picked up the first burger, the savory aroma hit her hard. Self-conscious, but too hungry to stop herself, she actually drooled just before she stuffed the thick, juicy cheeseburger into her mouth. She stretched her mouth wide, much wider than usual, consumed with the need to get it all into her as quickly as possible. Small bites wouldn't do. She couldn't seem to chew fast enough. Within minutes she had polished off the first, her stomach purring with approval but nonetheless no less hungry than before. She stuffed a handful of fries into her mouth, slurped on the soda, all at breakneck speed. Mila was not a dainty eater, but she certainly wasn't a slob, which is what she felt like now. She quickly rubbed her hands on some napkins and then scooped up the second burger. Again, it was gone without minutes. Another big gulp of soda, this time followed by a little belch she couldn't suppress. And then, it was back to the races. After the second, she was certifiably full. The feeling reminded her of her Blood Ties stuffing sessions. She had the feeling of feeling her stomach so full and heavy.

I'm way too full, Mila thought, and then dug into the third burger. By the end of that, she was certifiably bloated, and she knew it. She sat back, feeling the food baby poking out into her tight jeans. She winced, and a little whine escaped her lips as her hands picked up the fourth burger and began stuffing that into her mouth. That's what it felt like, too, like her hands, mouth, and stomach were working independently of her. She had gone into the restaurant staving and intentionally ordering more food than she could eat, but now her body seemed to be forcing her to go through with it.

In less than ten minutes Mila had eaten more than she usually ate in several days, and all of thick, heavy, and greasy. She leaned back in the seat and rested her hands on her middle. She was indeed quite bloated. Her stomach uncomfortably stuffed, stuck out a good two or three inches into her jeans, causing her form-fitting, buttoned blouse to fit too tightly around her middle. It was the wrong outfit to wear if she was going to make a pig of herself. She gathered her thoughts, wondering just what possessed her to stuff herself like that.

And the even stranger part was, as she rubbed her belly, unable to stifle the little burps forcing their way out of her, it felt good. Not just good, but almost sexually pleasurable. She shook her head. This was crazy. She just need to leave, and-

Mila's hands, obeying only her ravenous hunger, reached out to the table and grabbed another handful of fries and stuffed them down her throat. For a brief moment she was actually frightened. She didn't meant to do that. She couldn't possibly fit any more into her. She could feel her stomach stretching with every bite now. The buttons on her blouse over her midriff were spreading a little, revealing her tight cami underneath.

"Wha-oh, no more," Mila said out loud as once again, she found herself taking up the soda, this time practically chugging it. Her stomach roared at her, but she continued. Gassy pockets began building up inside her swollen belly but she kept drinking. She watched the soda rapidly disappearing within her. Her stomach gurgled, churned, maybe telling her that it was having too much, or maybe telling her to keep going.

As Mila approached the end of the soda, she threw it across the table, empty, unlike her belly. She grabbed her belly with one hand, hating how full and round it had gotten, feeling completely weighed down by it. With her other, she pounded on her chest, trying to release the pressure inside her.

"Bworp!" came a loud belch, but not nearly enough. She almost felt like she was so full she would suffocate. She pressed on her round, hard belly, and a strange, but very strong, electric sensation of pleasure shot through her. Again, she pounded on her chest. Those around her were now trying not to look. They saw a very pretty, very thin, very fit actress whose expression kept shifting from extreme discomfort, to worry, to brief spurts of seemingly erotic surprise.

"Bwoooouuuuurp!" finally, the big one came. Some pressure inside her was released. Not enough, though. If she didn't release more, she was certain any sudden movements would lead to a button-popping wardrobe malfunction. Everyone was staring at her now. She blushed.

"Good food," she smiled bashfully to a couple nearby, before belching loudly again. The hunger, it seemed, was sated, and before Mila could even think about what came over her she had to get out of there before she embarrassed herself further. Very carefully, she stood up, and bumped her stuffed tummy into the table. She moaned as stars flashed before her eyes. She groaned as she heard her jeans popping, but at least her shirt hadn't popped open yet. That might be one indignity too many.

She wasn't going to clean up her tray. She didn't even want to look at everything she had eaten. She slowly made her way to the exit, the weight in her stomach slowing he down. While she grappled with her sudden lack of self-control, the odd thought came over her. I'm so stuffed, but at least I'm not as stuffed as Natalie looked, except the churning mass of food in her gut seemed to be telling her that she easily could be, and more.
113212112112.title: Mila and burgers

choices: Return to Natalie, nursing her own stuffed belly
Observing Nutrex reps noticed Mila and want to ask her a few questions
1132121121121.content:
Mila fully intend to get to her car and drive home. Except as she stumbled out into the parking lot she happened to notice all the other restaurants nearby. Her mouth watered, her stomach growled. She rubbed it, pleading with it to be satisfied. It did no good. Like her hands feeding her before, she started walking towards the first place she saw. With a frightening amount of effort, Mila was able to guide herself to a more healthy alternative, a salad bar buffet next door.

That didn't exactly set her mind at ease, though. Sure, her first two trips to the buffet had her filling up her tray with fruit and vegetables, which she unceremoniously heaped into a big pile on her plate. But while healthy, they were no less filling. Bite by bite, plate by plate, Mila's tummy stretched further. At the end of her first trip, she had leaned back and distinctly felt the first, then the second, pop off her blouse. Her overly tight cami rode up underneath. She shifted to tug it down. It was wrapped as tightly around her middle as her shirt was, but at least it could stretch.

How her stomach could stretch so much Mila didn't understand. She looked pregnant, but the feeling was entirely different. Being pregnant didn't feel unnatural even if it did get increasingly uncomfortable. This was all discomfort mixed with a bizarre pleasure. Mila hesitated getting up for her second helping, instead massaging her swollen middle, sticking out past her breasts now. She blushed, growing hot, both at the knowledge of others staring at her and also at just how good it felt to be stuffed, even if she hated the feeling at the same time.

Before she stood up, she unbuttoned her shirt, thinking that would make her look less like a glutton. With a grunt, she got her second tray of vegetables and demolished it in no time.

At least it's good for me, she said. She winced as she ran her hands along her belly, so tight and round. It bumped into the table in her small both whenever she moved, making her feel even more enormous than she looked. Her tiny body was not meant to be this full. It was indecent. It was humiliating. And she still couldn't stop herself.

Mila walked with an awkward lurch now as her belly pulled her forward. Her mind was so focused on eating, and how awful and stuffed she must look, that she couldn't rationally think about why this was happening to her. At least she recognized that, on some level, this was against her will even if she hadn't quite put the full thought together that something was controlling her, whatever that something was.

"Oooh, urp," she moaned to herself as she walked back for more food. "Please, no more," she said, causing a few around her to look at the bloated actress with confusion. Then her eyes drifted to the desert bar. Her feet stopped. She turned as her eyes went wide with fear. This was going from strange to worrying to actually scary.

"Oh, no, no no-bwoorp!" she whined as she walked to the cakes took several pieces. Then the cookies. Then a whole lot of helpings of pudding which she just dumped out on the tray. She made eye contact with one of the cooks refilling the buffet. "I can't stop," she said simply, softly. With a growing sense of horror she realized how true it was.

As Mila's belly grew with each plate, she eventually stopped trying to pull down her shirt. Her blouse wouldn't button at all with her belly sticking out a foot, and her cami had ridden up to her breasts, exposing her tan, tight belly. Her belly button grazed the table repeatedly, each touch sending shivers down her spine. It felt like she would explode. Only as she neared the end of her second tray of treats, with what must be nearly fifteen pounds or more of food packed into her petite body, did her shaking hands slow down. She sat still, mouth open, eyes half closed, moaning loudly as she rubbed her bare stomach. So many had seen her, where still watching her. She could just imagine if any paparazzi had snapped photos of her. This was way worse than Natalie. Natalie looked bloated, Mila looked engorged.

Natalie... with eating now an afterthought as her body slowly returned to her control, Mila made the connection.

"Natalie!" she said loudly, sitting forward, bumping her belly again, and belching loud enough to alert the entire restaurant. She slid out of the booth and stood up, wobbling dangerously close to falling. She had to wrap her arms around her belly to steady herself from falling, all too aware she must look like the world's biggest pig right now. Something happened to Natalie that caused her to stuff herself. And now that something was happening to her, but far worse. If Mila didn't find out what that was, and fast, then the little weight she gained for that movie would be nothing compared to what was coming.
1132121121121.title: Not all salad bars are good for you

choices: Meanwhile, Natalie fights her own cravings
Still want to stick with Mila when she wakes up?
11321211211212.content:
With the slow, awkward pace of a heavily pregnant woman, Mila made her way from the restaurant to her car. She was exhausted, ready to fall asleep as soon as she could. The thought of eating anymore made her gag. Even the humiliation of her enormous, exposed belly was secondary to just getting somewhere to lie down. Getting in touch with Natalie, surprisingly, was something she would do after she slept this off.

Her bare belly bumped into her car door while she fumbled for her keys. She burped softly and moaned.

Two figures approached her. They were two thirty-something women who made a bee line for Mila the minute she left the salad bar. One carried a clipboard at her side. Mila dimly saw them in her car's reflection while she fumbled with her keys. She acted carefully to not drop them, thinking that the weight of her stomach would pull her down if she had to pick them up.

"Jesus, look at her stomach," one of them whispered.

Mila half growled, half moaned, as she turned and said, "Not now."

"We just want to ask you something," the other woman said. They kept approaching.

Here it comes, they're gonna' ask if I'm pregnant now, Mila thought, finally unlocking her car, opening her door. Just moving herself as she did so was a chore. She felt more like a slow moving barge having to steer itself than her usual trim self.

"No questions, not-urp!-not now."

In a coordinated attack, one of them slid up behind Mila with little difficult and put her arms in a lock. Mila gasped and before she could do anything, the other woman planted her hands firmly on her lower belly, pressing into it. Mila went limp, nearly collapsing. Her overly stuffed belly churned loudly as the woman pressed harder into her exposed belly. Mila's legs jerked with, her frightened, addled brain was shocked to discover, pleasure.

"There's almost no give here. She's stuffed. Completely stuffed."

"No kidding, no comparison to the other one."

Other one? Mila thought vaguely. She tried to speak, but the only sounds that would come from her slack jaw were a combination of belches and moans. The initial shock of ecstasy as the woman pressed on her belly gave way to an even more overwhelming exhaustion.

"At least we know it lets the stomach accommodate as much food as the subject is able to stuff themselves with," the woman behind Mila said. The woman pressing her stomach felt further around, causing Mila to wiggled with discomfort, still unable to fight back.

"Mmm," she said. "That part at least works perfectly. She would have burst way before this if it didn't."

"I'm glad we got this test but we should take care of her before she sounds any alarm."

"Bwooor-mmm-uuuuuroop!" Mila struggled, not just to speak or move, but to stay awake. The woman in front took out a long needle.

"She shouldn't remember much, if anything." She stabbed the needle into Mila's belly.

"Aaaah-uuuuh..." Mila's stomach churned with greater emphasis. She could feel it, even see it, pulsating, pressing her skin outward, even pressing down into her jeans' zipper. The two women finagled Mila into the car.

"She's heavy for such a tiny lady, heh," one of them said as they reclined the seat to keep her out of view while she rested.

"Not for long," the other said.

The world went dark around Mila as she wondered which one they meant wouldn't describe her for long, "tiny" or "heavy"?
11321211211212.title: A test subject?

choices: Natalie wakes up a mere five pounds heavier, hardly noticeable
Natalie wakes up with an unmistakable potbelly
113212112112121.content:
Once home, Natalie couldn't wait to get out of her jeans and spend the rest of the evening in loose silky pajama bottoms that let her swollen belly jut out unhindered. She was glad for the pleasant, normal meeting with Mila. It made her forget about how crazy her all day binging had been. She even forget that she was nearly panicking when she couldn't stop. She thought now that she had been overreacting, that the sensation of her actions being out of her control was unfounded.

If her early panic had gone then the embarrassment and discomfort had not. Her belly still stuck out, proud and round, several inches. It was still hard to the touch. And it still made her wince whenever she moved, or even looked at it. Home alone, she could walk around rubbing it, not minding in private that her tank top rode up on it. Benjamin was away on business, and Aleph was at summer camp, so she could nurse the effects of her gluttony in private.

Still, her stomach was not letting her alone. As the night went on, its growling grew worse. She nibbled on healthy snacks they had in the house constantly. Her belly grew fuller but her hunger never went away. Natalie made a pointed effort to not have dinner at all. It might not be healthy to deprive herself, but after her eating all day she had no choice. She didn't exactly feel like she was starving herself, after all. Starving herself for Black Swan years ago was unhealthy and unpleasant, but so was looking like she was in her late first trimester of pregnancy when she wasn't.

Her phone rang around 9:00 as Natalie listlessly watched TV, snacking on chips and gently rubbing her round tummy.

"Hi, Mom,-urp!"

Shelley ignored that. "Hi dear, how'd it go today?"

"It went well. Nothing much to say," Natalie didn't feel like talking right now. She was getting tired, and sleep was probably the only thing that would give her appetite a rest. Every few minutes she nearly stood up to get more food, and had to forcibly stop herself.

"Are you all right? You're not coming down with something, are you?"

"I'm fine, Mom, just had a long day," her stomach roared, causing Natalie to blush even though she was alone.

"What was that?"

"Nothing! I think I'm going to get some sleep now."

"All right, 'night, dear," Shelley hung up, a hint of disappointment that her daughter didn't want to talk to her longer in her voice.

Natalie was getting tired despite her hunter. She felt herself drifting off in front of the TV, something she hadn't done since before she was married. Cradling her stomach, she made her way to the bedroom. She was out before she had time to set her alarm. Her stomach churned restlessly and noisily.
113212112112121.title: Snack time and bed time

choices: Lisa notices Natalie's gain right away and wants to use it in the commercial
Lisa ignors Natalie's gain, and shooting goes as planned
1132121121121211.content:
Nutrex, with the help of all that Natalie had eaten throughout the day, did its work while Natalie slept. When Natalie awoke the next morning to her alarm, it was not with her usual vigor. She felt sluggish from the start, and almost gave into the temptation to hit snooze and go back to sleep. No, she couldn't do that. She had a commercial to film again. A small job as still a job and Natalie was a consummate professional, even if she felt tired and a little sick.

Moving in bed something felt different, but she couldn't quite put her finger on it. When she removed the covers she saw that the stuffed sphere of her stomach was gone, to her relief. She gave her stomach a rub, and groaned.

Is that real? she said as she felt a squishy surface where the trim, flat stomach should be. Sitting up she felt her stomach fold in on itself a little. Her finger even dipped into her naval, which had always been shallow and flat. She felt a very slight jiggle around her middle as she stood up, could plain see her loose silk pants tighten around her waist. She pinched the subtle flab with her fingers, shuddering. Could a day's overindulgence have such an immediate effect? Her stomach was empty, growling with hunger, so she knew it wasn't still stuffed from yesterday.

The mirror confirmed it. Her perfectly trim waist had grown a small but, to her, noticeable bit of pudge. Even her sides bulged out a little from under her shirt. Her stomach must be sticking out an inch or so with soft, jiggly fat. She groaned loudly as she squeezed it again. Even when pregnant she hadn't put any fat. She didn't like how it felt one bit. She didn't enjoy having to be underweight for her 'Black Swan' role, but this just felt worse even if it wasn't a lot.

I did it to myself, she thought, wearing a disgusted expression as she tugged her tight tank top down over her new belly bulge. Well, that won't happen again. Against her better judgement she weighed herself. 123 pounds, the scale said. She was relieved at that. Five pounds wasn't a lot, even if it was a lot for a day. She could lose that in no time. In the meantime she'd just have to put up with it, however distasteful the sensation of softness around her middle was.

Natalie was not completely self aware, though, and didn't quite notice that her tiny ass was sticking out further than usual, or that her thighs were a bit closer together than usual, although not quite touching yet.

She ate a simple, health breakfast of some whole grain cereal, and then wound up having another bowl. Shaking her head that she shouldn't, she stuffed a full muffin down her throat before banishing herself from the kitchen. Her roaring stomach protested but her will power won out. She was due in the studio to meet Lisa in an hour, after all.

She audibly sighed as she had to tug her jeans up and suck in a little to button them. She didn't mind that when she was pregnant but now it felt like a kind of defeat. She wore a loose t-shirt. Aside from the tightness of her jeans, which she noticed felt strangely snug around her behind, too, she looked like her usual, slender self.

Natalie arrived at the studio on time and met Lisa right away. Lisa gave Natalie a strange look, her eyes widened as she smiled and took Natalie's hand.
1132121121121211.title: A little gain might go a long way

choices: Lucy apologizes, and Natalie pigs out at the catered lunch
Lucy enters, eager to see how in control she is of Natalie now
11321211211212111.content:
"Welcome back, Natalie," Lucy said, grinning ear to ear. "The shots from yesterday turned out great. You looked fantastic in them." She reached into the bad at her side and pulled out a Nutrex bar, handing it to Natalie.

"Of course, I mean, it seemed to go well. Oh, I'm not really hungry-" Natalie said, but took the bar anyways and, without finishing her sentence, tore it open and began eating it.

Lucy laughed. "So you read the outline, you know the gist of today's shoot?"

"Shots of me working out," Natalie said, swallowing, having finished the bar in three bites. She felt a twinge of hunger growing in her stomach. She once again became aware of how tight her jeans were, and that little jiggle around her middle when she walked closely behind Lucy towards some sets done up with exercise equipment.

"Yeah," Lucy said, hesitating. She turned around and, very casually, handed another bar to Natalie. Natalie, now wanting something to tide her over until lunch, gave in immediately. It all seemed so familiar, but Lucy distracted her before she could remember that this was exactly how yesterday's binge began.

"What is it?" Natalie asked. Lucy looked her up and down. She smirked, with sympathy in her eyes, and Natalie got the distinct impression Lucy was about to fire her. It wouldn't be the end of the world, although it would be weird.

"It's just I'm thinking we should change it up a little. Still show you working out, but we should probably incorporate, well..."

Natalie finished her second bar. That half-pleasant, half-discerning full feeling grew in her tummy. Lucy looked down at Natalie's stomach, then Natalie looked down. Even through her loose shirt you could see she had a little uncharacteristic bloating. Natalie didn't quite get what Lucy was saying, though. Surely her very minor, albeit annoying, gain wasn't noticeable, was it?

Lucy, still smiling, waved her hands apologetically, sensing the offense Natalie was on the verge of feeling. "It's nothing bad! And I love introducing some improv into my work, even a commercial. Don't worry, we'll do it very tastefully."

"Do what tastefully?"

"Why, highlight that little, ah, food baby," Lucy giggled and gave Natalie's tummy a pat. For a brief second, Natalie felt a deep, sudden pleasure within her stomach. Then, the sensation of Lucy's hand briefly sinking into her new, thin layer of flab overrode that. She blushed bright red, shrinking back slightly and placing both hands over her stomach. Lucy handed her another Nutrex, which she took. In the time before she finished the bar and thought of something to say, Natalie decided that embarrassment would appear childish, and outrage inappropriately, even though she felt both. Her honest thought was something along the lines of, How dare she accuse the perfect, slender, goddess of a woman Natalie Portman of having anything but a perfectly trim stomach! She knew that was absurd, but that was her first reaction before she calmed.

"O-okay. What did you have in mind?"

Lucy wore a look of triumph that Natalie, a little to self-conscious now to look directly at the thin, cute, young director, failed to notice.

What Lucy had in mind was very similar to what they planned. Natalie would be on the exercise bike. She'd be on the treadmill. She'd be doing sit ups. Except now the camera was going to be focusing on her softened middle. In idea was this was Natalie before Nutrex. In the first scene she even wore her normal clothes, although they had to wait until she finished her fifth Nutrex bar to film. She was able to get them down in two bites flat now, and her stomach felt heavy and full, like she had just had a decent lunch.

"Like this?" Natalie turned in profile between the mirror and the camera. She lifted her shirt up, blushing brightly. Her normally flat stomach really did poke out over her jeans, with slight overflow of budding lovehandles over the sides. Her jeans button felt tighter than in the morning, although she had yet to blame the now six Nutrex bars on that. In fact, she was starving and couldn't wait for some real food. The Nutrex bars were good, she thought, but not filling enough even though they left her feeling momentarily full.

"That's lovely. You don't need to push your stomach out," Lucy said. Natalie frowned. Of course, she wasn't pushing it out.

Changing into yoga pants and a tank top left her feeling less restrained by her jeans but at the same time made her look even more bloated. While running on the treadmill, she felt a distinct up and down feeling in her middle she had never felt there before. It was jiggling, and the sensation almost made her sick to her puffy stomach. The exercise bike was better, but even that was marred when the camera operator Lucy worked with made an encouraging comment.

"If we move the camera here we get a great shot of her thighs looking kind of meaty," she said. Natalie heard Lucy giggle. Natalie took exception to that. Yes, she did have issues pulling her jeans up over her this morning, but it's not like they were 'meaty'. They didn't even touch, and she still had her usual thigh gap which now felt like proof of her thinness even when she kept having to tug the tight tank top over her rounded tummy every few seconds.

The sits up were probably the worst, feeling her stomach fold in on itself.

"Urp!" Natalie stifled a belch with a sit up. "Sorry, I'll do that again." She tried again. "Bwooorp!" Blushing again, something Natalie was doing so much today she must look permanently red in the face now, she found that her full, heavy tummy was feeling gassy, just like yesterday. It took multiple takes before she could do three sit ups without forcing the gas out of her tummy.

The short day of filming went on longer than expected. A good twenty Nutrex bars into the day, Natalie was both starving and found herself constantly running her hand over her swollen middle. It had definitely swelled, she noticed. She looked at herself in the mirror of her dressing room before changing into her clothes. There was lunch waiting outside, and her stomach growled for it, her mouth watered for it, but her eyes told her that she shouldn't eat anything for a week. She also felt something kind of strange between her legs. Forcing her jeans up, she caught a glimpse of herself again. That thigh gap wasn't what it used to be. If her jeans were tight that morning, they completely failed to button over her swollen middle now. Sticking out a few inches, and feeling heavy, but not as taught as the night before with that thin layer of fat forming.

"Oh come on," she hissed to herself. "Come oooon," she struggled futilely with the jeans. She had barely eaten anything today, except maybe a few health bars. Why was she so much more bloated now than that morning?

Without knocking, Lucy stuck her head in. Her smile didn't fade at all as she caught a near-distraught Natalie struggling with her jeans.
11321211211212111.title: Lucy improvises Natalie's bloating into the commer

11512.content:
Jessica Alba did not often look back, but occasionally she would watch something from her past. Maybe a clip of a movie or show from years ago, or an old photo, from back when she was one of the hottest young stars in Hollywood. Invariable, she would nod to herself with approval. She might not be quite the household name she was back then, but she was pleased with her success. And still being as astoundingly beautiful and in shape as she was twenty years ago was a huge bonus, if she did say so herself.

Jessica could be humble about her success in film, TV, and her business ventures, but something she never lost was her vanity. Her fully deserved vanity, she thought.

Occasionally she would hear of somebody wondering "What happened to Jessica Alba?" "Why isn't she in things anymore?" "Did she retire?" She thought these were ridiculous questions. She didn't go anywhere. Her priorities changed. The roles didn't dry up, she just stopped seeking them. And she did get steady acting work, no worries there. Her business ventures interested her more. That and, of course, her family.

Jessica had a feeling that this casual impromptu meeting today had to do more with a business proposal than anything else. Maybe she was going to be asked to produce? She had done it before and enjoyed it. Jessica didn't want to assume anything, though. She sat at her lone table in the tiny, out of the way coffee shop, when finally she arrived.
11512.title: Beautiful, vain, successful Jessica

115121.content:
Hailee Steinfeld entered the coffee shop and shot Jessica a huge, friendly wave as she approached the table. Jessica stood to hug the younger actress.

"Thanks for meeting me," Hailee said, sitting across from Jessica.

"Don't mention it. It's been way too long."

"I know, I guess we're both pretty busy."

Jessica laughed. "I know are. Every time I turn around it's like you're working on something new."

Hailee blushed. Jessica had been somewhat of the mentor to the younger Hailee ever since the two met at a premiere years ago. Hailee was only fifteen at the time but Jessica saw a lot of promise in her. While they never worked together, Hailee wound up going to Jessica for career advice often. Jessica started thinking of Hailee like a little sister. For her part, Hailee liked and respected Jessica, trusted her advice, and also thought of her as a big sister, too.

Not that Hailee didn't feel a touch of rivalry with the older actress. Jessica did not pick up on this, however. When Hailee would relate her current project, whether in film, music, or some charity she was involved in, she always secretly hoped Jessica would be a little jealous. When she'd show pictures from a photoshoot, she'd secretly be offended when Jessica told her how cute or how pretty she looked, rather than beautiful or sexy.

The two spoke for a few minutes about Hailee's recent album. Jessica had listened to it, and thought it was good and catchy, and had some hits in it, but Hailee didn't hear the full blown praise she hoped for.

"Actually, Jessica, I kind of had an ulterior motive for wanting to meet up today," Hailee said.

Jessica was at attention. She liked the businesslike way Hailee got the subject back on why she called. She smiled at her protege to go on. She meant is as encouraging, but Hailee took it as a little condescending.

"Oh, lovely!" Jessica said, putting her coffee down and folding her arms on the table. She very briefly put on a very serious business face, but then her bright smile shone through almost immediately. "What is it?"

Option 1: "I have a business idea," Hailee has a non-toxic product for The Honest Company to endorse, which winds up having very fast weight gain side effects.

Option 2: "I need some health advice," Hailee embarrassingly admits she's been putting on weight, and has a mystical trap set to transfer that weight to Jessica and then some

Kourtney Kardashian was sitting at home watching E! News. Giuliana Rancic was doing a report on her sister and her newest boyfriend. Kourtney secretly despised her younger sister. She hated how Kim always got all of the attention. Ever since they were kids, Kim was always admired while Kourtney was cast off to the side. Things only got worse when they got famous. She could leave her stranded on a island, but than there was always a chance she'd be rescued. She could disfigure her, but than she would just get sympathy. 115332111.content:
Kourtney ran to her phone to call Paris Hilton. Unknown to the public, Paris Hilton was a genius scientist who specialized in the human body. She had actually made a formula that kept her skinny. Paris had dumbed herself down to become the Queen of Reality TV, but she had lost that title to her friend Kim years ago. Kourtney knew Paris still had a chip on her shoulder about the whole thing and planned to recruit her for her evil plan.

Kourtney was right, as Paris agreed to help. She told Kourtney to come over so she could show her some things she had that might help. Kourtney got in her lamborghini and rushed over to the Hilton Mansion. When she got there, Paris' butler showed her downstairs to Hilton's laboratory. It looked like something out of a science fiction movie. There were test tubes, beakers filled with mysterious liquid, and miscellaneous devices and machines. Near the far end, she spotted Paris. The young blond was wearing a white lab coat, rubber gloves, and goggles over her rather thick glasses. Her long hair was in a bun and she was barely wearing any makeup. This version of Paris Hilton looked a lot different than the one most Americans would recognize. She actually looked more attractive with her nerdy doctor look than her regular glammed-out Barbie doll look.

The two started having small talk and were catching up until Paris said, "So what exactly are you looking for Kourtney?". "Well", Kourtney began, "I was hoping you might have something I can use to make Kim grow fat faster. I don't know exactly how to do that. I want her to get fat, but I also want her to be humiliated. Maybe making her constantly hungry would work". "Like an appetite stimulator? I can do that. It just matters what level your looking for. I can increase her appetite immensely making her feel like she always hungry. Or I can make it so she can simply hold more food." "I like the first option more", said Kourtney. "Alright, I'll mark that down. What about her waste? I could make it so she no longer produces waste and therefore everything she eats will stay with her or I can throw her digestive system into overdrive and make her fart, burp, and poop more as well as sweat more causing some rancid body odor and all around stickiness," said Paris. "The second one sounds perfect. I was hoping to make her into a slob anyway. That would be so humiliating", Kourtney said with a purr, the idea actually turning her on a bit.

Kourtney had alway taken pleasure in the suffering of others. For a girl as insecure as her, she alway took satisfaction in watching others in pain or depression. Kourtney hadn't originally thought of this plan as a sexually gratifying oppertunity, but now the thought intrigued her. She would torture and torment her sister, breaking her mentally into nothing more than a pathetic mindless cow. Kourtney began to feel a wetness in her panties as she continued to fantasize. Paris figured that Kourtney had told her all she wanted, so she took the time Kourtney was daydreaming to fetch the appetite stimulant that would satisfy all of Kourtney's demands. Kourtney wasn't the only one getting hot over the idea of Kim becoming a fat, smelly blob with a broken will. Paris was liking the idea too and decided she wanted in on the scheme as well. "Why should Kourtney have all the fun anyway?", she thought to herself. "I mean I'm just as important to this operation as she is."

Kourtney was snapped back to reality when Paris came back into the room with a jug of purplish liquid. Paris told Kourtney that she wanted in on the plan. Kourtney agreed with that same evil grimace on her pretty brown face. Paris had an equally devious look on her face as the two began to laugh maniacally. "It's all coming together now", Kourtney thought to herself. "Time to teach that bubble-butt bimbo a lesson."

115332222222222222222.title: More Females

choices: Job Offer for Disney's Little Mermaid Remake
Competition Result to meet a Fan
1153322222222222222221.content:
Hailee Steinfeld lay on the sofa in her house, casually flicking through channel after channel. She loved having these days off to just relax by herself, it really help her let go of the celebrity life and let her get back to some normalcy.

As she flicked through more channels her cell phone began to ring on her coffee table. Hailee sighed, rolling her eyes jokingly to herself. "Can't I get a day to myself?" She said to herself as she sat up and looked at the caller ID.

It was her agent, so she pressed accept and placed the phone to her ear. Before she could answer her agent began talking...
1153322222222222222221.title: Hailee's Newest Experience

11533222222222222222212.content:
"Hey Ms Steinfeld. I just got word from the studio that they've got the results for that "Meet Hailee Steinfeld" competition you signed up to do a month ago. Unfortunately I've only been able to find one day free next week for you to meet this fan." The agent explained.

Hailee knew what was coming but played it off casually, "Let me guess. It's my day off, isn't it?"

"Yes. Yes, it is. The fans name is Darren Parker, he's 19 and I've checked he's not one of those crazed fans everyone talks about. Anyway, you're meeting him next week at 12 noon. Have fun." The agent said before hanging up.

Hailee smiled. This was her first time doing this kind of competition and she was hoping for it to be a good afternoon with her fan.
11533222222222222222212.title: Competition Result to meet a Fan

choices: Hailee hits it off with Darren
Darren secretly puts weight gain formula in Hailee's meal.
115332222222222222222121.content:
Hailee arrived at the smallish square where her agent had arranged for her to meet Darren. She was wearing a loose top and some denim shorts with sunglasses. Two security guards were near her keeping away any cameramen and paparazzi.

Darren was waiting there, looking a bit nervous, but smiled as he saw her approach. "H-Hailee Steinfeld. I-it's a pleasure to meet you." He said kindly to her.

"Thank you. It's really nice to meet you too." Hailee smiled back.

"Sorry I'm a bit nervous. It's not everyday you get to meet, well, someone of your fame and beauty." Darren replied before realising what he just said.

She blushed slightly. "Thanks. But you don't have to be nervous. How about we go and get lunch?" She suggested.

"Yeah. That'd be great."
115332222222222222222121.title: Hailee And Her Nice Fan

choices: Two weeks later and Hailee and Darren's friendship has grown
3 months later and pudgier Hailee is dating Darren
1153322222222222222221211.content:
Although things start off a bit slow, Darren finally starts to loosen up and they start to get to know each other. During the meal, Darren notices Hailee's small meal. "Hailee, sorry if this is forward or rude but may I buy you another dessert?" He asked.

"It's okay. I don't usually eat a lot anyway." Hailee answered politely.

"Alright sorry. Though I don't think an extra dessert will do too much harm." Darren said.

Hailee looked at her dessert and smiled. "Okay then. Sure."

The waiter quickly returned with two pieces of chocolate cake for her. As she ate the cake tasted amazing and as she talked with Darren she completely lost track of time. After 2 hours of chatting and the body guards shielding the pair from pararazzi, one of her body guards tapped her on the shoulder, "Ms Steinfeld, you really must be going."

She sighed, slightly annoyed as she was really into talking to Darren. "Okay, could you wait outside. I'll be out in a bit."

The bodyguards nodded and they left the two in peace.

Hailee smiled, "you're a really nice guy Darren."

Darren blushed slightly, "thanks."

"Would you like to do this again? Maybe at somewhere where I'm not constantly pursued by cameras." She suggested happily.

"R-really I'd love that."

"Okay then. It's a date." She smiled getting up and walking out waving goodbye as she left.
1153322222222222222221211.title: Hailee hits it off with Darren

choices: She dreams of Food and eating
She wakes up an hour later.
11533222222222222222212111.content:
Hailee sighed as she leaned back on the sofa, watching a movie with Darren. Despite Darren's shyness at first they've now become great friends with Hailee inviting Darren over whenever she has a free evening or afternoon.

Hailee's appetite has also grown with Darren giving her chocolate and treats whenever they hang out, giving her once flat belly a slight pudginess. As they sat on the sofa Hailee ate her buttery popcorn and yawned.

"A-are you alright, Hailee?" Darren asked, "You sound tired."

"Yeah, it's just been a long week." She said yawning softly again as she ate.

"Feel free to get some rest if you like, I don't mind." He said, looking at her.

"Yeah, maybe after this movie..." she said unintentionally leaning against Darren as she fell asleep. Darren moved his arm and she snuggled up to him as she slept.
11533222222222222222212111.title: Two Weeks Later...

choices: A month later and Hailee has gained 40lbs (180lbs)
A month later and Hailee has gained 100lbs (240lbs)
115332222222222222222121112.content:
Hailee woke up slightly groggily to see Darren sitting on the sofa next to her reading a comic book. However everything was on it's side. It took her a second to realise she was lying down with a blanket laid over her and her head resting on a cushion. She sat up, her hair slightly messy from her nap.

Darren looked up and smiled when he saw her sit up. "Hey Hailee. Did you sleep well?"

She blushed slightly. "Yeah. How did I end up sleeping? I was watching a movie with you and then I can't remember."

He smiled, "Well after you fell asleep, I let you rest on me until the movie ended and then I carefully lay you down on the sofa and got you a blanket." He blushed, a bit embarrassed.

"Thanks." She hugged him. "That was really sweet." As she hugged him, her belly growled.

"Looks like your hungry." Darren joked.

"Yeah. I kinda like that you got me into snaking out a bit," she said, one of her hands on her small muffin top. "It feels nice."

"It's my pleasure. I'm happy to get you as much food as you like." He smiled sheepishly.

"Thanks. And Darren... I know this is a bit rushed but would you like to date?" Hailee smiled, kissing him on the cheek.

"Of course. You're amazing." Darren smiled.
115332222222222222222121112.title: Hailee Wakes Up

1153322222222222222221211121.content:
Hailee yawned as she woke up to the smell of sausages and bacon cooking. She sniffed the air and sighed, one of her hands gently rubbing her chubby belly. Over the past month she had really let herself go with most of her clothes having to be changed for a larger size.

The news outlets had also taken no time in reporting her new weight, much to Hailee's embarrassment. Most had said how much of a shame it was that such a beautiful actress and singer had to lose her beauty by gaining weight but Darren was always there to reassure Hailee that she was still beautiful and that was the only opinion that she cared about.

Her belly jiggled as she got up and walked down stairs in panties and a top that was way too small, showing off her round ball of fat. Her thighs also rubbed together slightly as she walked and her cheeks were chubbier too which in Darren's words "only made her look even cuter."

Hailee reached the kitchen to see Darren frying up some bacon as he hummed along to music on the radio. "Hey Darren." She smiled, leaning against one of the counters in the kitchen.

"Good morning beautiful. I hope you're hungry, I making you a big breakfast to keep you going today during your recording session."
1153322222222222222221211121.title: A month later and Hailee has gained 40lbs (180lbs)

choices: Hailee examines her new chubbier body in the Shower.
11533222222222222222212111211.content:
Hailee smiled and hugged Darren letting her belly squish up against him as he finished making her breakfast. "You always know how to make me happy."

Darren smiled as Hailee dug into the hill of greasy food that lay on her plate. Although she knew she probably didn't look great with grease starting to cover the sides of her mouth, she didn't mind when she was with Darren and she'd be able to wash it off in the shower anyway. She continued to chew and munch on sausages and bacon and hash browns as she lay back on the sofa. Darren sat down next to her and gently rubbed her belly, which she moaned gently at as she ate.

After she finished, Hailee kissed Darren's cheek and got up. "I better go get ready for my recording session." She walked back upstairs, Darren watching as her butt jiggles slightly as she walked.
11533222222222222222212111211.title: Hailee eats breakfast

115332222222222222222121112112.content:
As she got undressed, she looked at the full length mirror, her enlarged butt facing it. She looked at how big here body had already gotten. Her belly an orb of fat that created a muffin top in her jeans, her thighs being twice the size they were originally and her bottom looking like two grapefruits. At least her boobs had gotten larger too though, she thought smiling. She rubbed her belly and thought how much she loved Darren and her new rounder body.

“This is amazing.” She said aloud before walking into the ensuite bathroom to shower. She sang as she showered, not caring if she was out of key since no one was there to hear. “All of my friends are leaving soon, to find them-themselves another roooaadd, but I’ll stay here in this stranger’s rooooom, just for now, I’ll stick with hell no’s and headphones.”
115332222222222222222121112112.title: Hailee inspects her Chubby body

choices: The Music Studio is shocked at Hailee’s weight gain
Hailee receives an audition to be in a new film.
1153322222222222222221211121121.content:
Darren turns his head and smiles, as Hailee walks down the stairs. She’s now wearing tight fitting jeans that hugged her thighs and ass and a loose top that still showed off the outline of her belly, forming a muffin top over her jeans.

As Hailee reached the bottom of the stairs, she noticed Darren’s cute smiling. Using her MirandaSings impression, she says playfully, “Stop it. Why are you looking at me like that?” Darren got up and held her sides.

“Because you’re so beautiful and I’m lucky to have you.”

Hailee blushed and they gave each other a quick kiss. “So I was thinking, during my recording session, could you maybe get me two double whoppers from Burger King and a supersized portion of fries and a cola please.” She smiled cutely as they walk to the door.

“Of course.” He smiled. “Anything else, Beautiful?”

“Maybe some mozzarella sticks too.” She blushed, knowing how much of a glutton she sounded. They got in the car and Darren started to drive down to the studio.
1153322222222222222221211121121.title: Hailee and Darren drive to the studio.

choices: The audition goes well and Darren and Hailee go out to celebrate.
Another newly fattened celebrity is at the audition
11533222222222222222212111211212.content:
After a long morning of studio recording, Hailee and Darren sat in the recording booth, eating their lunch, while she took a phone call from her agent.

“You’re kidding? Of course I’d love to audition. This Tuesday? Alright, I’ll be there. Thanks. Talk to you soon.” Hailee spoke through a mouthful of her Double Whopper. She ended the call and turned to Darren, a smile on her face. “Hey Darren, you know that comic you love reading about that Marvel girl.”

“Yeah, Ms Marvel. What about it?” Darren asked curiously after finishing a mouthful of his fries.

“Well, I’ve been asked that audition as her.” She smiled.

“Really? That’s amazing.” Darren beamed, hugging her in delight, Hailee’s chubby body squishing against him as he did.

“Thanks. I was wondering if you could help me get into the mind of the character for the audition, since you know so much about her.”

“Of course. Anything to help you.” Darren answered, unable to keep the smile off his face at the news.

Hailee continued to eat her meal, with Darren even buying her a third burger and some ice cream to congratulate her on her chance to audition. After her meal, she let out an unladylike burp, making her blush and checking no one was in the control booth to hear. Luckily no one was and Darren chuckled kindly to help her feel less embarrassed. “Sorry.” Hailee said, wiping her fingers on a napkin. “I don’t know where that came from.”

“I do.” Darren gently poked Hailee’s bloated belly resting on her lap. “It came from that cute belly.”

She blushed again, “I’m glad only you were around to hear that. That would have been awkward in front of the others.”

“Don’t worry about it. So would you like to go over the basics of Ms Marvel for the audition?”

Hailee nodded. “Yeah, sure.”
