115332222222222222222122.content:
"Worth...it..." the supposed nice guy muttered between grunts of agony. Mr. Parker lay on the floor twitching in pain after Steinfeld shut him down cold with a swift kick to the balls. Tipping over her tray onto Darren Hailee stormed away with a huff telling the waitress to their table that Mr. Parker had volunteered to pay in full and for any of the mess he made.

The waitress who had seen the whole incident go down simply stared in the obsessed fan's direction and flashed Steinfeld a cheeky grin with a nod the two ladies parted after which the waitress passed by the young man and "accidentally" dumped a glass of cold water right on him. Maybe that would cool him off as other patrons cheered and laughed...

"He's not one of those crazy ones" Hailee mumbled to herself still pissed at herself for falling for his playing innocent charm that worked at first then little by little that persona started to break, the kicker being when he tried to sneak a photo of her under the table. Darren thought he was fast enough he thought wrong as Hailee irrupted in fury and actually sucker punched him right out of his seat before he could recover her foot had come down right on his manhood!

As she marched into the washroom she could overhear security taking the young man away, hopefully that was the first and last time she ever saw him in her lifetime.

"Bastard's probably going to say I got my balls busted by Hailee."

What had started as something fun now had her tremendously angry enough so that when the washroom door swung open she instantly glared a hole right through the woman coming in, which turns out was her waitress.

The young woman was about Hailee's age, and potentially only about ten pounds heavier then her, her bright red hair the first thing anyone could take notice and her nametag read Ashe.

"Oh sorry."

"No worries that creep is gone by the way." Knowing it was a touchy subject Ashe decided to move away from Darren, "I was just coming in to touch up since my shift is done for the day. I know you probably don't want to hear this right now but I was pretty excited when I heard you were coming here."

Hailee silently raised an eyebrow at Ashe, "Oh not that I'm a crazed hound like that guy I've actually just known about you recently. You seem pretty cool and I really like your recent work. I thought maybe I could say hi or something you know just keep things really casual. I didn't want to embarrass myself really."

Hailee found herself smiling as she noticed the slight blush on Ashe's cheeks, the girl was trying so hard to stay cool and collected in front of her.

"Your shift's over right?" Ashe nodded, "What do you say you and me get out of here after all today a fan was suppose to meet and eat with me and well you're a fan and I really didn't eat so."

"Um sure let me just get my things!" Ashe explained she was trying so hard to stay in control of her emotions that Hailee was starting to find it outright adorable.

Later having changed into her casual clothes Ashe and Hailee left the restaurant as they did so they caught sight of the police hounding Mr. Parker the two women smiling at each other before bursting into laughter.

The process of talking and eating continued for a while and eventually stopped when Jamie finished her platter and rubbed her now taught gut saying "whew, that was great." Then she looked over at Cherami and said "well at least I wasn't the only one that clearly enjoyed the meal." Cherami didn't understand what she meant until she looked down at her platter and noticed that nearly all the food was gone, save for a small piece of corn bread and a few sweet potato fries that Cherami had missed. Stunned Cherami suddenly felt the effects of her feast as the fullness hit her and she noticed the food baby underneath her shirt. Her cheeks suddenly turned red as she felt embarrassed about the amount of food she had just eaten. Jamie, noticing the slight embarrassment Cherami was experiencing said "Hey Cherami nothing wrong with indulging every now and then." This seemed to put Cherami at ease and she and Jamie continued to talk until the waitress came back to the table to take their platters back to the kitchen to be washed. "Well now looks like you two enjoyed your meals," the waitress said. The two replied "yes, thank you." The waitress then asked if they had any room for desert. Cherami replied "no thank you," still feeling uncomfortably full from the giant platter of food she had just eaten. Jamie also full from the belly buster said no to desert although she was already thinking about eating some ice cream when she got home. The waitress then left and returned shortly with the check for the two voice actresses. After settling the check the two got up with some difficulty as they were both pretty full. After they had left the restaurant Jamie said "That was great we'll have to do this again the next time you're down here recording for Funimation." Cherami replied "Yea definitely, but next time I should probably steer clear of that belly buster," said Cherami rubbing her food belly. Jamie laughed and then asked Cherami if she wanted a ride to the hotel she was staying at while in Texas for the weekend. Cherami had initially planned on walking back from the restaurant but as full as she was Cherami decided it would be better to catch a ride back. Cherami accepted the offer from Jamie and the two left. They eventually arrived at the hotel Cherami was staying at. Once they got there Cherami thanked Jamie and went up to her room. Still stuffed and uncomfortable Cherami went to the bed to lay down, she looked at her phone it said it was 7PM. She thought about her schedule for the rest of the weekend. Tomorrow, Saturday, she had some voice sessions at Funimation, and the next day she was flying back to California. Figuring she should get a good night of rest for tomorrow, Cherami quickly got ready for bed and then turned in for the night.

In spite of losing her trim figure, Monica couldn't fret over it. Even as her tightened clothes dug into her plushy flesh, the famed voice actress simply shrugged it off., It wasn't her body that she had to worry about, it was her recognizable voice that made her money. 11533222222222222222222121.content:
Patting a full belly, Monica walked into the recording booth "Ahh that was good."

It was then that Monica noticed that her session would be recorded by Colleen Clinkenbeard. Colleen, much like herself, had developed quite the healthy appetite over the years which in turn had put many soft pounds on her frame. Slightly unprofessional, Colleen habitually brought in food so she could eat during sessions. Currently she was munching on a greasy spread of fast food.

"Hey Colleen." Monica greeted. "Those look tasty."

"Hi Monica, these sure are I just can't stop eating them." Colleen said with food in both hands.

"So Colleen, what'll I be voicing today?" asked Monica as she entered the booth.

"The usual, a young girl with a huge appetite." Colleen answered.

Eating was rather ubiquitous in anime. Characters constantly ate copious servings of food and disregarded restraint. Especially cute and sexy girls, anime adored voracious girls. There was Fairy Tail's Erza Scarlet who loved sweets and there was Stocking from Panty and Stocking who constantly indulged herself. One would wonder if the voice actresses' weight gain was influenced by voicing numerous cute girls with huge appetites.

Monica flawlessly delivered her lines, perfectly adopting the role of a gluttonous school girl. Snacking on her greasy meal, Colleen deftly recorded Monica's lines. As Monica's last concluded, Monica felt famished.

"Someone looks hungry." teased Colleen.

"I sure am. Those last few lines really stimulated my appetite." Monica admitted walking over to Colleen sitting at her station.

Monica awed at the image on the computer screen. It was a My Hero Academia image. It was a bunch of the show's girls in cheerleading outfits.

"Oh that's my wallpaper. Pretty nice, right." answered a proud Colleen.

What made the wallpaper so special to Colleen was that it differed from other fanart. Unlike other fanart, this piece was much more relatable to the typical voice actress. What made this image stand out was that every girl was very fat.

"Oh they look so cute!" squealed Monica.

"EEEEE! There's my character!" Monica enthusiastically pointed at a corpulent version of Tsuyu Asui.

1153322222222222222222221131.content:
Fate was a funny thing. Lily James had recently broken up with her ex-boyfriend Matt Smith after dating for two straight years when her path crossed with Chris Evans. She had always thought that he was hot and had heard that he was in town but she didn't expect to see him. Fate had intervened though. She was on her way out of The Corinthia Hotel where she had been visitng a friend of hers when she bumped into Chris. The two of them started chatting, quicky hit it off, and exchanged numbers.

After a couple of weeks of flirting and talking over text messages, a few meeting for drinks, and an official date night, Chris had asked if they could start dating. Lily happily agreed.

Today he had asked to take her out for ice cream and she had suggusted they go to one of her favorite ice cream shops which was a mom and pop shop."This is my treat. Get whatever you want" Chris said with a smile to Lily. "Thank you Chris. That is very sweet of you. I will have a chocolate ice cream cone please" she said. "You got it" he said before order a large choclate ice cream cone and a small vanilla one for himself. She was a little surprised that he opted to get her the large cone but she was certainly not complaining. She had a sweet tooth and it was better than a guy who just wanted her to eat salads.

"Thank you for my ice cream. You are such a gentleman. I love that about you" Lily said sweetly as she looked over at Chris with a warm smile. "How about we take these to the park?" she suggested. She was dressed casually but in a stylish way with a pair of dark jeans, a grey sweater, and a blue scarf that she was wearing as her mask. She completed her look by wearing her hair down and wearing a pair of sunglasses.

"Sure, that sounds good" Chris said. He was dressed casually as well in black pants, a blue and white t-shirt. He completed his look with a baseball cap and a pair of sunglasses. He couldn't help but look over Lily's figure as she led the way to the park. While Lily was on the skinny side, she had a nice set of womanly hips that spoke to her potential. Chris had always loved curvier girls and particularly girls with big asses. Due to this, he often liked to spoil his girlfriends, and some of them put on weight, much to his delight and their dismay. Minka Kelly had been especially susceptible to this. He hoped that would be the case with Lily.

Arriving at the park, the pair found a nice spot, and took a seat. "So are you excited about the next chapter of your career now that you are done with playing Captain America?" Lily asked him before eating more of her ice cream. "Most definitely. It will be nice to try some different roles and I am also interested in doing more directing" he said. "Really? That is so exciting. Let me know if you are ever looking for a leading lady for one of your films, I would like to audition" she said with her best smile.

"What are you working on next?" Chris asked Lily. "Well I have the sequel to Baby Driver coming up and I have also signed on to star in The Pursuit of Love" the blonde actress replied as she continued to eat more of her ice cream.

"I really enjoyed Baby Driver. It was a fun movie and you were great in it. You have a lovely voice" Chris said a bit firtious with a wink.

"Well thank you. You are such a charmer" Lily said with a blush and an embarassed little laugh. She continued to eat her ice cream while they chatted. Their conversation distracted her and before she knew it, she had finished her ice cream. "Would you walk me back to my place?" Lily asked Chris. He really is every much the good guy I thought he would be and he is very sweet. Maybe breaking up with Matt was the best thing. Maybe I was meant to be with Chris she couldn't help but think to herself.

"I would be happy to" Chris said before helping Lily and walking her back to her place. He was greatly pleased that Lily was able to finish her large ice cream. She had an appetite and he knew that he could exploit.

When they arrived at her place, Chris decided to make his next movie. "This was really fun but how about I take you out for dinner tomorrow night?" he asked her with his most charming smile.
1153322222222222222222221131.title: Her new boyfriend Chris Evans starts to fatten ...

11533222222222222222222211311.content:
Lily knew what her answer was going to be immediately but she decided to ponder it for a moment before answer. She didn't want to seem too eager and wanted to make Chris sweat it out a bit. "Dinner tomorrow night would be great. Pick me up at 8pm?" she asked Chris. "Sounds good" Chris said. Lily then gave me a kiss on the lips before disappearing inside her apartment building.

True to his word, Chris arrived at 8pm sharp at Lily's place. He was dressed up a black pair of pants and a blue dress shirt under a light black suit jacket. Hearing a knock on the door, Lily hurried over, and opened it after grabbing her purse. "Hey Chris! You look very nice. I'm all ready to go" she said sweetly with a smile. She was dressed in a lovely red dress that fit her body perfectly. She wore her long blonde hair down, and had her make-up done all pretty. Chris couldn't help but look her over. "And you look gorgeous" Chris said before gently taking hold of Lily's hand, bringing it up to his lips, and gently kissing it. Lily couldn't help but smile and blush.

"So where are you taking me to eat?" Lily asked Chris once they were both in the car. "To an Italian resturant that I heard was really good" he replied. And serves big portions he thought to himself. The drive to the returant didn't take too long and before long they were seated at a table in the back where they would be given some privacy. "Order whatever you want, it's my treat" Chris said. When it came to dating, Chris was admitted rather old fashioned.

"The fettucini alfredo sounds good but I don't know if I should have it. I haven't been working out as much as I should be during this quarantine" Lily said after looking over the menu for a bit. "Nonsense hon, if you want the fettucini alfredo, you should get it" Chris said. He was really pleased by her choice. "Well..okay. If you insist" Lily said with a soft laugh. When their waitress returned, Lily ordered the fettucini alfredo and a glass of red wine. Chris ordered a simple spaghetti and meatball and got a glass of red wine as well.


The waitress returned with their glasses of red wine promptly. The two stars nursed their wine as they continued to chat. Their pasta dishes were brought out a short time later. "Can I have another glass of red wine please" she asked the waitress who quickly went to grab the bottle. Her fettucini alfredo looked and smell delicious and she eagerly dug in. "Mm, so good" Lily moaned softly. Once she started eating, she couldn't stop save for a few sips of red wine once the waitress returned and refilled the glass.

Before she knew it, Lily had finished her whole plate and was feeling a little bloated. "Oh wow, that was so good" Lily moaned softly as she laid back in her seat and gently patted her bloated belly. "I've definitely got a food baby now" she said with an embarassed little laugh before taking a few sips of her red wine. "And I am sure it looks lovely on you" Chris said sincerely as he finished his own plate.

"Can I interest you two in dessert?" The waitress asked as she set a couple of dessert menus down in front of them before collecting their empty plates.

Despite being on the full side, Lily was tempted by the site of the dessert menu. She picked it up, and began looking through the chocolates. They were offering chocolate cake which was her favorite.

12221.content:
Chris Brown was on his tour bus when Tyga runs in and tells him to turn on Entertainment Tonight. "Why? You know I hate the celebrity media", said Chris. "Yeah I know, but they ain't talking 'bout you. They talking 'bout yo girl", said Tyga. Chris quickly grabbed the remote and turned on ET. Just like Tyga said, they were talking about Rihanna who had been doing some hard partying in the Bahamas. Chris hated seeing her like this. Since they broke up, Rihanna had turned into the official bad girl of music. She was always surprising people with her outlandish behavior and raunchiness. Chris disapproved. Even though they had broken up a few years ago, Chris still had feelings for his former girlfriend. She had always been this nice normal girl, but the fame had corrupted her. That's why he hated seeing stories like this. He knew that the good girl he fell in love with still had to be in that red-headed hoe somewhere. "I can't take this anymore! I have to do something", said Chris. "Like what?" asked Tyga, "Keep her locked away so she can't do nothing but love you?"

"Exactly", responded Chris "That's a great plan Tyga. If I keep R out of the public eye, than she wouldn't be tempted to act like this. I could make her a good girl again. The only one she'll be naughty for is me. Yes, why didn't I think about this before?" "You know I was just joking, right", said Tyga. "That plan is crazy. And even if it wasn't, Rihanna would never agree to being locked away. And if she went missing, everyone would think you did it anyway". "Yeah, your right." said Chris, "So I guess I'll just have to kidnap her. She might resist at first, but she'll thank me in the long run. And they probably will think I did it, so I'll just have to keep her at your house". "MY HOUSE!!!", Tyga yelled in surprise, "No no no no no! I ain't letting you keep her at my house. How am I supposed to make it nasty with some Stockholm Syndrome bitch in my crib? Nah, I ain't having no part in yo crazy ass plan. You my boi, but I ain't 'bout to go to jail for dis shit." "Come on Tyga, you gotta help me. I'd do the same fo you. You my best friend. Please?", Chris said with a puppy dog look on his face. "Fine, but you owe me big time", said Tyga, "You better know what you gonna do. I don't want my name on no half-baked crime. If we gon' kidnap the hoe, you betta make sho nuttin' go wrong." "Don't worry mane, errythang gon' go smoothly. We just gotta make sho she no longer wanna show her body off like she do now".

"How? Are we gonna make her fat so her self confidence goes down and is only willing to show her body to you, who will be giving her positive reinforcement about how you love her no matter what she look like the whole time", said Tyga, chuckling a little at his joke. "Exactly, that's perfect! Where do you come up with these genius plans homie?" said Breezy. "Ow dammit! Not again"

What do they do next?
