122211.content:
The plan was simple. Tyga would invite Rihanna over for dinner. Tyga was friends with Drake, so it really didn't seem that out of place. He would prepare a five-star meal with a massive amount of ground up sleeping pills. As she at the food, she would begin feeling tired. She would either fall asleep at the table or ask to for a place to lay down. When she fell asleep, Chris and Tyga would carry her down to the basement, which was beautifully set up. There was a king sized bed with satin sheets, a 82" flat screen tv, an X-Box 360, and a mini-fridge stocked with soda and other unhealthy treats. The best thing about though, was that there were no exits. No windows and the only door led back upstairs and was locked from the outside. Chris' plan was to make Rihanna lazy and fat. He figured with nothing but food and entertainment, it wouldn't be hard. Rihanna had never seen Tyga's basement before, and therefore wouldn't know where she was. Chris would tell her they were were in the middle of nowhere and that no one would come to save her. This would add to helplessness. Now all they had to do was invite Rihanna over.

Later that night around 8:00...

Tyga gets up to answer the doorbell while Chris finished up in the kitchen. "Oh, hey Rihanna. What's up?", said Tyga, trying to be as nonchalant as possible even though he was extremely nervous."Hello Michael. Thank you for inviting me over. Maybe this will be the perfect chance for us to get to know each other better"' said Rihanna in her adorable Caribbean accent. "Maybe. Well let's get started. Don't want the food to get cold"

The two chatted over dinner. They were having a really good time. Until Rihanna started getting tired. "Yawn, thank you for the meal Michael, but I think I need to lay down for a little bit", said Rihanna. "Fo sho, fo sho. You can lay on the couch if you want. It's hella comfy." "Thank you". And within the minute, Rihanna was unconscious. That's when Chris came in.

"Aight, let's get to work", said Chris, "Help me get he downstairs". "Fine, but I'm still not comfortable with this", said Tyga. "Shut up and grab her legs".
The two carried Rihanna down the stairs onto the California King in the basement.

Rihanna woke up 11 hours later in a daze. "Where am I", she said to herself. She was scared. She was on an unfamiliar bed in a room that looked like it was decorated by a flamboyant Persian Prince. Even though she was scared she was also kind of hungry. This also could have been brought on by the smell of cooked meat and fried potatoes. She looked around the room and discovered a McDonald's bag sitting on a tacky gold-plated coffee table. She ran over to it. She practically ripped the bag apart. Inside, she discovered a plethora of greasy food. Two large French fries, two Angus Deluxe burgers, two large vanilla milkshakes, and a twenty piece box of McNuggets. While her body was begging her to stuff her face, her mind was telling her otherwise. She still had know idea where she was or why she was here. She should probably figure that out. But the hunger was so strong.

What should she do?
122211.title: The two start going through the plan

choices: Tyga with a tray of food
1222111.content:
Rihanna's judgement was being clouded by her hunger. She decided to eat first, and ask questions later. After all, she had all the time in the world to figure out where she was, while her food was already getting cold.

She ripped into the meal like a woman possessed. She had never been this hungry before. She was shoving handful after handful of greasy, salty fries into her gaping maw. After she finished the fries, she started on her first third-lb. burger. Biting into it, the rich juices began to run down her face onto her skimpy cheetah-print top. "This is delicious", Rihanna said to herself though a mouthful of fast food. "Why don't I eat this stuff more often".

When she finally finished a half an hour later, she was stuffed. She kicked her feet up on the couch and rubbed her swollen belly slowly with her right hand, while holding a nearly empty McFlurry cup in the left. "Oh my God", she moaned, "I can't believe I ate so much. I feel so bloated". With that she let out a quick yawn. "Maybe I should take a quick nap to sleep this off?", she said as she slowly slipped into a food-induced slumber.

Meanwhile...
Chris and Tyga watched the live feed on the monitor. They were both surprised by how much Rihanna ate. "Now I know why her thighs so thick", said a slack-jawed Tyga. Chris simply nodded in agreement. When they were dating, Rihanna had always eaten healthy and in small quantities. That's why he never understood why her thighs looked like Christmas hams. "I guess she always hid her appetite, trying to keep fit. When the food's just in front of her and she's hungry, she can really put it away".

Two Hours Later...
Rihanna woke back up. She was no longer hungry and started thinking clearly. R decided to investigate her situation. "Hello!", she yelled to apparently nobody. "Is anybody there?" Without getting an answer, she looked around the area that looked like a genie's basement. There were all kinds of things lying around: a blue ray player with all her favorite movies, a hot tub, a fully stocked bar, etc. She was about to turn on the tv when she heard a door open. She looked up the stairs and saw...
1222111.title: Eat the food

123.content:
And how should the lovely Ms. Perry find herself gaining this weight, hmm?

She’s got plenty of free time on her hands, and no doubt with her kind of money she’s got more than a few personal trainers to help her keep that dancing body of hers. That combination isn’t exactly kind to the purpose of this interactive, now is it? So, let’s say that something… vanished from that equation. If only for a little while.

Katy could find herself without a trainer for a while, or perhaps she’d be too busy touring to properly watch her calorie intake and exercise output? Why, a few weeks on tour without much supervision is really all it would take to ruin lots of hard work establishing a girl’s self-control. Hey, just because she’s famous doesn’t mean she can’t enjoy Taco Bell like everyone else, does it?

Or, alternatively, she could find herself the subject of some bizarre revenge scheme. Being famous has its downsides, haters being most prominent among them. For no good reason, people just seem to hate hate, hate these days—don’t think Katy Perry isn’t among those caught in the fire. However a lot of disrespect often comes in the form of fellow celebrities.

Who would do such a thing? Someone out to steal the spotlight from the newly divorced diva? Or perhaps someone who just isn’t that much of a fan of hers in the first place? Through wily schemes and underhanded trickery (along with some bribery and some shameless flattery) almost anyone with enough stake in the matter could plump our pop princess up into a pop parade float!

Of course these are merely suggestions. If you can think of something else that may cause one Katy Perry to expand exponentially, I’ll leave the third option open for you…
123.title: Katy Perry

1231.content: One day katy was really hungry. She ordered 5 pizzas and 10 bags of breadsticks. She knew this was gonna make her gain weight but she didn’t care. At last she got her food and ate it really fast. Katy then heard rip noises and she looked down and her tight jeans are in shreds and her tummy was really big. She ran out of food and tried to stand up to get all the donuts her fans sent her. It wasn’t a easy task for a big piggy like katy she was sweating a lot just taking steps her belly was touching her knees! And when she got to the donuts she grabbed a big box of donuts And ate them all. And then her belly grew massive these weren’t normal donuts they were weight gain donuts. Katy couldn’t get up she weighed over 900 pounds she only had a really tight bra and almost fully ripped panties. “I need more” katy rolled herself the donut table and knocked over the table and then her huge feast begins! **8 months later** Katy was still eating in the same spot! She was naked and was a huge blob!! her house was under her belly and so as many houses.. katy was over 100k pounds! She was still hungry tho and she ordered 1000 tubes feed her and they fed her over 999999 million calories of food per second! She was bigger then the earth. “Oh my god im so big and i i love it so much i love my big belly its so flabby and huge!
1231.title: Laziness/Overeating

choices: Katy gets so fat she wears an asteroid belt
12311.content:
Katy Perry had managed to gain so much weight that she had literally outgrown the entire planet. She was now floating in outer space, a gigantic planet-sized blob of fat. However, despite having gained over 50 quintillion tons, she was still extremely hungry and had an intense desire to get even fatter. The only problem was that she had consumed every single morsel of food on Earth and then some, leaving her without a single bite to eat.

"Great, now I'm going to starve," she thought sadly upon realizing her current predicament. She attempted to pat her hungry belly but her arms were nowhere near long enough, causing her whole body to just sort of float-jiggle in the nothingness of space.

Suddenly, an alien spaceship landed on her just a few feet away from her face. Two green aliens with almond-shaped eyes walked out and looked around in amazement.

"What kind of planet is this?" one said to the other.

"How odd," said the second alien as he poked and prodded at Katy's flesh. "The surface appears to be comprised of some sort of pink squishy substance."

"HEY!" Katy yelled at them. "I'm not a planet! I'm a woman!" The two aliens suddenly turned around to see Katy Perry's massively obese face glaring at them.

"How fascinating!" the first alien exclaimed. "A living organism has over consumed enough quantities of nutrients to become its own planet! I never imagined such a thing was possible, what a discovery!"

"I told you, I'm NOT a planet!" Katy insisted. "But hey, as long as you're here, you guys wouldn't happen to have any food would you? I could really go for a football stadium sized birthday cake right about now." Katy bit her lip as she began lightly drooling at the mere thought of food.

The two aliens looked at each other for a moment, then took an aside and began whispering to each other out of earshot. After about a minute they both nodded in agreement and turned back to Katy.

"As a matter of fact ma'am, we could use your help with an experiment."

"How could I possibly help you? I'm literally too fat to do anything but eat."

"Oh, that will not be a problem." One of the aliens quickly went back inside the spaceship to fetch what appeared to be a small mechanical device. Upon activating it, it became apparent that the device was actually a food generating machine. The machine began rapidly producing huge amounts of extremely fattening cakes, pies, donuts, cupcakes, and everything else imaginable and force feeding them to Katy as she sat in blissful gluttony. The food was all so fattening that Katy began rapidly expanding again. It had become clear that the nature of the aliens' experiment was to see how fat they could make her, but Katy didn't mind. Frankly, she was curious herself.
12311.title: Planet Katy

choices: Russel Brand: out for the sweet satisfaction of watching Katy's career fail
Zooey Deschanel: looking to "differentiate" between the two of them
Some other people. Because Third Option.
1232.content: Sooo... who exactly would be doing the plotting?
1232.title: Sadistic Plots!

choices: Zooey sticks herself to Katy like glue, intent on finding a way to make her fat!
Rather Zooey hires a professional saboteur to do her dirty work...
12322.content:
Katy Perry and Zooey Deschanel look an awful lot alike, don’t they?

I mean, I’m just being honest when I say this, but they really do. They’re both pale, with black hair and big eyes. For the most part, about 60% of their face consists of their bangs anyway—who’s to say that they aren’t the same person? I

Well, Zooey namely. One can imagine that having a much more successful celebrity doppelganger can be stressful when one is a celebrity herself. In all of Katy’s “accept yourself for who you are” and dying her hair all the time, Zooey’s general quirkiness and playing of the ukulele must often go overshadowed!

There’s only… what, one picture of the two of them together? Honestly, it’s like a bad episode of the Twilight Zone!

However… if there was some way for Zooey to distinguish herself from Katy, make it easier for the media masses to differentiate between the two of them, she may get more limelight. Better movie deals, more sitcom appearances, better commercials…

Well the most obvious answer must be staring her in the bangs: Katy Perry would have to be the one to change, not her!

After all, she was just fine! She wasn’t in the tabloids every other day with rumors about Rob Pattinson and the oh-so-old story about a divorce from Russel Brand. It was obvious that Katy was the one who needed a good adjustment—no, not her, she was right on track. Even still, her name in all those headlines must burn poor Zooey to cinders!

But what if, stay with me now… Katy Perry got really fat?

It solves all of her problems right there; Zooey gets to keep asking Siri if it’s raining and playing in B Movies while slowly becoming the cutest thing in the media while Katy blows up like a balloon…

—hey, the whole “plus-size” thing works for Adele. Don’t judge.
12322.title: Totally Looks Like...

choices: "Nah, I'm good." Drat! Zooey has to get this girl to eat if this is gonna work!
"There's food back here?" Katy eats, but Zooey has to make sure she eats ENOUGH
123221.content:
“So… what is this tour anyway?”

Katy Perry, superstar supreme, had been very surprised when FOX had practically bought her right out from under her own nose. Her agents had told her the news one day, that she was going to become something of a spokesperson for the network. Given her recent success, all her albums and how often she was in the news these days, she shouldn’t have been surprised that someone somewhere was going to pick her up while she was still buyable.

She just didn’t think it’d actually happen.

Or that she would someday belong to FOX

But, much to her surprise, it had all been very tame. A few commercials, a few guest spots on a few shows that brought in what few ratings they could. Voice shots on the Simpsons, Family Guy, nothing too extreme.

But when they announced that they would be putting her on tour of America for the next few months, Katy objected. They practically uprooted her life with a strongly worded, very binding contract. If she weren’t obligated, there would have been no way in Hell that she would have agreed to this.

“You know, just the usual.” Her opening act and travelling companion for the next six months answered in an aloof too-quirky-for-this attitude, “At least you get company backing. That’s why my CD failed. ‘Cause FOX wouldn’t pony up the dough.”

“I thought it was because you and that guy—“

“No, no, it’s cool don’t worry about it.”

Zooey Deschanel was going to be bunking with Katy Perry for the next six months, which seemed like a dream. Not because of any starry-eyed syndrome she might catch from Katy’s glance. Honestly, just the opposite.

She had pulled some strings, using ‘New Girl’ and the money it had brought in the network for a serious favor. She’d pursued music before independently with a (now ex) fiancé, but given how that turned out it would have been a real risk for FOX to market the suddenly musical-again Zooey Deschanel on her own.

So she asked them to put her with Katy Perry, so she could be her opening act.

There were rules though! Zooey had to have her new favorite catering company stock the bus full of food. Which was cool, considering it was a lot cheaper than what FOX had in mind. Katy didn’t seem to care enough to object, which would ultimately (hopefully) come back to bite her in her soon-to-be fat ass.

“So you’re um… Zooey, right?” Katy asked from her seat in the back of their tour bus, “We’ve met before?”

“Yeah but… I’m like, a big fan and… you know.” Zooey said, feigning awe, “It’s really cool of you to let me be your opening act.”

“Hey, not a problem.” Katy said dismissively, “I’m just glad I get a roomie for the next few months. I thought for sure they would have just locked me back here with nothing but my phone and a microphone.”

“Yeah, that’s FOX.” Zooey laughed nervously, “So, um, hey have you eaten?”
123221.title: Foxy Lady

1233.content:
Well then Darling, perhaps something else will suit your tastes!

Perhaps she's trying to make a new image for herself...

Or maybe a concert tour with a new theme?
1233.title: Other Options

choices: She wants to change her image.
124.content: What will cause T-Swift to gain some much needed curves?
124.title: Taylor Swift

choices: Taylor's sweet tooth gives in and she agrees.
1241.content:
"What do you mean I need a new image?" Taylor Swift asked her manager confused.

"Well our polls have shown that your more adult songs and persona has actually caused you to lose fans, and as such we have decided to switch back to a sweeter image while still keeping your adult edge." Her manager explained methodically.

"Uhhh, okay but how what exactly are you planning" Taylor asked intrigued.

"We have gotten ourselves a new sponsor to help sweeten your image, and of course there is nothing sweeter than candy?" Her manager responded. "As such you are now sponsored by Chocoholic. The terms of this deal is that in return for their help in improving your public appeal, you will be obligated to promote their products."

"I... Uhhh... Don't really know if this is a good move for me." Taylor said with hesitation.

"Did I mention you would get an unlimited supply of Chocoholic products as part of this deal?" Her manager added with a slight grin.
1241.title: New Sponsor. Now 20% Sweeter

choices: Rick tells her he's being strongarmed by the chocolate-industrial complex.
Rick lets it drop, but Chocoholic steps in to get her hooked.
12412.content:
Taylor perked up at that, but kept her resolve.

"First off, Rick, you know I can just buy all the chocolate I want if I wanted to, I just don't because you know I'd get enormous if I indulged as much I'd want to. Second, well, the second point is really that, too."

"Taylor, you have no idea how much money this could make us. Chocoholic is like the Monsanto of candy, their products are in everything. You know they own Hersey now? And they're releasing their own name-brand products under their company label and they want a big push. This could make us a fortune."

"What, and my singing isn't doing that already?"

"I get it, you're an artist and you don't want to sell out. But don't think of this as selling out, think of it as . . . sweetening the pot," he chuckled, but Taylor now looked more annoyed than ever.

"No way. I'll endorse a product, sure, but not candy. I don't think it'll help my image and I'm certainly not going to be tempted by all the chocolate in the world."

Rick grimaced. He thought she would be more pliable to the idea. Of course, she wasn't quite aware of how many millions he alone would make on the deal, that the Chocoholic big wigs apparently spent months on deciding who would be the perfect celebrity endorser and, according to them, it was Taylor Swift. And when these people decided they wanted something, they got it. They were peculiarly hard nosed businessmen considering they worked in the candy, and he knew from looking into them that they could devious, evenly viciously so, in furthering their aims. If Rick couldn't convince Taylor to sign on voluntarily they made it clear to him that they could get her to go along in other ways. Other less savory ways that Rick wasn't entirely sure were. He knew that back in the 80s they had gotten some long-forgotten celebrity to endorse one of their early lines by using a criminally addictive chocolate bar to keep her hooked. But he didn't rally know that, it was just a rumor among business people. It seemed unlikely anyways. But still . . .

Rick may not be the most honest guy in the music business, but he at least liked to be mostly honest most of the time.

"All right, Taylor. What would convince you to agree to this promotion?"

"Rick, you should know me enough that if an unlimited chocolate supply won't then nothing will," she smirked at him. "And why are you pushing for this so hard? We're doing great, my albums are selling less than they used to, but my concerts are always a full stadium. What gives? Do you owe them money or something?"
12412.title: Not for all the chocolate in Chocolania

choices: Taylor hogs the truffles, eating them all by the end of the night.
Taylor's feeling generous, and Sarah winds up eating the rest without thinking.
124122.content:
Rick sighed. Clearly this wasn't going anywhere. If he pushed any harder right now Taylor might go into full-blown I'm-not-selling-out-to-the-man, man! mode. He threw up his hands.

"Hey, you're the boss, Taylor. But I think you should think about it, okay?"

"Okay, fine, I'll keep it in mind," Taylor said, having no intention of doing so. She left to go home, leaving Rick alone to worry about the next call from this company. He wasn't used to such an insistent client, especially one that ostensibly dealt in such an innocent product. But Rick knew better. He knew what they might be capable of. For the time being, though, he let it drop from his mind, too. There were plenty of other celebrities they could go after before they got around to trying to woo Taylor Swift again.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------

When Taylor arrived home, a delivery truck was leaving. She approached to the door to see her maid and housekeeper Sarah holding a large, flat, circular box wrapped in brown paper with a note on it.

"Hey, who's that from?" Taylor perked up. She loved getting gifts in the mail, and the mysterious round shape of this one intrigued her.

"I don't know. He just showed up and dropped it off."

Taylor looked at the note, and then rolled her eyes with an exaggerated sigh. She tore it off and showed it to Sarah with a smirk.

"From your friends at Chocholic," Sarah read, still holding the box. "Don't they make pretty much all the chocolate?"

"Yeah, yeah, they're some big important company and they want me to endorse them," Taylor sauntered past Sarah inside, dropping her purse on a table by the door and tossing her jacket onto a hook. Sarah followed.

"It smells wonderful," she said.

"Sure it does, but I don't want to be the spokesperson for some candy company. I mean, come on, I'm Taylor Swift." She motioned for Sarah to put the box on the coffee table as they made their way into the spacious living room.

Taylor sniffed the air. It did smell wonderful. Intoxicating even. She could only imagine what it'd smell like when it was open. Gingerly, she unwrapped the package and found a large, three-foot radius box with a glossy brown cover. She unwrapped the ribbon and opened it. Both Taylor and Sarah smiled at the aroma that rose from the open package. The chocolates, all bite-sized truffles, were arranged in a spiral leading to a larger white chocolate piece in the center.

"They sure know how to get a girl's attention," Taylor said. "But I'm still not going to endorse them."

She slowly placed the first piece in her mouth, intending to chew it quickly and have it at that. But she couldn't just swallow it.

"Mmmmm!" she mumbled in surprise. High-end candy could be good, she knew full well, but this was unlike anything she'd had before. The taste filled her mouth even before she bit down, and then it only grew stronger, but not overpowering. It was sweet, with just the right amount of bitterness, that she felt she could eat the whole box and not get sick of them.

Sarah, meanwhile, stood by, looking with desire at them. She was an even bigger health nut than Taylor--when your employer had a reputation for being thin and beautiful it would be bad for your work life if you didn't look good right next to her-but even she could hardly resist them.
124122.title: A chocolate trap

choices: Taylor is having more minor problems of her own.
1241222.content:
With a strange feeling of foreboding Taylor picked up another truffle and popped it in her mouth. It was cherry, unlike the fully chocolate last one, and tasted even better. She savored it, rolling it around on her tongue before finally biting into it.

"Mmm, if I keep this up I might change my mind," she joked. She reached for another one and, with more willpower than she would have thought she needed, held her hand back. She looked to Sarah's eager eyes. She was older than Taylor, and shorter, but pretty and almost as thin, and Taylor knew that Sarah worried about her figure as much as she did. She couldn't imagine her looking at any food with that kind of desire.

"Here, you can have them. I'm done," Taylor said, pushing the box towards her as she strode away. "I'll be upstairs. Make sure things are straightened up, the girls are coming over tonight."

"Always do," Sarah said. "And thanks, these look wonderful."

Taylor waved pleasantly. She wasn't sure why, but something about those chocolates made her uneasy. It was party just how unnaturally delicious they were, yes, but the stranger thing for her was her own reaction. She really did want to pig out on the whole box of them right there. No, Taylor had more will power than that. She didn't keep her tall, slim body looking perfect by giving into every craving she had. It took work. Right now, Taylor headed for the kitchen to grab something healthier to snack on, maybe some fruits or vegetables.

Sarah took a truffle, immediately understanding why Taylor had such a vacant, nearly orgasmic look on her face as she ate them. But Sarah did not have Taylor's willpower, or metabolism, and she couldn't help but reach for another, and then another.

She sat down, shaking a little, as she took a fourth, then a fifth. Her hands moved around the spiral as she ate, moaning with pleasure, glancing over her shoulder to make sure Taylor wasn't coming up behind her. She was a good housekeeper, and good company, so Taylor wouldn't fire her for indulging like this, but it'd be embarrassing nonetheless. In her grumpier moods Taylor would sometimes imply Sarah must have trouble staying thin "at her age." At her age! She might be on the other side of thirty but wasn't close to forty yet.

Sarah moaned and rubbed her stomach. It felt warm and tingly, the satisfying fullness filling her. Fullness? From a few chocolates? she wondered. But it was more than a few by now. She had gone through a dozen, the whole outer rim of the box empty as she quickly made her way to another lap. That first delectable taste had grown constant in her mouth and she didn't want it to stop. She kept eating, one after another, her hands working in perfect unison. Smacking her lips and moaning with pleasure with every bite, she was eating faster now. In the distance she heard Taylor walking around, and it brought her back to reality a little bit.

This is making me a little bloated, she thought with a grimace as her hand graced her stomach through her form-fitting buttoned blouse. I'd better stop. And these are so good there's no way they're not the most fattening thing in the world. But, just one more, and maybe one more after that . . .

Her equally flattering slacks felt somewhat restrictive up front and she knew why. She was stuffing herself with so much chocolate she would actually look full from it. This wouldn't do, she knew, she had more self control than that. And yet, she couldn't stop. The thought struck her first as curious, then worrisome then, as the distinct feeling of a shirt getting too snug around her middle came over, as panic inducing.

Sarah grunted between her moans and held her stomach, although that didn't stop her other hand from feeding her against her will. This was getting out of control, she told herself. She felt her stomach getting tighter, full under her hands. The waistband of her slacks, tight to begin with on her svelte body, grow uncomfortable. Come on, she told herself, that's enough. You've eaten half the box in five minutes, don't you think you've filled your calorie quota for the month by now? She was pleading with her body to stop. Beads of sweat formed on her forehead as her expression, once the same vacantly pleasurable expression that Taylor had briefly worn, turned into one of panic.

She gasped and jumped back as the button on her slacks popped open. She couldn't believe how she could be getting this full, even if her eyes told her she was nearing the end of the box. Her stomach felt round and hard under her hand. It started forcing the buttons her shirt apart, just a little, but enough that her taut skin was visible. She'd be worried about the stomach she'd have later if she wasn't so worried about how this was happening to her.

"Schtop," she said out loud, her mouth full, but she didn't. She just kept on, her stomach groaning from being so full, so heavy. Looking down between chews she could very plainly see how it poked out, round and hard like a woman in her early pregnancy, even obscuring her open button.

"Stop it!" she said louder this time, more clearly, nearing the end of the box. She was scared now, not just for what this would do to her diet, but that something outside of her power was controlling her, forcing her to do this. She panted, rubbing her belly, praying that she'd get to the end soon. She didn't have long to wait. A single button from her blouse popped off, just over her tightly stretched naval as she reached the last chocolate. Just as soon as it began, the hunger left her, leaving in its wake a sick, bloated feeling. She fell back on the couch with a moan.

Sarah tried to catch her breath but was still too panicked to truly calm down. Not yet, not with a belly full of chocolate in her hands. Without the dulling taste and scent she could now more fully feel the weight of it in her, the pain of a stomach stretched too tight with too much sweets.

That's when she noticed the last larger piece. Leaning forward with a sense of utter helplessness, she picked up that center piece and ate it as quickly as she did the others. Her belly moaned in protest. Her zipper forced its way down as she leaned forward to read what was written under it.

"To our dear Taylor, a box of chocolates as round as you could hope to be."
1241222.title: The help needs help helping herself

choices: Taylor gets a mysterious call from Chocoholic before they can leave.
Taylor takes Sarah to the hospital, then goes to see her agent.
12412221.content:
Sarah's first thought upon looking at the notes were that the chocolates were drugged, drugged to be either really addictive or to turn off the part of your brain that tells you to stop eating. Probably both, she thought. Her swollen stomach was proof enough of that. She gripped it tightly, it growled and churned under hands. She heaved herself up, forcing the zipper of her slacks down further as she did so. Standing up, she thought she looked even more bloated than before. It was heavy, too, heavy than the box had been to begin with, she thought. With moans of protest from her stomach, Sarah went to find Taylor. She had to warn her. Sure, Taylor only had two and Sarah had had the rest, but who knew what the effects were?

Even if these were the only effects and nothing else happened, Sarah was angry. Angry at the company for sending what were most likely poisoned chocolates. Angry herself for giving into temptation and eating until she looked like a stuffed pig. Angry at Taylor for being able to stop after only two while Sarah took the full brunt of the "gift."

She steadied herself on a door frame as her stomach churned harder. She held it in her hand.

"Oooh, god, this can't be good," she said softly. She felt her stomach rumbling, despite being so full. Was that hunger or indigestion? At this point the two were probably the same.

Going up the stairs was a slow process, holding onto the railing and her stuffed and upset belly the whole time. She wasn't eager to have Taylor see her so bloated but certainly this would only be temporary, and things would be worse if she didn't warn her boss and kind-of friend.

"Taylor, where are you?" she said. Being so painfully full prevented Sarah from yelling, she found. The place was so huge she'd have to, though, if Taylor wasn't already walking towards her. Taylor was listlessly rubbing her own stomach as she did so. Sarah heard quieter, less intense groans coming from it, too.

"What's wron--oh, Jesus," Taylor said, her eyes going wide in surprise. "What happened to you?"

Sarah framed her bloated midsection in her hands and stood up as straight as she could.

"I couldn't stop myself. It was like I was on autopilot and my hands just kept stuffing them into my mouth," Sarah said. "Look at this!" She handed Taylor the note.

Taylor's face wavered between confusion and anger, much like Sarah, while she read it.

"What the hell does this mean?"

"I think-ooooh," another painful rumble escaped Sarah's stomach and she had to lean against the wall for a moment. "I-I think the chocolates were drugged."

"Drugged?" Taylor's hand hovered over her stomach. She felt a huge wave of relief that she had only had two, whereas Sarah was clearly the more effected. "The chocolates from Chocoholic were drugged? To make me eat them?" her voice went higher with rage as the full understanding swept over her. "I wouldn't sign a contract so they threatened me? Threatened me to stuff myself?"

It was such a weird concept that Sarah actually smiled despite her discomfort.

"Looks like it. Ooooh, god," Sarah sunk to the floor. Taylor helped her up. "How are you feeling?"

"Tummy's a little upset," Taylor said. "We're going to get you to a hospital--urp!--and then I'm going to have a chat with my agent and lawyer."

Of all the ways to get back at her, Taylor thought, this company chose one of the worst. And weirdest.
12412221.title: Better warn the boss

choices: Option 1: Whole lot of chocolate stuffing
124122211.content:
Sarah leaned against the wall, rubbing her swollen stomach tenderly. Taylor reached out to touch it.

"How do you feel?"

"Don't! Full, so full. And it hurts. It feels like something's inside me trying to get out," Sarah said. She burped a little, which Taylor did too much to her embarrassment.

"Let's go, maybe they can pump our stomachs or something," Taylor said, preparing to help Sarah walk.

Her phone rang. It was unknown number. Hesitantly, Taylor answered.

"Hello?"

"Hello, Ms. Swift. This is Deana Holland, the head of marketing at Chocoholic-"

"You! You sick bastards, what the hell do you think you're doing? You can't drug people! You can't get away with-"

"Ms. Swift, please hear me out," Deana said, completely calm. Taylor held the phone close to Sarah so they could both hear.

"I'm listening," Taylor said, her rage barely concealed.

"I take it you got our gift?" Taylor could hear the woman's arrogant smile even over the phone. "I hope you enjoyed. There will be plenty more where that came from."

"Yeah, I got it. I had two and gave the rest to my assistant, you-you assholes," Taylor stumbled, trying to come up with better attacks.

"Oh my, the poor woman," Deana said. "She must be quite uncomfortable."

"Bwooooorp," Sarah belched, covering her mouth to quiet it, but Deana's chuckle indicated she heard. Taylor went red. She had never been as furious.

"What was in those chocolates?" Taylor demanded.

"Well-"

Option 1: Addictive appetite stimulants. The two would be increasingly helpless to stop themselves from eating Chocoholic products, which would be delivered with increasing regularity, wherever Taylor is, until she signed on with them.

Option 2: Chemicals and nanites, allowing Chocoholic to control their appetite and metabolism at will. They could force them to stuff themselves nonstop, or could convert that food to fat in hours, or minutes in a pinch. They could even control where on their bodies the fat dominates.
124122211.title: Chocolate blackmail

choices: Taylor tries to restrain herself, but Sarah starts making some tempting meals.
Sarah regains her mind (for now), and has no idea what is happening.
1241222112.content:
"What was in those chocolates?"

“Well-” After 2 second pause, Deana chuckled slyly. “Ms. Swift. I really don't mind to tell you about what was in that, but you would probably not believe it.”

“Out with it. Now.” Taylor growled threateningly.

“We recently succeeded in developing some revolutionary nanites...I mean, unbelievably small robots or something like that. I don't know technical detail because I wasn't engaged in this project. Anyway, these nanites are originally for medical purposes...but the controlling of appetite and metabolism is widely applicable.”

“Contr-…What?”

"In brief, we Chocoholic can manipulate your hunger, stomach condition, and fat at will. Perhaps, your assistant can be controlled more easily as she ate the most of it. Okay, I will show you a demonstration..."

“Oh *Beeeellch* oohhh…” Sarah suddenly moaned in a weird tone. Taylor looked her in the face and noticed her eyes are getting somewhat dully.

“Y-you okay, Sarah?”

Deana’s voice was still heard from the phone, like a mantra. "We can let you starve as we please…hungrier and thirstier than you can expect…"

“I feeel fu-funny…*hic!*…like I, I…”Sarah slurred as she became increasingly emotionless. Her stomach started fiercely churning and sloshing.

“We can give you indigestion…you’ll get gassier than you can imagine…” Deana continued…

*PPHHHRRRRTTT!* Sarah was completely Mannequin-like blank look now, expelling large farts and burps again and again. Oddly enough, her overstuffed stomach started deflating and the fat was getting their positions on her other parts…especially breasts and hips.

“And as you see, we even can make your body more glamorous by the power of nanites...if you sign on with Chocoholic, of course.”

Taylor stared at Sarah as stunned. In just a few minutes, her maid got sexier body than that of her. There’s still an undigested food baby, but it was nothing to her voluptuous boobs and big butts. Sarah even started swinging her hips, provocatively but expressionlessly like a marionette.

“Sadly we don't hold your reins perfectly, Ms Swift. But nanites will prevent you to tell these secret to other person, save for your assistant who effectively became our drone. You can make an agreement with us and get more appealing style, or refuse it and get fat. Please decide for yourself.” Deana giggled. “I'll call you back tomorrow, or few days later. I hope for a good response. Bye.”

“Wait, you d-” Hereupon, Taylor felt a weird sense in the head, just like dizziness. “No, seriously, it can’t *hic* be real. Calm dow-*Grrooowwwll* uh, oh…” Taylor paled. She couldn't help admitting she was famished, getting more and more serious every second. “W-what should I do!?”
1241222112.title: Appetite and figure control

choices: Taylor gives in and devours the food
Taylor resists.  Her tormentors might have to get more creative
12412221121.content:
Taylor dropped her phone as her head spun. If her stomach still felt full from a mere two chocolates, that was now being overpowered by the ravenous hunger the nanites had turned on inside her. She wrapped her arms around her stomach and moaned as loudly as it growled. She stumbled into the wall and sank down, trying to gather her thoughts despite her dizziness.

"H-how is this even possible?" she stammered to Sarah. "Sarah? You feeling--'bwaaaarp!-okay?"

Sarah still looked stunned. Her blouse finally popped open around her chest, revealing her now hefty breasts shoved into her bra. She now had a great short, voluptuous figure, with wide hips and large, firm breasts. If Taylor had wanted a more curvy body they had made Sarah into a fine example, but Taylor didn't want that. She preferred her tall, slim figure, and she was certain that when Sarah came to her senses she would be as horrified by her changes as if they had just made her fat. Except that it didn't look like Sarah was going to come to, at least not now. She belched a few more times and rubbed her still full tummy.

"I'm fine, I-uurp-hic!-think," Sarah said dreamily. "Just a little gassy."

Pfffffft! Taylor turned her face away but Sarah only looked mildly uncomfortable. Taylor's own stomach was turning cartwheels inside her, growing more insistent in its demand for food.

"I-I need to do something. Gotta' call somebody, anybody," she picked up her phone and stared at it. She didn't dial. The numbers 9-1-1 came to her but she simply would not dial them. She stood up on her shaking legs and growled at her phone.

"What is wrong with me?" she screamed at the phone. Her stomach gurgled. "Hic-so hungry-hic . . ." she muttered, putting the phone back in her pocket. "Sarah, we-Sarah?"

Sarah was walking drowsily away. Taylor noticed her slacks had town along the back to make way for her larger rear.

"Sarah! Get back-hic!-get back here!"

When Sarah glanced back Taylor thought she looked worried, like she was walking somewhere in particular and did not like what she was going there to do.

"Just a little hungry," Sarah said, and went downstairs. The word 'hungry' put Taylor's already upset stomach into overdrive. She had to resist, she knew it. She saw first hand what these people could do. She couldn't even call the police.

Taylor would resist most food with little effort on a normal day, and convinced herself that even though her mind was now screaming at her to go and eat, she could fight those urges indefinitely. Since she was somehow being controlled to not call for help, her next idea was to see if she could find something about these people. Holding her stomach tightly she made her way to her computer. Her eyes were getting as blurry as he head was feeling, but she made a noble effort. She started looking up information on Chocoholic, and nanotechnology, and appetite stimulants, and after nearly a half hour she realized she was retaining nothing of what she was reading. She was hearing sounds coming from the kitchen, and ignored them. She started smelling things, too, delicious things, tempting things, and even these she was trying to ignore. Finally, she simply couldn't take it anymore. Too hungry to think straight, she did what seemed the safest thing to do--she tried to stand and fall back down, planting her face on her keyboard.

Grooooooallllllg?

With one arm tightly wrapped around her waist, and smiled. She was too weak with hunger to stand up. In bits and pieces the idea came to her that these Chocoholic people didn't think of everything. If she was too starving to get up and find food, who would they make her fat? She even laughed a little out loud to herself.

Then, a burst of some unidentifable, beautiful, enticing aroma came into the room followed by the door opening. Sarah walked towards her carrying what Taylor could only assume she had spent all this time making. Taylor squinted her eyes shut.

"Sarah, no," she said, "Please tell me you're yourself again?"

"I don't think I know that," Sarah said, her voice as dull and lifeless as before. Taylor believed that Sarah was trying to regain control, though, and so wouldn't give up hope that she was not just a complete drone like Deanna had said. "I made you a lasagna."

"A lasa-wait, since when do you know how-never mind! I don't want it!" Taylor said, refusing to open her eyes, but too weak and dizzy to get up from her chair. She sat up and took a deep breath, taking in the scent of Sarah's meal. She could swear she could already taste it.

"Why not?" was all Sarah said. She came closer with the dish. Taylor squirmed, her stomach squirming more.

"You know what's happened to us!" Taylor opened her eyes and saw the meal. It didn't look too fancy, or even that objectively what you would call good, but the starving Taylor it looked like the tastiest meal she'd ever laid eyes on. She layed her head back and moaned. Sarah placed the large, hot tray in her lap.

"Sorry," Sarah said, taking a few steps back. She said it mechanically, but now Taylor knew that yes, Sarah was still there. She clenched her fists and forced them down to her sides. There were probably enough calories in this one meal alone to do some damage, Taylor thought, and they could pinpoint that damage to the worst effect.

"Sarah, please, take this away . . ." Taylor whined. She hated herself for not being able to just flip it off her lap. Like dialing for help before, the will was there but her body refused to obey, and Taylor was afraid that if she let her arms go limp for even a second she'd lose control of them and find them stuffing her face. And once this one meal was done, there might be no stopping her from giving in.

But Sarah was gone. Taylor distantly heard her return to the kitchen, no doubt to make more fattening traps for Taylor at Chocoholic's request. It was just her, her stomach, and the lasagna at a stand off.
12412221121.title: Taylor's restraint

124122211211.content:
“Oh please…” Taylor gazed at the lasagna, feeling pretty desperate. It was too alluring to her. Its devious, tantalizing aroma was aggressively attacked her nostrils. Her arms went on her lap and raised the tray up, slowly and involuntarily. Sloppy but nice-smelling lasagna, enough for 3 people. Possibly a few more. Taylor closed her eyes and groaned; why did her past self decide to buy such large tray for guests? Why did Sarah agree with it?

Guuuurrrrrrggle…

Finally, Taylor caved in as her belly squirmed violently. She can't stand it any longer.

"One bite." She put the lasagna on computer keyboard, and picked up a spoon, mumbling aloud. "Just one bite can't hurt anyone." Then, she scooped up a small bit of it and ate.

Jusus, how delicious this is!!

For a few second, Taylor's rational thought was blacked out. Taking this opportunity, her body scooped a quite big bit and ate once again. Her thought blacked out again. She ate again. Taylor Swift was totally caught in the mire now.

NO!! Stop, don't be silly! Taylor intended to yell it, but her mouth was too busy to wolf down the lasagna. All she could do was to see this disgraceful scene from the point of view of a third party, feel her belly bloating that gets worse over time, and barely resist the seduction of Sarah (and Chocoholic)'s great dish. She even tossed the spoon to somewhere and started eating with her fingers.

Moaning and wiggling, Taylor turned away from the tray and attempted to stand up and escape. Her casual T-shirt already rose up on her distended belly, revealing her navel slightly. It's really bad. She thought. Never have I eaten so much...I'm about to explode and the tray is still half full! I'll end up becoming a mass of fat at this rate!

She successfully lifted her hips from the seat, but then her denim jeans' button snapped with a great force. It hit the table and rebounded on her forehead. "Ow!" She fell on the chair with a thud while her belly sloshed and churned with a joy of freedom from tight restriction.

C'mon, Taylor, cool down. Looking on the bright side, the tray is already half empty. This binge won't continue forever. Soon I'll polish it off. And...aaaaand......Sarah won't finish cooking next meal so fast, I suppose? Okay, maybe I'll get a time enough to escape and hide from her. I must not yield to feeling of fullness. Moving quickly before she comes. That's all.

"Beeeeeelch!" Rubbing her notably taut belly, Taylor burped loudly and munched at the rest of lasagna, faster and fiercer…

--------------------------

"Zzz...umm...Taylor, these fooooods...so...zzz..."

In the kitchen, Sarah was not-so-briskly working. Her head was nodding off and eyes barely open. Her tiredness is natural; she worked so hard today as the most reliable housekeeper of Taylor Swift, and then this abrupt mishap happened.

However, her slumber was allowing Chocoholic to almost-perfectly control her thought. Sarah grabbed next high-calorie meal - a lot of huge burritos - and tottered toward Taylor's room...

--------------------------

Option 1: Taylor and Sarah run around the Taylor's house. Taylor is able to hide herself from sluggish Sarah, but still has some problems: despite she is stuffed to the brim, she's still hungry. Thirsty, too. She must fight against both of Sarah and her own willpower.

Option 2: Same as described above, Taylor escapes the room and Sarah chases. Taylor is not hungry anymore, feeling exhausted from gorging. Instead, she gets rather gassy and gradually gains her weight.
124122211211.title: Just one scoop, maybe two. No, three or four...?

choices: Taylor makes it, still hungry, but at least outside.
Taylor can't go anymore, and once again gives into temptation.
1241222112111.content:
Taylor knocked the empty tray off her lap. She pounded her fist on her desk with a growl, then regretted it as the movement caused her overstuffed tummy to gurgle violently. She hunched over, her arms wrapped around her now taut, puffy stomach. She belched softly.

Sarah's still cooking. I can smell it. It smells so good . . . No! Taylor stood up, grabbing onto the desk for support while her arm still wrapped around her waist. It groaned in protest. She had been this stuffed before, and hated the feeling as much as she imagined she would. She already felt sluggish just from one full meal. Any more and she wouldn't be able to move.

Taylor walked to her door and leaned against the wall, listening to Sarah cooking downstairs. Pressed up against the wall she looked down to see her bloated stomach more clearly, and winced at the sight. She pressed her hands against it to soothe it, but it only growled at her.

Groooooooooorgle . . .

"Bwurp," Taylor covered her mouth to stifle another involuntary belch. It's going to be okay, she closed her eyes and told herself. It's only food, the thought burst onto her, for now. She remembered vividly the sight of Sarah's stuffed stomach turning into fat all over her body. Chocoholic thought that offering her a voluptuous hourglass figure instead of a fat one was the deal of a lifetime, but to Taylor both were options she didn't want. She loved her tall, lean body, and obviously a fuller, sexy figure would be better than a fat one, she'd rather stay as she was. But then again, Sarah was stuffed full of those nanites, whereas Taylor had eaten only regular food. If they could turn it into fat, it wouldn't be more than what it weighed, right?

She cupped her taut stomach in her hands and grimaced. It already feels like I ate a ton.

Then, she noticed the smell getting stronger, the sounds in the kitchen having ceased. Footsteps were coming up the stairs in her direction. Taylor had to think fast. Her tummy quivered disgustingly as the aroma began taking its hold on her. Rolling her eyes at herself, Taylor went and hid in the closet of the room just as Sarah entered.

Burritos, Taylor recognized the smell, her stomach gurgling in anticipation. She rubbed it, begging it to quiet down. Through the door she saw Sarah enter. She was sluggish and sleepy, her eyes half open. She walked into the room.

Taylor felt a little gassy burp building up inside her. She covered her mouth and let it go as quietly as she could.

Gruuuugle . . .

Taylor grabbed her stomach tightly. Sarah, the full plate of delicious, fattening burritos in hand, turned towards her.

Pleeease be quiet, she thought to her stomach. Sarah was about to leave, though, clearly not having enough mental power now to contemplate actually searching the room, when Taylor's body gave her away.

"Bwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaauuuuurp!" the only warning was a deep gurgle in her stomach before a massive, baritone belch burst forth from the usually dainty, ladylike Taylor.

"Shit," she said, seeing Sarah approaching the door. Thinking fast, Taylor opened it and, holding her hands over her mouth, rushed fast as past as she could. Just as she thought, Sarah could only turn slowly and dumbly as Taylor made her escape.

But it was a short victory. Taylor was out the door and into the hall when another deep, gassy feeling overtook her. She clutched at her stomach and doubled over.

"Ooh, come on," she said, nearly falling to the floor, "Not--uuuuurp!--not now!"

"Taylor, you have to eat these, I think," Sarah's dull voice was right behind her.

Taylor started feeling lightheaded with hunger again, her full stomach growling in demand for more food. Taylor turned to see Sarah coming out of the room. Taylor's mouth actually watered, her eyes glazing over, her head spinning.

"I think I-bwuuuurp-hic!--I had enough," Taylor backed away, "Hic!"

Every burp, every hiccup, caused Taylor's tight stomach to groan in discomfort bordering on pain. She tried to stay in control, focusing on that hateful stuffed feeling, how her shirt was riding up over her stomach, how she had actually eaten so much she popped a button off her jeans. If that wasn't motivation enough, Sarah in her torn slacks and open blouse were living proof of Chocoholic would do to her if she gave in.

Taylor began to back down the stairs away from the approaching burritos. Every step brought more hunger, more growling and churning from her stomach. If Sarah wasn't moving so slowly, she could easily have caught up with Taylor. Taylor would have given anything to just slump down and give in, but she knew she couldn't do that. If she could get to her front door, maybe she could escape. There were plenty of people to go for help. Not her agent. That bastard was probably in on it-no, he was definitely in on it. But she had friends, lots of them, and they'd be too glad to help her. In her addled brain she felt a twinge of fear in letting them see her in her bloated state, but she knew they wouldn't hold it against her.

"Taylor, please, just have a few," Sarah said as they neared the bottom of the stairs. Taylor was holding onto the rail for dear life now, her stomach nauseous and churning with hunger and lasagna. Still, shaking step by shaking step, she reached the bottom, while the slow-moving Sarah was only halfway down. She could be home free if she could just get to the door without collapsing.
1241222112111.title: An attempt to escape

choices: Taylor gets up, and is able to get to her car, away from Sarah!
It's no good, Taylor passes into a long food coma.
12412221121112.content:
Taylor thought she could make it. She backed onto the floor off the stairs, and Sarah followed, holding the burritos in front of her, her dull eyes pleading with Taylor. Taylor was shaking more now from hunger, hugging her stomach tighter as if that would stop it from growling at her. Her thoughts were scattered, her plan of escaping being overrun with the desire to eat. All rational thoughts that she was far too full, that she knew exactly what more food would do to her, were finally pushed out of her mind as Sarah moved the tray under her nose.

Grooooooor . . .

"Oooh," Taylor whimpered, and then fell to her knees shaking. Sarah bent now, her slacks tearing more along the sides as her fattened thighs poked through, and left the tray in front of her.

"Sarah, no," Taylor said softly, but she was unable to even turn her head as her housekeeper returned to the kitchen. She burped softly, and then dug in.

As her hands grabbed the first burrito she couldn't chew fast enough. She had half the thing in her mouth before she even swallowed, her stomach growling happily now, the discomfort momentarily dulled by the sheer pleasure food was bringing to her tongue, mind, and stomach. She moaned between bites, but it came out muffled as her cheeks were as overstuffed as her stomach was.

The second one was even easier. Taylor's rational mind tried to fight it, but right now giving into the hunger was her only concern, no matter how full her belly was getting. Oh, god, I must look like an absolute pig, she thought as the third burrito was somehow stuffed into her stomach. An absolute, stuffed, fat, bloated, horrendous pig, but the thoughts did nothing to convince those slender arms of hers from obeying her stomach's orders. By the fourth, she halted for but a second.

Pfffffffffffffffffft!

Taylor blushed as she noticed the gassy feeling for the first time. She took the opportunity toe brush off some meat and cheese that had fallen onto her bare stomach, and lick it off her fingers. She would have been much messier if not for the efficiency that she licked every ounce of food from every burrito clean from her hands and face as she ate. She went to take another bite and stopped as a deep rumbling insider her gut stalled her. She leaned forward, her mouth open wide, dropping the burrito with the others. Finally both hands were free and could grip her poor, bloated stomach. She had thought that 'bloated' and 'stuffed' were the same, but now she saw the difference, and she felt both at once. Taylor groaned. She didn't have to look to see her stomach was visibly more swollen than before, and this time not just with food, but with the unavoidable gas that came with such a meal.

Pffft! A little fart, and a few tiny burps failed to ease the pressure. She wrapped her hands around her rounded stomach, feeling bubbles form, gather, and pop inside of her amidst the already packed food. Her shirt rode up further as her stomach started to take on a rounder, rather than merely puffy, shape.

"Ooooh, stop already," she moaned to herself. "Just-bwuuuurp!-just stop!"

In the momentary lull she wondered just how much food Chocoholic would force her to eat before they sprang the first big show on her? Sarah had been full of nannites, so it was an easy matter for them to demonstrate how they could change her body, but Taylor would have to consume an inhuman amount of normal fattening calories for the same effect. Somehow, that almost made it worse. Taylor would have given anything to ease the pressure in her belly, to stop it from churning like that. She was bending forward as far a she could, breathing deeply, trying to regain control, when she once again felt herself being fed. She nearly screamed before realizing she was doing it herself.

And so Taylor continued, more slowly than before as nearly every bite had to be proceeded by a series of belches and hiccups, until the plate was licked clean. Taylor growled at herself as she licked it clean afterwards. Her stomach, a round, painfully hard dome, must have stuck out half a food or more from its normal flat shape. She leaned back, and then fell fully on her back with a giant belch. The hunger, finally, was satisfied, but replaced with a much worse feeling of being too full to move, too gassy to even turn to her side without it setting off an array of gas and food inside of her.

She craned her neck and gasped as she saw her belly beyond her small breasts. She rubbed the tender dome. She would jumped to her feet if she could when, after a series of stronger bubbling sensations inside of her rose to the surface, she saw a part of her stomach under stretched naval began to bloat, and then shrink back as she belched the gas out.

That was too much. She pushed herself up on her hands, finding it hard to bend in the middle. With some difficulty she was able to get to her knees again, and then fell forward on her hands, her belly hanging below her.

"You can do this," she said. It almost hurt to talk. Taylor closed her eyes and made a valiant effort to stand even with the full weight and discomfort of her belly stopping her.
12412221121112.title: Burrito pre-desert

choices: Her agent.  He has some explaining to do.
124122211211121.content:
Taylor took a deep breath and got to her knees. She grunted, belched, then held her taut belly in both hands while she stood. She wobbled, grabbing the stair railing to stay up. She stood up as straight as she could on such a full stomach, then tugged her shirt down to cover up most of her belly. After a few steps it started riding up again. With a frustrated growl she tugged it back down.

"I'll kill them," she muttered to herself, "Bweeeeeuuuurp!"

It wasn't actually that heavy strictly going by weight. But Taylor had eaten more food in a half hour than she normally ate in a few days, and all that food crammed together in her tiny stomach, pressing it out, being churned by unending gas, made it feel like Taylor had a fifty pound ball strapped to her middle. A few steps were enough to cause her to get short of breath. Still, she persevered. She had to, she knew. Nearly at the door, she faltered as more smells wafted past her. She closed her eyes and moaned with delight.

Oh, when did Sarah get to be such a good cook? Am I just so hungry that it smells so good? She started to turn, her body shaking as she did. With a forlorn look, her feet began to turn her around of their own accord, obeying her stuffed yet somehow starving stomach.

Pfffffffffft!

Taylor stopped, waking up, realized what she was doing. As fast as she could she strode to the door, grabbed her purse while making sure not to fall over, and stepped out the door. The warm summer air blew against her exposed and overly sensitive tummy. She rubbed it gently, looking around. It seemed too easy. Was this a trap?

They thought I'd be a mindless drone like Sarah! Taylor realized, both relieved and growing more furious than she had been before. They thought they'd be able to keep her eating mindlessly until they woke her up and showed her what they could do to her if she didn't give in. Well, thanks to Sarah, that wasn't going to happen. No, whatever they might have already forced her to eat, she'd make sure that was all they did. They might put a few pounds on her but it'd be nothing compared to what could have happened.

Normally Taylor would have had her chauffeur meet her at the door. Today, she thought it'd be best to get out of there herself. Partly it was out of not wanting to be seen by anybody in her state, although the anger she was feeling at Chocoholic surpassed what she was certain was a momentary lapse of her always perfect figure. If she could get out of this without having any photographs being taken and only a few people seeing her, she'd be happy, but seeing as how she was already intent on taking down the entire company she had no illusions about any of this being secret. But until then, she would take herself. The walk proved more difficult than usual on such a full stomach. It growled constantly the further she got from the house, and the belches were strong enough that several time she had to stop walking while they passed, only to find her speed then hampered by hiccups which caused all her stomach muscles to tighten around the enormous lump of food she had eaten, which only caused more belching and farting and so on.

She was glad to get to her car, glad to sit down and start it up. She felt in control again despite the noises her belly was making. She scowled at it and gave it a rub before leaving. She knew exactly where she would go first. Somebody who might understand what was happening even if Taylor was incapable of explaining.
124122211211121.title: The slow escape

choices: It's just gas, Chocoholic bides their time, for now.
It's digestion, and the first few pounds are turning to fat before her eyes
1241222112111212.content:
There were few people Taylor could fully trust at the moment. She had plenty of friends, many of them good and trustworthy people for the most part, but this was an extraordinary situation. There was a lot of tension between young, famous people in the public eye. She hated to think about people she liked, but too many of them wouldn't be able to resist the temptation of taking her down a few pegs and up a few pounds. It would be like inviting your poor friends over and leaving a big book of all your banking information out in the open, she thought.

Groooooeeergle . . .

"Ooh," she grabbed her bloated stomach as a particularly bad internal movement hit her. She was feeling hungry again.

Taylor thought, or hoped, that Selena might be one of the few people that would actually help her. She would be able to find a way to explain what was going on. At the very least, if Selena simply couldn't do anything to really help, she would at least not make it worse. Selena had suffered at the hands of the Hollywood press in the past for her weight. It's not that ever gained a lot, but she looked after body a lot less than Taylor did, and she was shorter so any weight she did gain showed up faster.

Taylor felt a surge of anger when she realized that now she might be another celebrity with phrases like "GAINED TWENTY POUNDS" and "CAN'T STOP EATING!" plastered over her image in the tabloids.

She somehow made it to Selena's place without stopping to eat. She thought maybe being so full the Chocoholic people would have trouble making her as hungry as she was before. She pulled past the guardhouse and was let in. Parking her car, she felt another bubbling feeling inside. She rubbed her stomach and moaned, unable to stop another belch from erupting from her, shaking her whole body. She tugged at her shirt, trying to get it mostly covered. Now that she was about to see her friend she was dreading doing so with a belly like this. But it had to be done.

Her phone rang, a hidden number showing up. It was Chocoholic.

"Hello?" Taylor said.

"You left your home, Taylor," came that too calm voice from before, Diane. "And Sarah is preparing a really lovely meal."

"Go to hell," Taylor said. "Bwuuuurp!" she covered her mouth despite being alone.

"We can do this your way, Taylor," she said. "Go home and think about our offer. We can make this very unpleasant for you."

"Unpleasant? Nothing could be more unpleasant than this! You don't even know what you're doing! This is it for you psychos!" Taylor yelled, growing angrier, clutching at her bulging and now swirling stomach. "I will-uuuurp!-destroy you!"

Diane chuckled. "A little melodramatic, aren't we?"

Taylor hung up with a huff. She rested her hand on her stomach. It felt as hard and tight and round as before, but it had grown active again in the last few minutes. She started to worry that maybe she underestimated them before, that maybe they could do a lot of harm to her body even with just a fraction of the intended nanites within her. Taylor felt a quivering feeling inside her.

"Oooh," she cooed uncontrollably, "Oooow-hic!"

The pain in Taylor's stuffed stomach grew. She gripped it, hunched over as much as she could behind the wheel of her car. She felt an odd sinking feeling deep inside her. Then, she felt her stomach shrink in a quick burst.

"Urk!" she jolted upright, still holding her stomach. She could feel something moving under her skin, emanating from her stomach throughout her body. It was a warm, pulsating feeling, an almost tightening . . .

Tight? Taylor yanked her hands from her stomach and twisted around. Her jeans were getting tighter. She felt her hips straining, her thighs pushing together. She spread her legs, grabbing at her long, slim legs with her hands as suddenly her legs filled out before her eyes. She screamed as she watched her hips widen, a small bit of flab oozing out over her jeans, her zipper rolling down a little from her stomach. But she could feel her jeans being pulled back as well, and twisted to see her tiny, gorgeous ass bulge outward. She screamed again as she grabbed it. It was soft, and round.

Before Taylor could even get out of that awkward position her stomach jolted inward again, and this time she felt the warm, filling sensation go up her sides. It was nearly as prominent as in her hips and ass, but she saw her sides fill out just slightly, her shirt growing tight around the side as it was around the front. In the position she was in, she now felt this little bit of flab folding in on itself on her side, and she did not find it pleasant.

"Bastards!" was all she could think to yell as she fought back tears, both of rage and at the reality that her perfect figure wasn't so perfect anymore. She turned to sit normally and put on her stomach again. It was much smaller, but still full and rounded. Then it jolted inward again, this time returning to a flat, although soft shape.

"What? What else? What else is there?" Taylor panted. She couldn't imagine there was any food left in her. She bit her lip and moaned feeling the softness of her stomach now, the way it folded in somewhat when she slouched, how her shirt was now tight, how her breasts were now . . .

"Oh, come on!" Taylor yelled, feeling her breasts grow tender, feeling full, tight, then uncomfortable in her bra. She saw them swell outward under her shirt, stretching it out all around now as though it was meant to be formfitting rather than comfortably loose. They must have gone up a cup size, maybe two. Taylor didn't know. She was so used to her small chest that this was harder to take in even than her stomach no longer being lean and flat. She gently held them in her hands, wincing at their weight. She didn't have to look in a mirror to know that she was getting the same treatment as Sarah, although with less weight, and much less extreme on her tall figure. And she didn't like one bit of it.

She growled, banging on the side of her car, kicking the floor. He The seams of her jeans by her hips began to come undone at that.

"No no no!" she screamed, eventually devolving into an angry screech that she was surprised Selena didn't hear and come running out to see what was wrong.

No, she had to get moving. She couldn't wallow in self pity or rage. If she was going to get back to normal and stop them from doing even more to her she would have to hurry. She got out of her car, shuddering as she felt her stomach fold in on itself. She pulled her shirt down, buttoned her jeans back up even though they gave her a very obvious muffin top, and walked to Selena's house. Taylor couldn't suppress more shudders as she felt an unfamiliar chafing sensation between her legs, and a little up-and-down wobble from her tummy and breasts.

Then, there was the fact that she was very quickly growing hungry again. She realized that she had just been emptied out, and the bigwigs at Chocoholic wouldn't want to keep her empty for long. With a determined stance and a jiggle in her step Taylor entered her friend's home.

Taylor saw Selena first, who was coming from the back of the house to greet her. Despite herself Taylor almost teared up again. Selena looked so small and thin, in jeans and a formfitting buttoned blouse. Taylor grimaced and braced for her reaction.

"Hey, Taylor, want a dr--wooooah . . ."

Selena stopped in her tracks. Taylor just stood by the door. She spread her arms with a shrug. She knew what she must look like. For somebody as thin as her any weight would be noticeable, and here Taylor was standing in jeans too tight with hips too wide and a shirt that showed off her new softer stomach and swollen breasts. Selena, slacked jawed and speechless, approached her friend. She walked around her, looking her up and down. Taylor blushed, wishing she would just get it over with.

"Is that . . . is that real?" Selena asked, sinking a finger into Taylor's soft stomach. Taylor grabbed her hand and pushed it away.

"Oh god, don't do that, that feels awful," Taylor finally broke down and walked to the couch, conscious of how hard it was to bend her legs with pants that tight. She sat down and pulled down her shirt yet again as it kept riding up with every movement. She leaned forward with her forehead in her hands. Her button popped off as she breathed out.

"Perfect," Taylor said. "Just perfect," she fell back in a slouch, spreading her hands over her tummy, although by now she realized that was nowhere near the prominent feature on her.

Still leering at her, Selena sat down on the chair facing her.

"Taylor, I just saw you yesterday, what happened?"

"Look," Taylor collected her thoughts. She needed to find a way to tell her what was happening without actually saying it. It seemed every sentence she started was mentally blocked. What made it even harder was the hunger growing inside her again. Her stomach growled, not nearly as bad as before, but it would be there soon she knew. It must have looked like she was struggling, since Selena put a sympathetic hand on her shoulder.

"What happened to you? You can tell me. I mean, this is like ten, fifteen pounds in a day. Maybe twenty, you're taller than me so I don't know how to measure that. That's not normal."

"It sure doesn't feel normal," Taylor said. "Look, Selena, what happened is . . . this . . ." Taylor strained, trying to speak through the mental block.

124122211211121222.content:
Taylor thought she'd burst an artery trying to just spit out what had happened. Selena looked more confused than ever.

"Uh, Taylor, can you just tell me what happened?"

"I . . . ," Taylor couldn't even explain that she couldn't explain it.

Her phone rang. Taylor looked and saw an unknown number, the same as when Diane from Chocoholic called before. She brightened. She answered and put the phone on speaker, motioning for Selena to be quiet.

"H-hello?" Taylor said.

"Hello Taylor, it's Diane again. We just wanted to make sure you're feeling well."

Taylor growled the words, "How do you think I'm feeling?"

"Softer? Fatter? How would you describe it?"

"Go to hell," Taylor said, waiting for them to explain it.

"We had something of a bet going here. We just let the fat grow as it normally would if you ever naturally gained weight, instead of focusing it on any area. So, tell us Taylor, ass, chest, or hips?" Diane chuckled. Taylor turned red with both shame and anger.

"You sick bunch of freaks-"

Grooooooooorgle

Taylor doubled over clutching her puffy stomach. A feeling of gassiness and hunger seemed combined, and getting worse. Her stomach forced itself out again into her arms.

"Oooooh, no . . ." Taylor whined through clenched teeth.

"Oh, don't tell us you're belly heavy," Diane said with obvious glee.

"Gaaaah, my hips, I guess, it's my hips!" Taylor said, although she hadn't examined herself enough to know if her hips, ass, or breasts had grown the most. While walking she felt her heavier breasts the most, but sitting she'd have to say her ass was making her the most uncomfortable. Answering did the trick, and the nausea and pain vanished. Taylor straightened up and pulled down her shirt again.

Selena wore a look of pure amazement.

"We know we're on speaker phone, Taylor. You are with Selena Gomez, we believe? Now there is a young woman who could benefit from our product, but our marketing people said you were the one to push for to be our spokesperson."

"What, why not me?" Selena said, somewhat offended. "Who are you people?"

"We are Chocoholic, Ms. Gomez, and we have politely requested your friend's services as our spokesperson. But she declined, and so we offered some incentive."

Selena looked with what Taylor could only assume was horror at her figure. Taylor hugged her hands over her chest self-consciously. She shuddered at the sensation, which only made the flab in her middle jiggle, which sent another shudder and so on and so on.

"You did this to her?" Selena said. "But how? And why? It's just chocolate!"

"Chocoholic is more than just chocolate, we are a huge corporation with many sides and much technology. Taylor here had a small sampling of our nannites that are allowing us to control her appetite, her digestion, even where the fat will go. Please demonstrate, Taylor."

"Wha-ooouuuuuhg!" Taylor arched her back and pushed her stomach out. In seconds it swelled up as far as it had been when it was full before, only now there was a prominent layer of fat around it. The expansion was so fast it knocked Taylor back. She yelped helplessly as she grabbed her belly, trying to force the gas out. With a groan, she released a long, unpleasant fart.

Pfffffffffffffffftttttt

Selena wound up wafting the smell away. Taylor just screamed at the phone.

"Don't do that again!"

"That's-that's ridiculous!" Selena said. Taylor couldn't tell if she was more impressed or shocked. "You're making her fat because she said no to you?"

"And this just a small sample of what we can do. Her assistant sadly took the bulk of our nannites. You should see her. She's basically a drone now, but she has a great figure at least."

"She looks horrible," Taylor said. "And if you think you're going to do that to me you can forget it! Now that you told Selena everything I'm not the only one who knows what you're up to. You people are ruined!"

"Your figure is the only thing that'll be ruined, Taylor," Diane said.

"I knew you were going to say that," she said. Her stomach rumbled. She rubbed it gently. She knew the signs. Hunger. And growing fast. Without food she would be shaking and barely functioning in a few minutes.

"We have an offer," Diane said, "Selena, how would you like to help us convince Taylor that it'd be in her best interest to sign with us?"

"Why would I do that?" Selena asked. The idea that even somebody as slim and gorgeous as Taylor could be made gassy and obese by these people terrified her, but like Taylor the idea that it was happening to somebody she knew made it worse.

"Because if you don't you can be sure that we can do the same thing to you. And you know we can. Let us remind you that much like with Taylor's assistant, your shorter figure and difficulty in keeping yourself slim will not be a pretty combination when get a hold of you."

Selena looked at Taylor. Suddenly, Taylor wasn't sure what Selena would say. She opened her mouth to speak, but thought better and would let Taylor answer.

Seconds went by, and Taylor started to get nervous. A longer, louder growl from her stomach seemed to make Selena blanche.
