1241222112111212222.content:
It took Taylor a moment to realize the expression on Selena's face wasn't thoughtfulness, but outrage at the idea that she would betray her friend like that.

"No way!" she said, standing up to emphasize the point, even pointing at the phone next to the increasingly hungry Taylor. "I'm not going to help you fatten up my friend!"

"You'll regret this, Selena. Taylor will give in in the end-"

"Uuuuuuh," Taylor moaned softly, curling up as best she could in the chair, pulling her long legs to her chest to lessen the pain coming from her stomach. The hunger was rapidly becoming unbearable. Her stomach's rumbling could be hurt throughout the room.

"You don't know her, she doesn't give in to anything," Selena said. Taylor would have been proud if her mind was going fuzzy and flashes of light obscuring her vision.

"It's a shame Sarah isn't here to bring you something to eat, Taylor," Diane said. "Have it your way."

Selena tried to think of something to say when the hung up. Selena looked to her friend, her eyes glazing over and her mouth hanging open weakly. Selena went to her side, placing her hands on her surprisingly softer arms. Selena would still say Taylor was thin, but more on the average size, if not a little more. "Skinny-fat" she'd say, which was something she had heard applied to herself before.

"How do you feel?"

"I . . . need food . . ." Taylor said, "Please, just, a little something . . . nothing too fatty . . ."

Groooooorgle . . . her stomach groaned in opposition to the request.

"I'll get you some veggies, those are pretty good for you apparently."

Taylor smiled. "I just need something in me, is all."

"Okay, it'll be okay, Taylor. I'll get you some food. We'll go to the police. You can't explain it but I can, because I know now."

"They'll . . . uuuuuuuuhg . . . . they'll think we're crazy."

"We have some pretty good proof we're not," she said, glancing Taylors now soft sides, and how her arms dug into her tummy fat.

Selena went into the kitchen. She really didn't have a lot of healthy food in the house. She always intended to eat healthier and work out, but those moments of inspiration faded pretty quickly. And anyways, she was naturally thin. Any temporary swelling was just that, temporary. Selena always had a fear that she would at some point blow up, but so far it hadn't happened.

She heard something outside the door leading to the kitchen. Cautiously, Selena approached, and was pushed back when the door burst open. Two men in suits rushed her, one grabbing one arm and the other her other arm, clamping a hand over her mouth as she tried to scream. Next, a short, studious women entered with some kind of medical kit in her hand. Right after her, a tall, slim woman, almost like Taylor Selena thought, followed. When she spoke, in that crisp, precise manner, Selena recognized her as Diane. She was better looking than she would have assumed.

"Selena, I really don't want to have make another trip out here, but Taylor forced our hand on this."

Selena wanted to ask how they got past her guard, but could only make muffled sounds. She started to kick as the shorter woman approached her. She knocked the kit out her hand and struggled for all she was worth.

"Hurry up, Doc, she's surprisingly strong!" one of the men said. They were struggling to keep hold of Selena, who kicked and wiggled so much that in another minute she would easily have been free to run.

"Grab her legs," Diane said. The shorter woman grabbed Selena's legs as Diane picked up the kit. It had fallen open on the floor. Selena saw Diane pick up a syringe. She renewed her struggling. "And hold her on the counter."

The three successfully lifted Selena up, clamping her down with all their might on the counter. The one man still made sure to hold Selena's mouth shut. Within all her panic, she wondered why they even bothered since Taylor would know they were hear as soon as they left.

"Selena, I am really sorry for this. Well, kind of sorry. At the very least I didn't want to do it," Diane said, a cold smile on her face as Selena looked up at her with terrified eyes. Selena tried to jump as Diane planted a hand on her stomach and squeezed it, feeling the little bit of fat there.

"Oh my, Selena," Diane said, her wicked grin growing, "you have the makings of a truly tubby young lady, don't you?"

Selena got a leg free to kick, but it was quickly subdued. She tried screaming into the man's hand again, and found her head being forced against the counter as Diane continued to pat and rub her stomach. No matter how scared she was getting, Selena refused to stop struggling.

"I believe with the right incentive you could be, what's the word, obese even?"

Selena screamed into the man's trying it.

"Jesus Christ, hurry up already!" one of the men said, "I told you, she's stronger than she looks!"

Diane looked hurt. "What's the fun of this if I don't get to taunt her a little first? I barely got to taunt Taylor in there."

"Seriously, she's-ah!-she's going to kick my face in!" the shorter woman said.

"Oh, fine," Diane pulled up Selena's blouse and without hesitation sunk the needle directly into her naval. Selena screamed, but her voice died as the injection entered her. Her body went limp, and then Diane removed the needle. The three leg go. The two guards were rubbing their arms.

"Jesus, she's strong," one said. Selena could heard them clearly, but could hardly move. Her body felt nearly paralyzed. A warmth was spreading from her stomach outward. The first movement came from her hips, which swayed on the counter. Then her back arched convulsively, her head leaning back as she began making gulping sounds.

Diane moved into her vision, filling the view of Selena's frightened, dilated eyes.

"To answer what I'm sure is your question, no, this isn't exactly the same treatment we gave Taylor. She got only a small percentage of what we intended, and that was ingested. This is a much cruder form of our nannites. It will not be permanent, but unless Taylor gives in by the end of the day, I can guarantee you that the effects will take more effort to reverse than I think you'd be able to muster judging by this," Diane grabbed Selena's stomach through her shirt again. Selena doubled up, not yet able to full control her muscles.

"One day," Selena heard Diane say.

The four left. Selena lay gasping on the counter. As the warmth spread from her stomach outward she gradually gained control of her body again. She rolled off the counter, falling to the floor as her legs were still too unsteady to hold her. She looked at her stomach, lifting her shirt to see her poor belly button. She wrapped her arms around her middle. The feeling was coming back to her but she still struggled with each step.

She stumbled back to the sitting room where Taylor remained curled up in the chair.

"Did you bring anything to . . . uhg . . . eat?" Taylor asked.

"No," Selena said, then stopped. She tried to say what just happened. Taylor could clearly see something was wrong by how Selena's face changed from confused to horrified. She struggled to speak, and eventually the only words to come out were a subdued, "Oh no."

"What?" Taylor sat up as much as she could without releasing her arms from her painfully growling stomach.

"I-I-oh no!" Selena repeated, her hands over her mouth as tears welled up in her eyes. She couldn't help but stare at Taylor's now fleshier hips, softer arms, and definitely not perfectly flat tummy. "We can't go to the police!" she said.

"Why not?" Taylor asked, confused, and now starting to get scared along with Selena.

"Because, because . . . ." Selena screwed her face as she tried to force out the words, to explain what the Chocoholic people had just done to her in her kitchen. "Because we're both getting fat!"

Selena slapped her hands over her mouth, Taylor just looked confused.

"W-what?"

"What are we going to do?" Selena fell into the couch, freely crying now. Mental images of her being controlled like a puppet of some evil corporation filled her thoughts. That they were controlling her to ruin her body made it even worse. Taylor started to piece together that something must have just happened, and yet was unable to ask the question since it, at least in her mind, would require mentioning the very events that the nannites were preventing her from discussing.

"You too?" Taylor said, her heart sinking. Selena was taking this a lot worse than her, Taylor realized. Selena just looked at her, hopelessness written all over her face. "Don't be like that, we just need . . . aaaah, god . . ." Taylor gripped her stomach tightly again as another wave of hunger shot through her. She fought off the dizziness, "If I freaked out like this I never would have gotten this far. Pull yourself together, okay?"

Selena might not have been as optimistic as Taylor sounded. She also wrapped her arms around her middle as a loud groan erupted from inside her.

"What are we going to?" Selena repeated. Even Taylor, wracked with hunger and her own already altered figure, could see that for the moment at least Selena was too panicked to anything at all. Chocoholic intended to use Selena as further leverage to get her to agree to their terms. Seeing her friend in such a state, Taylor contemplated giving in just to spare her the same fate, even if meant they might get away with what they're doing. At best, she was starting to think, they might even make her thin again. That would be wonderful, but would it be worth it?

A final tug of the shoelace cemented their tied position.

Demi descended the steps while stretching her arms and shoulders. Today, just like the days before, she would start off her day with a mile-long job around her California estate. Breakfast would have to wait until after. Except, this time Demi is wearing at Fitbit a part of an endorsement deal with the company. Something about it was amiss when she fastened it to her wrist earlier. The entire system glitched when she put in her info, yet returned to normal right after.

Demi just brushed that off.

The jog around the lavish estate starts off easy, each stride requires a strong pump of the legs followed by a form perfect heel-strike to the ground then the process is repeated once again. Ahead there would be inclines and declines that are more than happy to give her trouble. But for now, a simple flat plane pleases her exercise.

Ahead of the path, Demi spotted something unusual to the estate. Aside the brick path around the home is a tent pitched right over a breakfast buffet. She tried to devoid it of any attention at first, perhaps speed up her pace past it. However, the closer she got to the tent, the less her legs pumped. “What is this doing on my property?” Demi swiveled her head around. She spotted no intruder then turned her attention right back toward the food. The popstar detested the idea of partaking in anything she didn’t know the origin of. Especially with freshly cooked food from who-knows-where. Yet the decision to skip breakfast came at a price. A price of cheating on her diet.

The breakfast buffet in front of her consisted of: Biscuits and Sausage Gravy, greasy bacon, big sugary donuts, muffins chock full of blueberries and chocolate chips, fruit crepes dosed in whip cream, and so much more.

Demi stuck her hands on her hips and dug her heel into the ground. Eating this now would make all the self-control she’s built up for herself meaningless. The fragrance of bacon grease conjoined with the sugary scent of donut frosting teased Demi’s taste buds just enough to make her salivate. Her fists balled, teeth grit, and eyes firmly stuck on the food before her. The battle in her mind, To or To Not Partake, exploding into an all-out war. Choices like this sound much easier in one’s imaginative scenarios, but when dealt with face-to-face acting upon them is a lot harder than it seems. The path to a healthy lifestyle is a mere few footsteps away, yet the temptation of immediate satisfaction stares right in her face.

Demi Lovato…

Hayley had only been home for an hour when an extreme exhaustion set in. She had been touring the world for the last few months, performing to sold out venues and using up every scrap of energy that she had.

It was time for a break.

Familiar surroundings were already a great comfort to her, but she felt like she deserved to treat herself after being away for so long. Her kitchen was empty due to her absence, so she decided to order out instead. It was only a short wait before her order arrived, though her hunger was greater than she had expected. It was fortunate that she had ordered so much food, far more than she normally would. What she didn't eat could be saved for leftovers, but for now she just wanted to sink into the couch, watch a stupid show, and stuff herself silly.

Hayley unpacked her generously sized meal, laying it on her coffee table as she flipped through the channels. Her stomach was rumbling angrily at the added delay, but she was set on making herself comfortable before tucking in.

She deserved this.

Hayley ate for the next two hours, surprising herself at her ability to cram just one more morsel in each time she thought she was full. Such gluttony had developed into a well-earned food baby that poked proudly out from underneath her shirt. She could feel how tight her belly was, having never stuffed herself to that extent before. It felt good, but if anything she was even more tired now. Lacking the energy to even lift her ass off the couch, Hayley dozed off right there and left her stomach to it's task of digesting all that she had eaten.

The next morning, Hayley awoke with more weight around her middle than she was used to. Instinctively, she made her way to the bathroom and set herself upon a set of scales. The digital readout blinked into action, settling on a number which took the redhead by surprise.

187lbs

That was quite a lot of extra poundage from just one meal. How does Hayley react to her considerable gain?

125322221322.content:
It was a rare slow couple of days for Selena Gomez. She had spent them almost entirely at her home, reading, watching TV, lying beside the pool. She really needed this mini-vacation. There were some long term projects coming up in a few weeks, now was the time to unwind while she still could.

Selena took a break from her book to check in on social media. Sure, she was probably on Twitter and Instagram more than she should be, so there were others who were way worse than her. She told the world how relaxed she saw, received mostly positive comments. Then she went over to see how Taylor Swift was faring on social media and found a bizarre series of comments indicating a low key Twitter war was about to break.

Selena traced it back to an Instagram post earlier in the day coming from Demi Lovato. Selena hadn't spoken to her old friend in years by this point. She indicated she was performing a charity competition with the proceeds going to world hunger. So far, so good, Selena thought. She was shocked by the picture, though. First, Demi was standing next to Ariana Grande, who looked very much like she didn't want to be there. Not that unusual, Ariana had taken herself off of all social media lately (again) after a series of ill-advised public statements that lead to predictable public backlash. But they were both friends, so if Demi was promoting some charity thing then it'd make that Ariana might appreciate the chance to build up some good will.

More shocking to Selena, though, was the contrast between the two. Both singers were the same height, but in her high heel platforms and with her slim but curvy figure, Ariana looked particularly lovely and even elegant next to Demi. Demi, Selena noticed, had put on weight. She was almost plump, with her face round and her hips wide, and she only looked bigger standing next to Ariana. Selena didn't think of herself as vain but she did care about her appearance, and even with her junk food habit would never have let herself go like Demi had.

But Demi was trying to something nice, at least, and even if it was just a stunt for Ariana that was nice of her to help. When Selena read what the charity was, though, she laughed.

"World hunger is a real problem. We're going to do our part right here and have fun while raising money to help the hungry of the world." So far, normal, Selena thought. "For the next two weeks every other day Ariana and I are going to hold eating competitions, with the winner donating $100,000 for everything they eat, so expect to see hot dogs, pies, etc.! After two weeks we'll weigh ourselves, and we'll donate however many pounds we both gained by another $100,000 each!"

Selena groaned. No wonder Ariana didn't look happy. Well, that's stupid. Calling attention to world hunger by stuffing your face had to be one of the dumbest promotional ideas Selena had ever heard of. Selena couldn't help herself at having a little chuckle at Ariana's expense. The poor girl was going to have to publicly stuff herself and try to beat Demi at eating for two weeks. Selena's vanity wasn't quite at Ariana's level, but even she would have been mortified to publicly broadcast her own weight gain like that. She was embarrassed enough when her breaks from touring left her a little puffy, stuffing herself in public would like these two were doing would have been humiliating.


Unfortunately, Taylor had commented that she was happy to see Demi doing something good for people, and through a series of confusing tweets wound up implying that Demi was putting her talents to good use, and that those talents were eating and gaining weight. People were not happy with the implication. Taylor washed her hands of the situation, Selena assumed while pouting that people weren't understanding her. But Taylor was one of her best friends and wasn't going to let people denigrate her without saying something.

"Calm down, everybody. Taylor's one of the most generous people I know, she was just wishing Demi and Ariana the best. Lighten up!"

This didn't work. Almost immediately calls about what charitable Taylor had ever done, which her defenders angrily listed, but that somehow spread out to accusing Selena of being selfish and uncharitable, too. Selena didn't feel like she had to defend herself there, she had done her part plenty of times. She was happy to see Taylor come to her defense. Then when somebody said Demi and Ariana were willing to put their appearance on the line to help people, Selena saw where this was going and went to nip it in the bud.

"Selena has done PLENTY for the children of the world and KNOWS world hunger needs to be solved!" Taylor had posted when some people accused her of being selfish. Next thing she knew, there were calls for Selena to participate. Even Demi responded that even though they had fallen out years ago that Selena was a good person and would love to help others like her and Ariana are doing.

Selena loudly gasped to herself when she saw Taylor's instant, sitcom-esque response volunteering her. "She'd do it in a heartbeat!" If she had a moment to think, she could have come up with an explanation as to why she didn't want to. For example, she could say she was working on other projects. She could even explain that the idea was stupid to stuff your face like a glutton to call attention to world hunger. But the opportunity to back out of something she didn't even volunteer for quickly passed. If she said anything right then, the message would be obvious and Selena knew it. They would say Selena cares more about being hot and thin than helping people.

Selena knew Taylor meant well in her defense. Sometimes these online arguments get out of hand. But she'd be lying if she said she wasn't furious, on the verge of screaming at her best friend.
125322221322.title: An Ill-Conceived Charity Contest

choices: Skip to the first day of the charity event
Demi calls Selena to ask Taylor to join
Demi, Ariana, and Selena do some promo work for the charity event
1253222213221.content:
"So let's talk about what just happened" Selena texted Taylor immediately after seeing her friend volunteer her to join Demi's charity event.

Taylor realized she may have gone a little too far when she read her friend's text. She just hoped that her friend would understand that she was coming from a good place. There was a side of her though who liked the thought of Selena getting fat. She had seen her friend get chubby a couple of times before and thought she looked cute that way. Sometimes though, her catty side got the best of her and she couldn't help but tease Selena over her weight gain.

Taylor quickly called Selena. "I'm so sorry hon. I guess I got a little carried away. You know how protective I am of my friends" she said quickly once her friend answered.

Selena sighed and nodded. "I know Tay. You meant well but I wish you had chosen your words more carefully. You pretty much volunteered me for something without asking my permission. It's going to look really bad if I back out now. World Hunger is a serious problem. Backing out of this would be really bad for my public image" she said. Her reputation had taken a hit recently due to her ex boyfriend The Weeknd's album which seemed to suggest that she had broken his heart.

"I know this is a less than ideal charity event for you but putting on some weight is probably the lesser of two evils than your repuation being hurt. Besides, at least you won't be the only one gaining weight. You have always told me how easily it is for Demi to put on weight and not to mention what a fat ass she is. With Ariana being so short, I am sure she will put on some weight too. Since all three of you will be putting on weight, maybe the media won't make such a big deal out of it. Or maybe they will cut you some slack since you are doing it for charity. Also, if you do this, I promise to help you lose weight" Taylor offered.

Selena considered her friend's offer to her. "Well..okay. It would look really awful if I backed out now" she conceded. "But you better keep your promise to help me lose the weight" she said in a pointed tone.

"You have my word and you know that I keep my promises" Taylor finshed.
1253222213221.title: Selena reluctantly agrees to what Taylor signed...

choices: Selena successfully finishes her first event, goes to nurse her stuffed belly
Something's amiss, Selena and Ariana can't stop until they're done
12532222132211.content:
With the first event scheduled for tomorrow, Selena didn't have a whole lot of time to prepare.

"Prepare for what?" Taylor had asked, "It's eating. You know how to eat."

Selena was still annoyed with Taylor for the whole thing but she always found it easy to forgive her.

"Besides, it's just two or three pounds, maybe five tops over the next two weeks," Selena said. "That's not so bad. Stuffing my fave on stage isn't going to be pretty, though."

"And you probably would have put that on while you were relaxing at home anyways," Taylor said with a giggle. Selena glared at her.

Demi contacted Selena soon after the incident and gave her the details; a public eat off every two days with them posting pictures of themselves pigging out during the days in between. Having not spoken to Demi in years Selena was surprised by how normal, even happy, Demi sounded. The two had had their differences, though. Even if they wouldn't be friends Selena found herself pleased that their animosity was in the past.
_____________________________________________

Taylor went with Selena to the first event the next day for moral support. The crowd overfilled the hall. Based on what she saw on social media, the ridiculous twitter battle from the day before turned Demi's small charitable contest into a real public event. Selena was less than pleased with the greater publicity. Taylor seemed to be delighted by the turn out.

"Hi Selena," without realizing it, Demi had come right up to Selena and Taylor. She greeted Taylor with a silent nod but hugged Selena before she had a chance to respond.

"Thanks for doing this, it really means a lot to me," Demi said.

"Well, it's for a good cause," Selena said. "It's good seeing you again." Demi smiled back. She made her apologies and had to rush off to finish setting up.

"Oh my god," Taylor whispered in awe, "She got huge!"

"Huge" might have been an exaggeration but there was no doubt that Demi, with her wide hips, swollen ass, and a bulging belly that jiggled while she walked, was nowhere near thin anymore. Taylor went and found a place to sit, but really was greeting fans and making herself seen, while Selena went to the small backstage area. There she found Ariana, arms crossed and pouting, leaning against the wall. She brightened a little when she saw Selena. It couldn't have been since they were on friendly terms, Selena, thought, it was more likely that Ariana was glad she wasn't the only one taking part in this.

"Heey, look who it is. How'd you get tied up in this?" she asked.

"Didn't you see yesterday? It was all some stupid twitter thing," Selena said. She didn't want to bring up Taylor's involvement-or rather, that it was entirely Taylor's fault-to Ariana.

Ariana shook her head. "I'm banned from social media. Publicist's orders. I don't mind though, it's usually kind of nasty, isn't it?"

"Well, this wasn't nasty, just dumb," Selena said. "Why did you agree?"

"Because it was for charity and they said it'd look good. I didn't know she wanted us to actually gain weight," there was bitterness in her voice. Of course there was, Selena thought. Demi had a history of gaining weight and was outright chubby now, and Selena had certain put on some pounds in the past, but Ariana had never been anything other than petite and curvy and was proud of it. Selena didn't respond, but did think seeing the tiny, pretty Ariana bloated would be some consolation, even if she didn't actually put on any weight.

The three went out on stage to applause, something all three were used to. Demi thanked everybody for their support, going on a little too long about how she thought of this event, and where the money would go to. Selena looked at pleasant as she could, while Ariana could barely even be bothered to fake a smile except when Demi mentioned her. They stood behind a long table which stagehands were now filling up. The first eat off would be a classic, the hot dog eating contest. Selena's eyes went wide when she saw the trays, one for each, stacked two feet high with a pyramid of hot dogs each.

None of us can eat even half of this, Selena thought, Well, maybe Demi. This was just going to be embarrassing on multiple levels. They'd have to throw out almost all of the food at an event meant to help world hunger!

If Selena was surprised, Ariana looked almost angry. She made a whiny moan loud enough for Selena to hear but not Demi on the other side of her. She turned to Selena, as if with understanding, and patted her stomach. She was wearing jeans but one of those puffy dress tops that not only made her look taller by hiding her real waistline, but also would be useful if she really did eat enough to have to undo her pants. Selena thought about this and wished she had thought ahead. She wasn't going to eat enough to require it, but if her jeans did pop then her t-shirt was not going to hide it.

"Ten minutes, everyone! Let's do this, for world hunger!" Demi yelled to cheers from the crowd. A timer started.

Demi dug in without hesitation. Before Selena and Ariana even started she was already stuffing the second hot dog in her mouth. Selena nervously looked over to Ariana, dainty picking up the first hot and carefully eating it. Selena wasn't quite so ladylike, but neither was she the pig that Demi was making of herself. Selena had seen hot dog eating contests by experts before, and they had a strategy. They basically inhaled them. Selena and Ariana had no such skill or desire to do so. But Selena wasn't going to half ass it, even if she couldn't eat like the best.

So she tried. By the third hot dog she was able to get it down in three bites, although Demi needed less than two. By the third, though, Selena was full. But she kept going. The fourth made her feel stuffed, but by that point she was able to get it down quickly, like she actually wanted to be there. Then came the fifth, and that was at Selena's limit for food, let alone something as dense and devoid of nutrition was hot dogs and buns. Her stomach was uncomfortably tight, but at least the top of her hot dog pyramid had been lowered.

Selena looked to Demi, half in shock and half in admiration. She was halfway done and was eating like a machine. Selena also saw Demi's pudgy stomach even looked full. Selena groaned and ate a sixth, then a seventh. At that point she rubbed her poor stomach, filled beyond its limit now. She could feel bulging out slightly into her hand. She picked up another hot dog, burped, hiccuped, and took another bite, having to force it down. Her small stomach just wasn't meant to take this much food at once. Under the table she rubbed her tummy again and found it bloated and hard to touch. Even the front of her jeans felt tighter.

Ariana, to Selena's surprise, was doing just as well as her. At least Selena could put on a decent game face, only letting her discomfort show when the contents of her distended tummy shifted, releasing gas or a groan. Ariana looked more like every bite was torture to her.

Selena wasn't sure she could finish her eight, even though Demi had eaten almost everything on her tray. Fortunately, she didn't have to. The ten minute timer went off.
12532222132211.title: The First Eat Off, Hot Dogs

choices: Taylor goes to check on Ariana
Demi comes to check on Selena
125322221322111.content:
Selena had never been so happy to hear the time go off in her life. A burp escaped her lips and she couldn't help but but blush bright red. She hoped the microphones didn't capture it.

"Gross. So unladylike. I hope you don't turn into a pig like your friend" Ariana said in a tone that was only loud enough for Selena to hear. But then a burp escaped her lips and then it was her turn to blush red. "Shut up" she said even though all Selena did was laugh.

Both girls got slowly to their feet, unused to their bellies being so full. Selena saw Demi getting a lot of praise and recognition for putting her appetite to good use and her coming away with the victory tonight. It surprised the Latina to feel a twinge of jealous. Even when she and Demi were close friends, they always had a little rivarly. Even though this was a contest she should not want to win, the competitive side of her did.

Ariana and Selena headed back to their respective dressing rooms. Selena was a bit surprised to see Taylor waiting for her. The blonde songstress was hanging out on the couch and her eyes immediately went to Selena's bloated belly. It surprised her how cute she found Selena looking with her food baby. "Hey Selly! I think you did a great job" the blonde pop star said as she got up and moved to greet her friend with a hug.

"Thank you Tay. I am so full that it hurts a bit. The only thing that helps is a belly rub" Selena said as she moved to lay down on the couch. She began to gently rub her bloated belly.

"Here. Let me do that for you. It's the least I can do after getting you into this contest" Taylor said. She made her way over to her friend, got down on her knees, smoothed out her skirt, and began to gently massage Selena's belly. "How does that feel hon?"

"Mm, that feels good" Selena moaned softly as she closed her eyes to enjoy the sensation of Taylor's belly rubs. A few more burps escaped her lips as Taylor rubbed her belly. Between the belly rubs feeling so good and her feeling so full, Selena started to get sleepy, and fell asleep.
125322221322111.title: Selena successfully finishes her first event, g...

choices: The next morning, Taylor helps Selena stuff herself for charity
The next morning, Selena can't stop eating on her own
1253222213221113.content:
Selena's nap didn't last long. Soon Demi joyously burst into the room without knocking. Taylor jumped and stood up, blushing at being caught rubbing her friend's tummy. Selena more embarrassed than ever, tugged her shirt down and sat up.

"That went so great, you guys!" Demi said. "We just have to do some promo pics and then we're done for the day."

"Thank god, I need a nap, another one," Selena said, standing up. "Urp!" another belch forced its way out as she stood up. The pressure had gone down but she was still full. Her stomach pressed out into her jeans uncomfortably.

Taylor went along, intrigued by her own thoughts. She had the strangest desire now to have her and Selena photographed together now, preferably from an angle that highlighted Selena's full stomach. She smiled to herself, then shook her head to focus. Selena was giving her a look.

"What's up? Looks like you're thinking of something funny," Selena said.

"Not funny, just pleasant," Taylor said absently.

Selena followed Demi's wide ass back onto the stage where a few photographers gathered around. Normal pictures were taken, but Demi had one particular one in mind.

"Okay, everybody. To the side, lift up those shirts!" Demi led by example, living up her shirt and revealing her soft, round belly straining against her yoga pants. Ariana looked physically ill at the site. Selena almost laughed. She followed suit. She was not pleased about showing off her bloated stomach, especially after all the embarrassment she'd felt before when shots of her looking less than perfectly thin made it into the tabloids, but next to Demi it would look like she hadn't eaten a bite.

"You too, Ariana!" Demi grinned.

The pouty Ariana stood behind Demi. She grunted, whispering so Selena could hear.

"At least we look small next to her," she said. Selena felt only a little guilty for agreeing. Then she was quite happy when Ariana revealed her tummy. Her high-waisted jeans had popped open, proudly revealing a very rounded tummy. She rubbed it, faking a smile for the camera. Through her teeth, she leaned over to Selena, "How the hell do I look so much bigger than you, we ate like the same amount."

Selena shrugged. She did not want to actively antagonize Ariana, even when she was restraining her more vicious impulses. She could not suppress a grin at her expense, though. It made her think of the contest in a new light, even. Sure, it was embarrassing, and awkward, and certainly a dumb idea for a charity, but it was kind of fun seeing how Demi didn't care at all how she looked while Ariana was visibly mortified by taking part in it. Here was Selena in the middle, not happy, a bit embarrassed, but in two weeks it would be over and hopefully she'll only have four or five pounds to lose.

She was taken out of her thoughts when she saw Ariana, who could not help but detect Selena's pleasure at her mild discomfort, scowling at her.

Taylor had made her way up behind the three while they were flashing a few more bare-belly shots. Selena might not want to get on Ariana's bad side, but Taylor had no problem needling her. Especially when the photographers gleefully took a few more shots as the always slender, gorgeous Taylor sneaked up behind the three and wound up in the shot. Selena glanced over, and laughed. Taylor almost couldn't help herself. She reached over from behind and rubbed Ariana's full, exposed belly. Ariana screeched and jumped away. Selena, and Demi, along with much of those present laughed. Ariana, furious, glared at the smug Taylor, and with a great force of will calmed herself down.

"Don't worry, Ariana, everybody has that pregnancy rumor phase. The hot dog eating competition should disprove it anybody is suspicious, though," Taylor said.

Ariana looked like she was about to snap. Everyone present thought it possible, even probably, given her history of emotional outbursts. But she didn't. She let Taylor have her laugh and sulked away without another word.

"That was a little mean," Demi said, but was still smiling. Unlike Ariana, she had come a long way in taking herself less seriously.

"Okay everyone, I'm going home," Selena said. She was glad the day had gone decently, with the contest being embarrassing but not awful. Ariana's melodramatic attitude and angry comments made Selena think that it wasn't going to be so bad after all, and she should just suck it up and do it.

Although later, her mind kept going back to what happened in the dressing room. Taylor rubbing her full stomach felt good, almost too good, but there was something else she didn't like about it. Taylor kept looking at her oddly the rest of the night, her eyes constantly shifting down to her middle.
1253222213221113.title: Photo op

choices: Selena finishes the brownies and Taylor coaxs her into having a cookie or two
Selena's eating is interupted by a facetime call from Demi
Selena's friend Francia shows up unexpectedly
12532222132211131.content:
Taylor had promised to help Selena with the contest and losing any weight she gained from it once it was over. She was planning on keeping her word on at least one of those promises. She had enjoyed watching Selena stuff her face and then have a bloated belly to show for it. It surprised her how hot her short friend looked with the belly. She couldn't take her eyes away from it and had enjoyed rubbing it. Why am I enjoying this so much she wondered to herself. She couldn't help but think back to when Selena had gained weight in the past, gotten a little chubby. She had always enjoyed teasing her Latina friend about her weight gain. She also enjoyed being responsible for some of Selena's chub up moments. She had always loved to bake and she knew that Selena had a love of chocolate. Anytime she baked chocolate chip cookies or brownies for Selena, she knew that the brunette would eat them all.

It was then that the blonde pop star had a brilliant idea. Some might call it devious but she never denied having a dark side. She would bake a bunch of Selena's favorite sweet treats and put appetite stimulants. It would give Selena a good chance to beat Demi in the eating competition and it would be so much fun to watch her shorter friend truly get fat. She quickly went to the store to buy the appetite stimulants before heading home to get to baking. She decided to do a mix of chocolate chip cookies and brownies since they were Selena's favorite. After baking a dozen of each, she headed to bed, excited to present her treats to her friend.

The next morning, Taylor headed over to Selena's house as soon as she woke up. She was excited to watch Selena pig out on the baked goods she had baked for her. Luckily, Selena had given her a key to the house so she let herself in and headed straight for the kitchen. She laid out all the cookies and brownies before putting one plate of brownies into the microwave to warm it up.

Hearing some noise coming from the kitchen had woken up Selena from her deep sleep. She went to bed as soon as she had gotten home. Eating so much had left her sleepy. Thinking it might be Taylor, she decided to go see what her friend wanted and why she was here so damn early. She wiggled into a pair of black yoga pants and a baby blue t-shirt that revealed a bit of the top of her stomach. She headed downstairs and into the kitchen where she found Taylor and a bunch of her favorite baked goods. Everything looked and smelled so good. Despite eating so much, Selena blushed as she found her stomach growling hungry.

"What is all of this for?" Selena asked in surprise. "I told you that I would help you with the contest. Think of this as training. As much as you protest that you don't want to win, I know you do. You are competitive and I want to help you win" Taylor said. She was playing to Selena's ego and she hoped that it would work.

"Well I would hate to make things easy for Demi. It would be nice to beat her at this competition for bragging rights" Selena replied with a smile. "Mm, those brownie look really good to. I suppose a little training wouldn't hurt" the Latina said before making her way over to the counter, and taking a seat. Taylor put the plate of warm brownies in front of Selena who eagerly picked one up, and took a healthy sized bite. "Mm, that is so good. I know I have told you this before but you are a great baker" Selena said before quickly devouring the rest of the brownie. The first brownie only seemed to whet her appetite so she picked up another one. She wanted to eat that one slower but once she started eating it, she couldn't stop. She then devoured a third brownie and didn't even try to eat it slowly. "Mm, so good. I think I could use some milk now" Selena said. Even as she said the words, she found herself reaching for a forth brownie which she quickly gulped down as well.

"Milk coming right up" Taylor said as she enjoyed watching Selena pig out. She poured her friend a large glass of millk and set it down in front of her. Selena thirstily gulped some of it down.

My plan is working perfectly the blonde pop star thought to herself. She wished that the counter was not blocking her view of Selena's belly but she would see the results of her plan soon enough.
12532222132211131.title: The next morning, Taylor helps Selena stuff her...

choices: "Uhg, fine!" Taylor stays with Selena the whole day to stuff her silly
"Yes we are!" Taylor leaves, but Selena struggles to not stuff herself
125322221322111312.content:
Selena was really enjoying her morning so far. She had woken up, still feeling bloated and gross from yesterday, and now her best friend was making her favorite deserts for breakfast. She suspected that Taylor's kindness was in part due to her guilt for getting her into this stupid situation in the first place, but that was fine. Selena found it hard to stay mad at Taylor for long. And Taylor's baking helped with that. Before she even knew it, Selena was finishing off a tray of brownies before they were even cool. She burped and giggled, and Taylor smiled back at her.

"Save room, I'm making more."

"Not sure this counts as breakfast," Selena said, rubbing her belly under the counter. She nibbled on a cookie from a plate Taylor had put down while Selena was inhaling the brownies, except she didn't so much nibble on it as scarf it down in two bites. She wasn't sure why she was so hungry this morning. She was still full-visibly full at that-of hot dogs, and when she came downstairs and smelled Taylor's food it almost made her gag. But after the first few bites, she found her full stomach growling for more. She was actually hungry.

Taylor knows how to give a pep talk, Selena thought. It was true, she was competitive, and now that Taylor put the idea in her head it would be nice to hold her own against Demi.

But then again... her misgivings resurfaced as she continued to rub her full, distended stomach.

"You know what I make almost as good as brownies and cookies?"

"Please say omelettes and and bacon," Selena said, surprising herself by how her mouth watered at the thought.

"Yes!"

While Taylor cooked, Selena munched on more cookies absentmindedly, not really aware she was doing it. She looked at her social media updates on her iPad and found a number of encouraging comments from the eating contest last night. She also found some warnings that her and Ariana would get as fat as Demi. She shuddered at the the thought.

"Speak of the devil," she said as Demi's face popped up on her iPad, requesting a video chat. The two had not called each other in so long. It reminded Selena of the old times when they were inseparable. Those days were gone, but it gave her comfort to be on speaking terms again.

"Hi Selena!" Demi said, and Selena was shocked by the transition from the old photo she had of Demi for her caller ID and her now round, plump face. Taylor came around to have a peak then went back to cooking.

"Hi Demi!" Taylor said.

"Taylor's helping me in the contest," Selena said.

"That's good, you'll need it to beat me," Demi said with a laugh. Oh god, her face even jiggles a little, Selena thought. Taylor stifled a chuckle at that.

"Hey, I'm no slouch in a contest," Selena said, "And it's for a good cause."

"It is!" Demi said, apparently excited that Selena agreed feeding hungry people was a good thing to do. "Anyways, I know you're having breakfast, just wanted to remind you to get your belly shot in by the end of the day."

"Belly shot?" Selena said, speaking through a mouth full of cookie with one hand under the counter on her stomach.

"Yeah, like yesterday. Just eat as much as you can, for a meal or the whole day, whatever you like, and get a picture up."

Selena smiled and nodded uncertainly. Stuffing herself all day did not sound pleasant, but then again, despite the fullness she felt pretty good right now.

"You know I'll do my best," Selena finally said.

"Don't count her out yet, I've seen what this girl can do when she puts her mind to it!" Taylor said. Suddenly the smell of cooking bacon was distracting Selena more than it should have considering how full she already was.

"I know!" Demi agreed with a laugh. "Anyways, I'm going to check in on Ariana. She was not happy last night," but she said with a grin.

"Go ahead, it was good talking to you," Selena said, speaking quickly to avoid Taylor throwing in a shot at Ariana.

"You too, Selena."

"That was nice," Selena said, reaching for another cookie and finding none. Taylor had turned around and saw the disappointment on her face, followed by the embarrassment. "Oh, uh, oops." She felt her stomach stretching under the table. She did feel as full as last night all over again, having just piled rich, sugary treats on top of salty, fatty dogs. Yoga pants were the right choice.

"And here's the second course," Taylor plopped down an enormous omelette and a thick pile of bacon in front of Selena. Her mouth watered, her stomach, stuffed as it was, still managed to growl with hunger. It didn't feel exactly right, being stuffed to the brim but starving, but the thing about being as hungry as Selena was then was that she wouldn't think about that until the hunger was satisfied.

"I can't possibly eat that. That's like a two pound omelette!" Selena protested meekly.

"Hey, it's for a good cause."

Selena rolled her eyes at Taylor, and then dug in. Each bite was better than the last. Soon she was holding and rubbing her stomach under the counter, rubbing it to sooth the full, heavy feeling growing in her. She felt her skin stretch along with her yoga pants. She didn't look down to see, but as the omelette rapidly vanished into her she was convinced that she must be just as bloated as last night.

Taylor watched with rapt attention, which would have made Selena uncomfortable had she noticed. Only as she neared the end did her rapid eating slow. It was starting to get hard to get each mouthful down.

"Oooh, Tay, I, uhg, think that's enough... urp!" but Selena kept on until the plate was empty. Twice in under twelve hours Selena had eaten herself into a state where the only option was to lie down in a food coma. Now, with her hand on her rounded stomach, her shirt riding up enough to expose her taut naval, she noticed Taylor's serious, intense expression.

"What?"

"Oh, nothing, just impressed is all. You're going to win this!"

"Uhg, not sure I want to anymore," Selena got off the stool and stumbled. The weight in her stomach pulled her forward, then backward. She tugged at her yoga pants to pull them down, seeing that her belly was round enough to have an underside now. She tugged at her shirt. She whined, then belched.

"You can't tell me that wasn't the best breakfast ever, though," Taylor said. She walked around and her eyes went wide as she saw her petite friend standing there looking so bloated she might burst.

"Bwuuuurp!" Selena held her stomach in her hands and moaned. "You know what's-urp!-the weirdest thing? I'm still hungry, heh. I really don't want this to become a trend, but it actually feels kind of...urrrrp!...kind of good."

Taylor's eyes lit up at that. Her plan was paying off immediately and Selena seemed none the wiser. Right then, she was looking at Selena with almost the same expression as Selena was looking at her delicious, addictive, fattening cooking. She patted Selena's taut, exposed tummy with a laugh. Selena batted her away, but as she made her way to the couch Taylor again attempted to cop a belly feel and Selena just belched and didn't resist.

"Stop, that makes me feel like such a-bwoooorp!-pig," Selena said, plopping down on the couch. The way her belly, round and full, stuck up as she sat made her blush. Now that the food high was wearing off and the food coma coming on, Selena remembered sluggish and bloated is not how she wanted to be seen.

"We're not done yet," Taylor said,
125322221322111312.title: Breakfast by Taylor

choices: Taylor tries feeding Selena the rest of the food
Skip to the end of the day and Selena taking a photo of her belly
Selena gets a call from Hailey Bieber who teases her about doing the show
1253222213221113121.content:
"Uhg, fine!" Selena said with a sigh and a roll of her eyes. She was really fulling stuffed now but she found herself growing more used to it. She found herself starting to even like it. The truth was that she always had a good appetite. She couldn't deny that she was enjoying pigging out. She just did not want her eating to get out of control. She didn't want to end up fat like Demi. "At first let me sleep off my breakfast" the Latina requested as she rubbed her bloated belly and another burp escaped her lips. The food coma was coming on strong and she couldn't hide it.

Yes Taylor did want to help her friend win the contest. She had gotten her into this situation, the least she could do was to help her out of it. At the same time though, she was having a lot of fun feeding Selena. She was also enjoying watching her brunette bestie starting to get chubby. Why am I enjoying this so much she wondered to herself in surprise. "That's fair. Plus, it will give me some time on what to decide to feed you next" the blonde songstress giggled with an evil smile. She hadn't been table to take her eyes off Selena's belly. Moving to take a seat next to her friend, she moved her hand away, and began to rub her bloated belly for her. "Here, let me rub it for you" Taylor cooed softly. She looks so pretty with a round fully belly she couldn't help but think to herself as she admired Selena's bloated form.

Selena closed her eyes and moaned softly as she enjoyed the feeling of Taylor's soft hand massaging her belly. It helped her to relax and let out some of the gas that was stuck inside. The brunette songstress let out a more burps before passing out.

When Selena opened her eyes a short time later, she found herself still quite fully but not as stuffed. She looked down at her belly, hoping to see it look smaller, but no such luck. She still had a noticeable food baby.

"Oh good! You are up" Taylor said as she walked back into the home with a bag full of Taco Bell food. "I've got your next meal here" the taller songstress said as she made her way over to Selena.

Selena blushed as her stomach growled hungrily. She was surprised to realize that she was hungry again. Taylor joined her on the couch and handed the bag of food and a large cup of Mountain Dew soda. "Dig in" Taylor encouraged Selena with a smile.

That was all the invitation Selena needed. She pulled out a bean and cheese burrito, unwrapped it, and took a couple of bites. It was so good that she managed to devour it in a couple of minutes."Mm, so good" she moaned softly before grabbing another one and devouring it as well.

Taylor couldn't help but smile watching Selena start to pig out again. She watched with a mix of interest and arousal. It was turning her on watching Selena pig out and grow wider because of it. She decided right then and there that she was going to make her friend fat. She was going to make Selena fatter than her former friend Demi.
1253222213221113121.title: "Uhg, fine!" Taylor stays with Selena t...

choices: Selena refuses, and Taylor plans for the next day's stuffing
Selena relents and find herself overly stuffed and socializing
12532222132211131211.content:
Taylor's appetite stimulants appeared to be working too well. Despite being visibly, uncomfortably stuffed, Selena managed to force down two burritos. When she fell back and held her half exposed belly in her hands, she let loose a belch that last nearly a minute. She grimaced in pain, and yet couldn't deny that there was something that felt good about being so full.

"Ooooh, god-urrp! How am I still eating? It's like-urp-it's like there's a switch in my head that was on 'not hungry' and got turned to 'starving!'" She closed her eyes and rubbed her aching belly. It was hard to the touch and looked it, sticking out nearly half a foot and riding her t-shirt up. She tugged her yoga pants down to give her some more room.

Taylor couldn't take her eyes off Selena. She took out the third burrito and unwrapped it. She sat down next to Selena.

Selena shook her head, her eyes half closed. All that food would have made anyone sleepy, but the effects of the appetite stimulant were making it hard to think, let alone stay awake.

"No more," Selena waved Taylor away.

"There's still three more left," Taylor said, a hint of sensuality in her voice. She brought the burrito to Selena's lips. Selena pursed her lips, turned her head away, and grunted.

"Aw, come on," Taylor said sweetly. She placed her hand on the taut surface of Selena's tummy and rubbed it. Selena jumped but let her continue. It soothed her, even if there was something humiliating about it.

"Seriously, Tay, no more," Selena said firmly. At least, she thought she said it firmly. Instead, Taylor moved the burrito right between Selena's lips, and Selena took the first bite. She chewed, swallowed, released a little burp, and then took the next bite. All the while her hands lay limply at her side and Taylor slowly ran her hand over Selena's curved stomach.

They took no break between the third and fourth. Selena could feel her skin growing tighter, both from the food itself amassing inside her, but also the gassiness rising up. Selena managed to belch between bites, but Taylor kept mechanically moving the burrito into her mouth. Her stomach, feeling like a giant, gurgling ball rather than her usual trim tummy, lurched and squirmed under Taylor's hands. It wasn't long before Selena couldn't help but fart, repeatedly. She blushed brightly.

"Sorry," she said dreamily. She put her hands over her face and moaned. It hurt to move her middle, like her skin was stretched too tightly. "Anymore and I'll burst," she said, her voice airy. She was so stuffed speaking was difficult.

"Don't worry, there's no more," Taylor said, in a kind of ecstasy herself. She couldn't explain why seeing Selena like this excited her so, but she knew that feeling Selena's belly rising under her hand was one of the best experiences she had ever felt.

It was late in the day, and Selena realized she had spent the whole day either eating or sleeping. She carefully shifted to stretch out on the couch, her stomach forcing bits of gas out of her with every movement. On her back, she saw her dome of a belly rising up. Taylor stood over her in awe. She held out her hand.

"Come, let's get your picture before you pass out for the night."

"Night? No way, it can't be that late-wuurp! I need to work some of this off," Selena took Taylor's hand and with a huff pulled herself up. Taylor didn't think she felt any heavy, but Selena herself felt like her stomach would drag her to the ground. Taylor took out her phone.

"No stick it out and smile."

The sleepy eyed Selena attempted to smile. She also attempted to suck her stomach in, and found it impossible. She arched her back and held her bare belly in her hands. Selena snapped the picture.

"How do I look?" Selena asked, taking a few shuffling steps towards Taylor. She kept her hands on her belly, rubbing it gently. It was still growling and churning. She knew she'd need a full night's rest after this to get it to calm down.

"Full," Taylor said.

"Oh my god," Selena gasped. There she was in profile, her tiny butt, her small, perky breasts, her pretty face, slim arms and legs, and a big round belly. She looked pregnant.

"It's not a bad look for you," Taylor said, honestly, but with a giggle.

"Don't start. After next week I never want to eat like this every again. I don't know if I can do this that long. I literally feel like I'm going to explode."

Laughing, Taylor showed Selena Ariana's just posted picture. "You're doing way better than Ariana. She barely has a food baby."

"She's the smart one. Don't show me Demi, it'll be depressing."

"Too late," Taylor showed Selena Demi. Selena smiled. Selena might be horribly stuffed and feel like an overfed, gross pig, but Demi was chunky all over, and her stomach looked a little more bloated than usual, but it was hard to tell.

"Well, at least I won't wind up like her. And what is this, is she in a club? I promise you that I am not leaving the house looking like this. I'm going to bed," Selena said, even though it was barely past 8:00.

Taylor perked up. That rush of emotion returned, the same as when she first saw Selena stuffing herself, or when she rubbed her prone friend's belly. The idea of Selena, stuffed and belching, in public, appealed to her.

"Aw, it's early. Come on, Selena, let's go out and have some fun," Taylor said with a pout.

choices: Cursed! Gigi's pregnanty appetite becomes hers, and all that comes with it

135332222123.content:
Bella loved her sister, she really did. The two had always been close. They even went into the same business together. Sure, there were rivalries at times, but as they entered their mid-20s those even had settled down. The sometimes harsh criticism leveled at each other were a thing of the past. As were the cruel pranks, such as when Gigi once replaced Bella's clothes right before and important, early shoot to make her think she gained weight. Or the time Bella slipped Gigi an extremely gassy additive in her lunch to cause her to bloat up right before a fancy gala.

So when Bella had spoke to Gigi earlier it was out of love. Gigi was five months along and Bella couldn't be happier for her. These were tough times, especially for Gigi who was keeping herself almost in total isolation. They were video chatting just last night and Gigi showed Bella her stomach.

"Look, I finally popped!" Gigi said, delighted. Bella couldn't remember seeing her happier than in their recent calls while she was pregnant, despite everybody being in quarantine. Bella had noticed her getting a tummy before, but she did finally look pregnant. Of course, seeing her slim, beautiful sister with a belly brought out Bella's inner cattiness, but she most was able to control it. Mostly.

"Oh woooow, you look so cute!" Bella said.

"I know, I finally got a baby bump!" Gigi said with a giggle. Even on camera, it was obvious that Gigi was putting on baby weight, and didn't care. She was happy her son or daughter was growing healthily inside her. But then it just slipped out. It was like for a second Bella forgot her sister was pregnant and her gain was natural, and that they were no longer teenage rivals.

"Watch out, sis, you're kind of getting a baby double chin, too," Bella said. She regretted it instantly, but still felt the three she always had when criticizing another model to her face, even if it was her sister.

Needless to say, Gigi was more upset with Bella's insensitivity than with her weight gain. Bella was sorry, but while she did feel bad for insulting her sister she came around to defending herself. Gigi was pregnant but she still had a fantastic figure and a duty to maintain it. Being pregnant was no excuse for letting herself go more than she had to, and if Bella could see that her hips were getting too wide, her ass too jiggly, and her face round and soft, then everybody else could tell, too.

Consoling herself and feeling like Gigi overreacted, Bella had a healthy yogurt snack. When that wasn't enough, she had enough. The urges had been coming on stronger the longer the quarantine went on, though, the cravings for junk food. She had been able to resist thanks to her years of keeping her figure perfectly thin and fit, but that night was finding it harder than ever.
135332222123.title: The pregnant model and the catty sister

Still, she was so skinny she probably didn't need to worry about if a little indulgence here or there made her put on a few pounds. Especially since she wasn't working as much due to the virus. Unlike before, the health yogut hadn't satisifed her appetite. She was debating what else she could have when Gigi's question brought her out of her thoughts.

Do you think I have gotten a little too big?" Gigi couldn't help ask a bit fearful. Due to the pregnancy horomes, she was a little more emotional.

Again, Bella felt a bit bad about making her older sister feel bad but at the same time, her catty side was enjoyting this. "I mean you are getting chubby but it can't be help as you are pregnant. I don't think your eating habits have gotten out of control though" Bella replied. "Unless of course you are eating a pint of ice cream" the brunette sister added with an evil smile.

"The pregnancy curse?" Bella asked in surprise as she ate more of her donut. "Yes, if one sister or friend gets pregnant, their sister or best friend becomes cursed with that same pregnancy appetite. I thought it was just supersititio but it turns out it's not" Gigi said, pleasantly surprised by this relevation.

"That can't be right" Bella said before finishing off her donut before realizing it.

"It must be because you just finished off your donut" Gigi teased. "I bet you want another one now" she said, not able to help teasing her friend a little more.

Bella grumbled as she hated that her sister was right. The donut seemed to have only wet her appetite. "Okay fine I do. But I don't think this pregnancy curse is real. I'm just really hungry for some reason" she replied.

"Well think what you will but it's bed time for me. I hope you treat yourself to one more donut sis. I will talk to you tomorrow" Gigi said before logging out of the video chat.

Bella wanted to resist having another donut but her hunger was too strong to ignore. She headed back to the kitchen and helped herself to a second donut. She quickly devoured it as well and blushed as she let out a burp. She gently patted her belly. Realizing that it felt a bit rounder and bigger, she looked down to see that she now had a small food baby.
