13533222212312.content:
Bella couldn't remember the last time she ate enough to feel full, let alone have an actual food baby. Sure, it was a small one, but on her slender frame with her perfectly flat stomach, it stuck out. She moaned, annoyed, and then found herself digging into the third doughnut.

Ridiculous, she thought as she plopped down on the couch to watch some TV before bed. Curses aren't real and nobody ever heard of sisters gaining weight just because one of them was pregnant. It still bothered her, though. She didn't feel so bad about teasing Gigi about her weight now, though. Gigi knew how protective Bella was about her figure and how much she hated any kind of teasing about her weight, but she did it anyways.

Bella let her tired mind drift while she watched TV, and soon stopped thinking about Gigi, her puffy face and growing tummy, and her own hunger. But just because she forgot about her hunger didn't mean it was still gnawing at her. In fact, now that she was distracted she thought nothing of eating the fourth doughnut. Four chunks of friend bread counted for more calories than Bella had ever consumed in one day, let alone in a half hour.

Bella's hand listlessly lay on her full tummy, which now bulged outward noticeably. It felt tight and heavy. She didn't really notice it again until it growled angrily. She looked down and her eyes widened at the sight of her flat stomach gently puffed out. Her loose clingy t-shirt even showed the unsightly bulge. On most other women it would be unnoticeable, or at least unremarkable, but for Bella it was unprecedented. She rubbed it, surprised by how firm it felt, by how her skin felt a little stretched. Could she really have eaten that much?

Of course you did, you pig, Bella scolded herself. She stood up to go to bed, feeling her full tummy stretch as she stood, her shirt even rode up just a little. She growled as loudly as her stomach at her lack of self control. She'd have to work out twice as hard tomorrow. She found herself blushing when she thought that Barbara was coming over to hang out again tomorrow and probably left the doughnuts as a snack for both of them, and Bella would have to reveal she stuffed her face with them all in one go.

No, work out now, don't go to bed full. That's how you get FAT, she told herself, strongly, but her body was exhausted and already heading to her bedroom, hand gently rubbing her poor, swollen tummy. But no, she was far too tired. The strangest thing was that she was still so hungry. She started to blame Gigi for it, talking about food, getting fat, putting thoughts of an absurd curse in her head. If she woke up tomorrow and still had this food baby she was going to give her sister and ear full.
_________________________

Gigi looked herself over in the mirror. She had done that less and less as her pregnancy progressed. She frowned. Bella was right, she was putting on weight that couldn't just be blamed on the pregnancy. She was a little annoyed, but not upset. Any other time Gigi would have been horrified to find herself plumping up so quickly, but she was pregnant, and she realized to her surprise that was so much more important to her than keeping herself model-thin.

Bella wouldn't be so calm about it, though, Gigi thought, knowing her sister's vanity far outpaced hers. Bella would freak out the first time she couldn't button a pair of pants, Gigi laughed to herself. The only time she was remotely upset by her changing figure was that night when Bella insulted her.

It's too bad the pregnancy curse isn't real, she thought as she got into bed with Zayn already asleep. I'd love to see the look on her face as she swells up out of control.
13533222212312.title: A few more doughnuts wouldn't hurt

choices: Barbara gives Bella some ice cream to eat next
Barbara decides to bake some pastries for Bella
Barbara knows all about the curse that Gigi mentioned
135332222123121.content:
Bella woke up the next morning to see that she had slept in a little. It was already 10am and Barbara was going to be there in a hour. She got up and made her way to the bathroom. After peeing, washing her hands, and doing her morning routine, the brunette model got a look at her reflection. Much to her relief, the bloating from her pigging out on 4 doughnuts had gone down. Much to her chagrin, she noticed that her stomach had small patch of virgin fat on it. It was one bit of imperfection on her otherwise perfect body. I knew I should have worked it off right away she scolded herself while poking her bit of belly fat, feeling it's softness.

She knew what she needed to do. She needed to skip breakfast, change out of her workout gear, and head right for the gym. She couldn't do that with her friend coming over. Even if Barbara wasn't coming over, she wasn't sure she could will herself to start making those steps. The feelings of hunger from last night had not disappered like she had hoped. If anything, they were even stronger than last night. Was that curse real? Stop it she scolded herself. Maybe she hadn't been eating enough and now her body was trying to make up for missed meals. There was no way the curse could be real.

Bella changed into a pair of back leggings which she pulled up to cover her belly bulge and a white tank top. Only the smallest bit of skin between her stomach and chest was shown. She wore hair down. She was going to do her make-up when her stomach growled hungrily. It seemed the longer she waited to eat, the only stronger her hunger became. She just put on a bit of make-up before heading for the kitchen.

Arriving in the kitchen, she was faced with her next decision. What to have for breakfast? Due to her being so hungry and her diet already being thrown off by her doughnut binge, she decided to treat herself with some chocolate chip pancakes. She already knew that she was going to have to hit the gym hard later so why not enjoy her indulgence a little more this morning?

The model got to work and made a stack of 3 chocolate chip pancakes. Putting them on a plate, Bella couldn't help but put butter and maple syrup of them. She also poured herself a large glass of milk. She sat down at the counter with her breakfast and eagerly dug in. Mm, so good Bella thought to herself after eating the first couple of bites. She had forgotten how good chocolate chip pancakes were. The first two bites only made her hungry for more and she began to eat the pancakes faster. She was so hungry that she couldn't help herself.

Bella was taking a sips of her milk when she heard the door open and smiled as she saw her friend Barbara Palvin enter. Since the two of them were close freinds, she had given her a key. "Hey girl!" she greeted her.

"Hey hon! How are you?" Barbara greeted Bella with a smile as she made her way to the kitchen to join her friend. She was greeted to a sight she had not expected to see. Bella eating a big plate of pancakes. Even more unbelieveable than that, she was already halfway through them. "Wow, those chocolate chip pancakes look delicious. Are there any more?" she asked hopefully.

"No, I'm sorry. I only made these for myself" Bella said before eating more of her pancakes. "That's okay, I left some doughnuts here. I think will have one or two of those. Your pancake breakfast is making me crave carbs" Barbara said with a soft laugh. The mention of the doughnuts made Bella blush. "Um...I'm sorry hon. I actually ate those four doughnuts last night. I don't know what came over me. I was talking with my sister and I got really hungry. I couldn't help myself. I woke up this morning and I am still hungry" Bella explained, a little quickly as she was embarassed about pigging out like this. Between her hunger and feeling a bit stressed about it, Bella devoured the rest of the pancakes and washed it down with several more sips of her milk. She then blushed bright red as she let out an unladylike burp.

"Wow! I don't think I have ever heard you burp like that" Barbara said with a giggle before noticing the empty doughnut box. She had needed to see the box for herself to believe her friend. Yet, Bella's devouring of her pancaeks was pretty good proof as well. Barbara loved to eat herself and had often been teased by Bella whenever she allowed herself to indulge a little too much. It was bad enough to have the designers getting mad at her for getting too fat to fit into their outfits. Bella's teasing was adding insult to injury. Maybe it was time to turn the tables and have Bella be the one who indulged a little too much.

"Are you still hungry Bella? Also, why do you think you are so hungry all of a sudden?" Barbara asked her friend.

"Surprisingly yes" Bella admitted. "Let's see what else we can find you to eat then" Barbara said with a smile.

"To answer your second question, I have no idea why. Gigi told me this crazy story about a curse affecting the sisters and friends of pregnant woman. It makes them eat and get fat like they were pregnant but that's crazy right?" Bella asked with a laugh. She moved her hand down to her belly and patted it. She was disapointed but not surprised to feel it bloated and round again. Hopefully the leggings were preventing it from sticking out too much.
135332222123121.title: The next morning, Barbara meets a hungry Bella

choices: Barbara dismisses Bella's concerns and makes fun of her
Barbara has some fun with Bella, perhaps some feeding is in order
1353322221231211.content:
Bella went to the fridge and looked inside. She held her stomach as it rumbled.

"I can't believe I'm still hungry," she muttered.

Barbara laughed a little. "That's stupid, there's no pregnant curse like that. I know plenty of sisters where their sister was pregnant and they didn't gain weight or anything like that."

"I know that," Bella said. She was tempted to make more pancakes for Barbara, and in the process more for herself. That would be a bad idea, she told herself. Her full tummy with that little bit of softness on it told her that she did not to be eating anything else so fattening today. "Gigi was probably just trying to mess with me. Have you seen her? She's like," Bella puffed her cheeks out and giggled. Barbara laughed, too, although was annoyed at Bella for teasing her sister. Being on the end of Bella's fat jokes too often made Barbara sympathetic to Gigi in this case.

Barbara got up and looked in the freezer while Bella bent down, seemingly stuck in a state of indecision about what to grab. There was plenty of health food, Barbara noted, but Bella looked at it with distaste. Her stomach growled again. Barbara pulled a pint of rocky road ice cream out of the fridge. It had a single spoonful taken out of it. That was classic Bella, snacking very lightly. If this had been in Barbara's fridge it wouldn't have lasted a week, probably shorter.

"Here we go," Barbara said. Bella stood up and her mouth watered at the sight of the ice cream.

"That's not a very healthy breakfast," Bella said, but she knew given the chance she would dig into it, healthy or not.

"Looks who's talking Ms. Doughnuts-and-Pancakes," Barbara laughed and gave Bella's tummy a poke. She was surprised that it actually looked puffy. "Wow, I don't think I've ever actually seen you look full before."

Bella scowled. Having chided Barbara for her eating habits every time her friend overindulged, having that turned back on her was a blow to her ego. Barbara took out a spoon and sat down to have a little breakfast ice cream, and Bella sat next to her, her stomach roaring. What is wrong with me? Why can't I stop thinking about eating? she thought. Barbara noticed how Bella was looking at the ice cream. She sighed and handed the spoon over.

"Share?"

Bella didn't respond, she just snatched the spoon and took as big a scoop as her mouth would hold. Then she took another. She winced as the brain freeze hit her, but after the first taste even that wasn't going to stop her. She rubbed her stomach and went in again.

"Ooooh, ow ow ow," she whimpered, but fought through the cold. Barbara's eyes widened at how ravenous Bella ate. One second she was annoyed, but hungry, the next she was like an ice cream-devouring beast. Bella could feel her already full stomach grow colder, and fuller, as she stuffed mouthfuls of ice cream into it without stopping. In her mind, all that existed was her hunger, and the only goal she saw was to satisfy it.

About a third of the gallon vanished into Bella within minutes while Barbara watched with a kind of silent awe. Barbara leaned back, still holding the spoon, and gave her stomach a rub. She looked, and was, quite uncomfortable with an ice cold belly stuffed with pancakes and ice cream. Her stretchy pants covered it but did little to hide how bloated she was. Her tank top rode up a little, which she pulled down.

"Are you done?" Barbara asked.

"Bworp!" Bella shook her head. "I think I could eat that whole thing." Then, with some nervousness in her voice. "Um, do you think there's something wrong? I never eat like this, but I can't stop. Like, I don't know if you were saying anything just now, but when I was eating I couldn't think of anything else. I knew I should stop but I just couldn't."

Barbara wore a feint smile as Bella spoke. "Like you had no self control? I guess I know how that is when it comes to food."

Bella rolled her eyes. "No, it's not like that, that's just you pigging out. This feels...I don't know. But it's weird." Bella felt silly saying it out loud, but there was no denying that since last night her hunger had been out of control, and each time she ate it was harder to stop. Even now she was actively fighting the urge to keep eating. Even with her hands resting on what should have been her flat stomach but was now a gently bloated tummy.

Barbara did think it sounded silly, but also enjoyed watching Bella struggle with her appetite for the first time. After years of bragging about her perfect diet and perfect figure this was the first time Bella had seen her even slightly concerned for her figure. Meanwhile, Barbara's weight fluctuated enough that it was a running joke among her friends that if she was booked for a shoot they'd better do it fast because Barbara might get too fat by the time they got to her.
1353322221231211.title: Ice cream for breakfast

choices: Barbara chooses Bella's next snack and begins to feed her
Bella continues to stuff her and Barbara starts to record her with her phone
13533222212312111.content:
Barbara was struggling not to stare at Bella's bloated belly that was sticking out. It was both surprising and kinda hot to see her friend's tank top riding up a bit to reveal the bottom part of her belly and see a bulge at the top of her leggings. Why am I liking this so much she wondered to herself. Before she even realized what she was doing, Barbara reached out a hand and gently patted Bella's food baby. "Such a cute food baby" she teased the other model playfully with a giggle.

"I can't believe that you are starting to fall for Gigi's old wives tell. There is no such curse like that. If there is, I am sure I would have heard about it before and there would be much more weight gain among female friend groups. Plus, there would be more much fat shaming of Hollywood starlets" Barbara said as she shook off Bella's concern.

"Then what is going on?" Bella asked, a bit frustrated before a burp escaped her lips.

"What I think happened is this, you have always been as much a foodie as your sister and myself have been. The differenec is that you never admitted it to yourself or allowed yourself to indulge in it like Gigi and I have. I think spending time with your sister has led to her eating habits rubbing off on you, and that's why you can't stop eating" Barbara explained before poking Bella's bloated belly with an evil smile.

"But maybe your an even bigger foodie then Gigi and I because we have never eat this much all at once" Barbara added with an evil smile.

"And I am still hungry even though I am feeling really bloated" Bella admitted with a moan.

"You better be careful Bella. You keep eating, you might get too fat for your next photo-shoot" Barbara teased. Bella had once told her the same line. It was nice to give her friend a bit of turnabout.
13533222212312111.title: Barbara dismisses Bella's concerns and make...

choices: Barbara ignores Bella, and keeps feeding her
Bella goes to be alone, and Barbara calls Gigi to ask her some questions
135332222123121111.content:
Barbara laying it out like that made perfect sense. It at least set her mind at ease regarding any curse. It did not make her feel any better about her recent gluttony, though. She glared at Barbara, forcing a smile.

"That's not funny at all," Bella said. The fact that she had made the same comment, numerous times, to Barbara was lost on her.

"I'm just teasing you, it's fine. Everybody indulges sometimes," Barbara gave Bella's tummy another pat. This time she let her hand linger as Bella slouched in her chair. Her stomach rounded out gently, was hard to the touch like she really was stuffed to the brim. It gurgled, and Bella blushed even bright as another little burp escaped her lips.

Wait, she's not pushing me away, Barbara thought, just realizing that Bella didn't seem to mind. This excited her further. She had no idea why her friend's stuffed stomach was making her feel this way. Am I...getting turned on by this? she asked herself.

"Stop that," Bella snapped, pushing Barbara's hands away and sitting up straight. She tugged her tank top down, hiding her tummy but not how full it looked. "You're right. Gigi just thought because she's letting herself go she could mess with my head, too. Forget about it. No more talk about food." But Bella couldn't help that she was still starving.

Barbara stood up with an embarrassed giggle, and walked over to the counter. She looked around for something, not sure what. She glanced the breadbox, and found in it some bran muffins.

"Oh!" Bella said, grabbing one.

"What are you doing?"

"Healthy food," Barbara took it over to Bella and held it up to her. Bella turned her tight, but her stomach rumbled.

"Yeah, healthy except that it's full of carbs and sugar. I had enough of those today." Her mouth watered as Barbara did not remove the offending muffin.

Barbara smiled deviously, but there was an awkwardness and nervousness in her manner that made Bella uneasy. Bella felt it too, but Barbara could hardly guess the reason, and Bella didn't understand it herself.

"Come on, it's better than junk food, right?"

That didn't convince Bella's mind, but her body was sold. She found herself leaning forward to take the muffin, but with it being right under her nose, she took big bite while Barbara held it. She chewed, swallowed, and then another. Her hands gripped the seat of her chair.

"Hhhmmp?" she muttered, her mouth full. "I'm gonna' regret this but these are so good."

Barbara smiled nervously. There was no doubt in her mind now that this was turning her on, but she still didn't understand why. Bella ate faster, too. One hand went to her stuffed tummy as it gurgled, and she moaned between bites. Her stomach thanked her even while it stretched uncomfortable. It took her less than a minute to devour the muffin. Barbara was still smiling, while Bella looked a little worried. As Barbara moved her hand away, Bella reached out for another bite that wasn't there, and then put her mouth around Barbara's finger, then the next, and then jumped back with a gasp.

She couldn't help it, she was just so hungry for any bite, or taste, of food. She was blushing now, harder than any snide comment or belly poke from Barbara could make her. She looked worried.

"Sorry!" she blurted out, while Barbara looked down at her with a strange, amused expression, "I couldn't help it. I don't understand, I'm just sooo hungry." She said it in a distressed, whiny tone. For all Barbara's talk about how absurd a curse was, Bella now had real concerns. Eating like this wasn't like her. Being this hungry wasn't like her. Being so starved for any food at all that she'd eat out of her friend's hand and then actually like her fingers clean was beyond anything the slender model was used to.

"I-it's okay," Barbara said, laughing nervously. "It's kind of cute actually, haha."

Bella stood up, a scowl on her face, with one hand rubbing her swollen middle, trying to keep her tank top down. "There's nothing cute about being a pig. I need to lock myself up until this passes. And please keep food away from me, okay? Something isn't right, I can feel it."
135332222123121111.title: Bella's first hand feeding

Youtuber Let's Player Masae Anela
155112223.title: Next

1551122231.content:
“And just like that, we’re done!”

Sitting in her gaming den and studio was a YouTuber called Shauntelle Kikue, better known as MasaeAnela or Masae for short, who had recently finished a long playthrough session of Super Mario 64. Satisfied with her casual playthrough, she slowly lifted herself away from her chair to switch the console and tv off.

“Alright, now I just gotta edit all this footage and-,” she said before looking outside her window to the morning sun replaced with nightfall. “Aw geez, I didn’t realise how late it was!” she exclaimed in surprise.

With her hands on her hips, Masae let out a deep sigh of embarrassment before quickly bringing herself back up. “No biggie, I can get this done tomorrow and everyone will get to see this juicy finale of mine.”

This hasn’t been the first time this sort of thing has happened before, where she has been completely engaged in a game and losing track of time. Plus, while she was busy playing and providing her self-contained commentary, the YouTuber also didn’t realise she had made a mess in her room while doing so. For whatever reason, Masae had developed a habit of collecting a lot of food and drinks that were easily accessible in her reach without making her leave frequently from her records. And because of that, she had developed a bit of a pot-belly.

Pulling the curtains by her window, Masae soon turned her attention to her console and pulled the N64 cartridge out. “You certainly kept me busy,” she teased.

Then something expected happened, the cartridge in her hand suddenly began to glow intensively before hovering above Masae’s hand.

“What in the-?!” Masae yelled in shock.

Masae could only watch as the cartridge continued to glow brighter by second until the cartridge transformed into a vortex that suddenly began to suck anything into it. Masae quickly grabbed the curtains to prevent herself from getting pulled inside but the vortex was too strong as it ripped the curtain railing off the wall.

“AAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!” Masae shouted before she was pulled inside the spinning N64 vortex.

Once she was inside, the vortex suddenly disappeared and reverted into the Super Mario 64 cartridge again that fell onto the floor. Masae didn’t know what was happening as she found herself aimlessly spinning around in a glowing blue void.

It didn’t last long as Masae saw something approaching her inside the void. Closing her eyes and shielding herself from whatever impact that was about to happen, instead, Masae found herself shooting out of the void and landing headfirst into the ground of a field of sorts.

“Ooowww…” she groaned aloud from the pain, her legs wiggling around as she tried to pull herself out of her predicament.

The vortex hovering behind her suddenly faded away, leaving her alone into this strange place she had been whisked away. It wasn’t long until she managed to pluck herself out of the ground.

“Uurgghh… That was a thing,” she remarked while rubbing her sore head. “What just happened and where…”

Though she was asking herself those questions, she soon discovered where she ended up. On looking around her surroundings, she found herself in a place that she instantly recognised from all the times she had seen or played; never imagined herself to be in.

A hilly, grassy area with several trees and over in front of her was a tall castle with a lovely stained-glass window. She was at the castle grounds of Princess Peach’s castle.

“Oh my god…” she uttered slowly, almost falling over from shock. “I’m in the game!”

And that wasn’t the only thing that was bizarre of her situation as she noticed she was wearing different clothes to the one she was wearing earlier in her room. For whatever reason, she was wearing clothes that were identical to Mario’s. Hat included.

It was as if someone had magically swapped her sweater and jeans upon arriving in this place.

“Heh, that’s pretty cool,” Masae commented, admiring her new clothes while playing with her gut. “I have certainly been packing on some weight as of late, but whatever.”

As she was playing with her pudgy belly, Masae felt something stiffen between her thighs. Letting out a soft moan and feeling her body suddenly tense, Masae ignored that weird feeling for now as she stopped messing around. Turning her attention to castle, Masae soon began to ponder an idea. “I wonder if someone inside can explain what’s going on.”

Wanting answers, Masae soon began to make her towards the entrance of Peach’s castle. Upon walking over the bridge, she was suddenly stopped by...

“Oh my god! Lakitu!” Masae immediately gushed sweetly at the cloud riding turtle creature. “Just like in the game too. Hehe, maybe I should have skipped bridge in that case.”

“Good afternoon! The Lakitu Bros., here, reporting live from just outside the Princess's castle. Youtuber Masae has just arrived on the scene, and we'll be filming the action live as she enters the castle and pursues the missing Power Stars.”

“Wait, what?” she asked at this sudden piece of information.

“Reporting live, this has been the Lakitu Bros!” Soon as he said that, the Lakitu began to fly away and disappear from her sight.

“H-Hey! Wait, come back!” Masae yelled. “Goddammit…”

Sighing with displeasure, Masae resumed her original plan and entered the castle...

15511222321.content: How does the the streamer as beautiful as she is viewed, loved, and criticized, fattened?
15511222321.title: Let's fatten Pokimane

155112223211.content:
Imane, who went by Poki more and more these days, finished up another late night video session in a good mood. She usually did. The last few nights did include a ritual that she was getting less and less pleased about.

"Oof!" she relaxed her stomach and stopped sucking in. These last few months were hard socially and mentally, but the first time Poki really got close to upset when she went over footage a few days prior and was shocked to see that she looked bloated. Even worse, it was obvious that the "bloating" was actually a little bit of fat forming on her formerly lean and flat midriff. Fortunately she hadn't noticed that her ass was looking a little padded lately.

It shouldn't have upset her that much and she tried not to let it. She had to come to terms with the fact that she wasn't 18 anymore. The 24-year-old streamer now couldn't just stick to her steady diet of junk food and not feel the consequences. It was only a few pounds, not even five pounds, she told herself, but could not take her mind off of it. Part of it was her public image, true. Poki had a huge young male fan base and a huge part of that was that she was exceptionally attractive. The other part was that she thought of herself as being exactly as attractive as all those overly adoring fans thought she was. "Being beautiful" might a swell have been as beloved a hobby of hers as gaming.

Simply put, Poki's self image as a perfect goddess of streaming did not gel with the action of hiding her slightly puffy tummy from fans.

Oh, well, she'd work out, eat less, it shouldn't be that hard. Likely nobody else even noticed, and she only thought it was so bad because being on the shorter side any gain would show up fast.

Poki was going to turn in for the night when she spotted a message to her channel that intrigued her.
155112223211.title: Poki and the extra three or four pounds

choices: Poki declines but she has a strange dream about this email...
Easy money for being lazy? She's in!
The email has a hypnotic effect on her...
1551122232112.content:
Intrigued with the message, Poki hovered her mouse over and clicked it where she was greeted with an email that was titled "Poki-Thicc."

“What the heck?” she mumbled at the title before moving down to read what this message contained.

Greetings Pokimane,

Before you reject my suggestion, I hope you have some time to see what I’m offering. You see, I’m a person of considerable power and influence. And while this influence denies me the flexibility to introduce myself, it does afford me the possibility to richly reward you ought to try to what I request.

“And what the heck is that suppose to mean?” Poki snarked before resuming the rest of the message.

While your figure is incredibly attractive, I’ve noticed and a few others have noticed how much thicker you have gotten. It’s definitely a good look for you. There's a lot more you could do with added weight.

“Umm, thanks?” she replied by that strange compliment.

Sitting there in that big chair, looking so snug and alluring until you have to get up. I'm sure you've withheld yourself from certain indulgences. Wouldn't it feel great to put in bed all day eating filling your fat belly, and not getting up for anything? To feel all of the delicious greasy foods you've eaten take their full effect on your body. Holding nothing back as they bring out your inner beauty?

Long story short, I willing to pay you to become completely lazy, fat and unkept in every sense of the words. I’ll pay you millions of dollars to indicate me this most beautiful and sensual transformation.

Yours truly,
An Admirer.

Pushing back from her chair she thought over the choice…
1551122232112.title: From a mysterious fan

choices: "You won't be able to stop eating, no matter how much you try."
15511222321121.content:
At first, Poki wore a bemused smile after reading the email, leaning back with her arms crossed and feeling that extra little pit of padding around her middle. It was a strange request, doubt about that. Probably one of the stranger proposals Poki had come across in her time in the spotlight. A secret millionaire paying her to get fat and be lazy?

In fairness, Poki did briefly consider the proposal, assuming it was even a real one.

"Nah," she said out loud, shaking her head, and then with a giggle, added, "No way."

Hi Admirer! Glad you enjoy the show!

Thanks for the weird offer. I do love food like you say, but not enough to get fat off of it! No offense! I guess it sounds stuck up but I like my figure more than I'd like millions of dollars.

But keep watching! I've been snacking all day lately so you never know what'll happen!


A natural salesman, Poki couldn't help but throw in that last tease even if she was determined that no more extra weigh

While this admirer was right in that Poki was both lazy and liked food, Poki also had a deep and probably unhealthy love for her own appearance. She loved her short, thin, curvy body, and while she wouldn't say it out loud thought of herself as just as attractive as her followers said she was. The mental image of 'Fat Poki' was something she hadn't considered until now, and actually made her shudder.

And her ego couldn't help but be a little insulted at the suggestion that she wasn't pretty enough already. And the comment about how "much thicker" she's gotten? Thicker? I've gained like three pounds, maybe four. Okay, maaaybe five. And 'fat belly'? All right, I have, like, the start of a roll here but that's it. Hardly a belly, certainly not a fat one!

At least the offer convinced Poki that the diet would start tomorrow. This had to be nipped in the bud. With her height and those curves, Poki had the disturbing notion that she might just put on weight easily if she let it happen. In fact, she even went to bed that night without her usual midnight ice cream.

--------------------------------------------------

In her dream Poki found herself standing front of the mirror in her bedroom. She was wearing that cute gray floral dress with the short, flowing sleeves and the buttons over her midriff. It was a cute outfit and she looked great in it, but it reminded her that she wore it on camera the other day and somebody commented that she looked pregnant. She admitted with her softened stomach it did seem to look puffy, especially in the dress. She turned to her side and crinkled her nose.

"I don't look pregnant," she said defiantly, "Just...bloated, maybe."

In the mirror behind her, her room was now gone, replaced with a long palace hall and a long table. Before that, the scent of a thousand aromas hit her nose. She smelled savory meats and rich deserts. She turned around, confused.

"You don't like the feeling then?" a man said, hidden by the shadows of dreams but with the air of an artificial old world aristocrat.

"Nah," Poki said, self-consciously rubbing her stomach. "The diet starts tomorrow. I'm starting to get doughy."

"Perhaps we can compromise. Maybe start with ten pounds and see how you like it."

"God no, ten pounds and I'd be a cow," Poki said. "No offense. It's just not for me. And I'm not even hungry anyways."

"Aren't you now?" the man said. Poki saw him more clearly now, could make out that he appeared to be around thirty, was tall and thin with dark hair, but his face was still in shadows. He was standing next to her when he reached over and gave her stomach a poke right on her naval. Her stomach gurgled, then began growling with hunger like it had been turned on. Poki stepped to the table and away from him.

"No, I'm not," Poki said, nervousness in her voice. She held her stomach as it rumbled with a life of its own. She was hungry, starving even. She just stood at the end of the long table, staring down it, wanting so badly to stuff her face but resisting the urge. A bowl of spaghetti the size of a watermelon was closest to her.

"Just eat to your heart's content," the man sounded a little annoyed now. He walked to the table and tapped the bowl of spaghetti. "There's no need to worry about becoming a cow, as you say."

He tapped the bowl again and suddenly the spaghetti, sauce and all vanished. Poki felt strange and a groan escaped her lips. Under her hands her stomach grew warm and full. It pushed out a little. The taste, like the delicious home made marinara sauce her mom used to make, lingered on her tongue after the shock of suddenly being so full settled. She gasped, hiccuped, and before she could stop herself.

"Mooo!" the long, low sound burst out of her. The man laughed, but Poki's heart was beating harder now. "Did all that just go inside me?"

"Can't you tell? Doesn't it feel so good and freeing to be so full?" The man's hands went to the bread rolls next, rich and buttery, and as he touched each one of the dozen they vanished and Poki felt a little fuller. She pressed her hands over her middle and gasped again. She took a few steps back as the man-and her-vinished off the rolls.

"So many carbs, but too good to resist," he said, grinning widely.

"Mooo! I mean, stop that! I'm leaving, this is sick," but before Poki could turn around the man approached a tall chocolate cake. She shook her head. She looked down ad saw that she was visibly bloated, her stomach sticking out a few inches. It was tight and hard to the touch. Whatever the man said, it felt quite uncomfortable, not good at all.

"You need something sweet, I think. Chocolate is your favorite?"

"N-no, that's too much-"

The man touched the cake, and Poki could taste. It was phenomenal, the best chocolate cake she had ever had. It went by her tastebuds quickly before the secondary effect had her attention now. She held tightly onto her stomach as her eyes went wide. She could feel it filling, growing tighter, growling and writing and fighting to make space. She fell back into a chair and grunted as her already bloated stomach swelled further, swelling even as far as her breasts. The dress grew tight, the buttons up front straining.

"Mooo!" It came again, and she blushed, but was growing frightened. "Aaah, stoooop!" the discomfort bordered on painful as the first button popped off. She squealed in surprise, then the next one, her stomach a firm, hard dome stuffed with pasta, bread, and cake and sticking out a full foot from where it should be. Her undershirt prevented her bare belly from being visible between the lost buttons. Even that felt tight. She arched her back to stand but that made her feel like she might burst.

"Ooooh, god, I'm too full, that's enough," she said, then belched. She rubbed her full belly, whimpering. "Please, all right, I'll consider it, okay? Just no more tonight. Please, I'm really going to pop." She whined at the sight of her pregnant-looking belly, wondering how many calories were in there waiting to turn into fat right now.

"Mmm, I don't think. I think you're just saying that because I stuffed you to the brim while making you moo like a cow. But in a way, it doesn't really matter what you decide. This is a dream, after all."

Poki looked confused at that. It was a dream, right? She belched again, forced out of her by overly packed belly. She felt weighed down by. She shifted in the chair. It seemed the table was coming closer.

"That's right, just a dream-uurp!" Poki said, even if everything smelled so real, and the disgustingly full feeling so real, too.

"That's right, and when you wake up-"
15511222321121.title: Poki's filling dream

choices: Her breakfast starts out small... At first.
To her surprise, her fridge is empty. Poki heads out for Breakfast instead.
155112223211211.content:
"You won't be able to stop eating, no matter how much you try."

Once the mysterious entity said that, Poki immediately awoke from her bizarre slumber, where she was in her bed and patting so heavily. Quickly looking around her surroundings before suddenly pinching her arm, Poki gave a small yelp from her pinch before sighing softly with relief.

“Oh, thank goodness,” Poki quietly said to herself. “It was just a silly dream…” Her frighten face replaced with a small smile, as the brunette gently fell into her pillows and laid on her bed.

As strange as it was, Poki could help but wonder what any of it meant. The streamer trying to recollect her thoughts of what she saw in her odd dream, unaware her hands were gently rubbing her somewhat pudgy belly.

Numerous teasing comments about her weight which she continued to deny. Almost making a complete cow of herself with the food she was being offered, plus her mooing like one wasn’t helping. And how she reacted when she said she looked pregnant… She was too young to be a mother, but yet, the thought about it was… intriguing at most.

Regardless, all of this started because of that email and Poki wanted to have another look at it. But, before she could start her investigation, her belly suddenly gurgled between her fingertips. Rolling her body aside, she looked at her clock and saw it was only 11 am.

“Breakfast should help,” Poki commented on, as she moved away from her bed. “A small morning snack could do me good.”
155112223211211.title: "You won't be able to stop eating!"

choices: Finally satisfied, Poki flees with her bloated belly to hide from any more food
The admirer appears to her in a vision
1551122232112112.content:
Incredibly, Poki found her fridge to be nearly empty of anything of substance. She thought she had gone grocery shopping just the other day, but there was almost nothing to eat. She patted her growling tummy and grunted. This would mean she'd have to go out. Her stomach groaned happily at the thought, but her hunger seemed to be growing rapidly.

Going out meant at least an hour of preparation as Poki refused to leave her house looking anything other than perfect. By the time she had showered, done her hair and make up, and had chosen a cute skirt pulled up high with a tight lacy tank top tucked into it, she was dizzy with hunger. Her stomach wouldn't keep quiet. She left her place quickly, even cutting short her normal routine of stopping by the mirror at her door and looking herself over. She noted only that she looked adorable and sexy, as usual, and that her plaid skirt did a good job of hiding that little bulge that had shown up on her lower tummy.

Poki stopped at the first place she saw, a small breakfast-centric diner that she had eaten at before. It was all right, nothing special, but it had the kind of greasy, filling fare that Poki's stomach cried out for.

"What can I get you, hun?" the waitress asked as Poki took her seat alone. In the place was emptying out in the early afternoon. If she remembered right they were not open much longer.

Poki examined the menu, her hands shaking with hunger. It was like she hadn't eaten in days. Everything looked good. She couldn't decide. And before she knew what she was saying, she was ordering.

"The waffles sound great, get me a plate of those. Oh, and a side-no, a full plate-of bacon. And another one of sausage. Bring more syrup, too. Ooh, could I get some hashbrowns? Cover those in cheese, mmm, and make that two orders. Maybe some eggs, yeah, add a side of scrambled eggs to that."

The waitress took the order quickly.

"Are you expecting company?" she asked.

Poki blushed and crossed her arms across her roaring stomach. "N-No..."

"It'll be a few minutes, that's a big order. Want me to bring them out as they're ready?"

"Yes, please!"

Poki fidgeted in her seat until the eggs came out. She devoured them without even looking up at the waitress. As she ate, a plate of bacon arrived. Poki grabbed a piece and stuffed it in her mouth in one bite, and as soon as she swallow stuffed another one in. She broke a piece in two, put it in her eggs, and then shoveled that in. Her heart was racing as the waffles and sausage were brought out. She grabbed a fist full of bacon and took two huge bites, her cheeks bulging as she struggled to get everything into her as fast as she could.

What is wrong with me? Poki thought as she ate. Her hands flew across the table, drenching the waffles with syrup, and then doing the same to the sausage and what was left of the bacon. So much grease, so much protein and carbs, were being stuffed down her throat that she couldn't keep up. Within ten minutes she was full, and would have been full sooner if it were possible to eat faster. But she still had half the waffles left, and had barely made a dent in the sausage. The bacon and eggs were long gone. When they brought out the hashbrowns, she gave a whine and a pathetic look to the waitress that said, Why are you still bringing me food? But she remembered she had ordered it. There was a dreamlike quality to it, but there was nothing dreamlike about the tight, full feeling growing in her stomach.

She stopped long enough to give her poor tummy a rub. Yep, that's a food baby, she thought, smiling to herself but releasing a belch and a whine at her own gluttony. Hadn't she promised her diet would start today? She leaned back in her seat, hand on her belly while the other continued to pile food into her mouth. She looked and saw that her stomach even looked a little bigger, and the skirt was tighter than it should have been. I need to stop. Why can't I stop?

"M'am, can I get you something to drink?" the waitress-who Poki now noted was quite thin and looking at her with amusement.

"Bwoorp!" Poki blushed, covering her mouth, and swallowed. She was leaning back now, her stomach so full that bending over was uncomfortable. "How about a milk shake?" she blurted out, then whined loudly at herself. Oh god, why does this seem so familiar?

"You sure?" the waitress asked.

"Moo!" It was a short spurt of a sound that Poki blurted out. She covered her mouth, her eyes wide. She felt a twinge of panic. The dream, a distant, faded memory when she had sat down to eat, came back to her. "I mean, yes," she said, despite her best effort to say now.

"You have quite the appetite, girl," the waitress said with a chuckle, turning around. Poki couldn't help but note her slim figure, her tiny ass, and felt more than ever how full and swollen her stomach was getting.

"I don't know what's come over me," she said quietly as the waitress walked off, then stifled another belch as she rubbed her swollen stomach. It stuck out at least three or four inches more than normal, and would have been hard to the touch had it not been for her recent softness added there.
